    using assms FINITE_prob_dom
    by blast
  have"(card (valid_states PROB :: 'a state set)) = card {s :: 'a state. fmdom' s = prob_dom PROB}"
    unfolding valid_states_def
    by simp
  also have "...  = 2 ^ (card (prob_dom PROB))"
    using 1 card_of_set_of_all_possible_states
    by blast
  finally show ?thesis
    by blast
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE type of 'valid\_states PROB' has to be asserted to match 'FINITE\_states' in the proof.‚Ä∫
lemma FINITE_valid_states:
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem"
  shows "finite PROB ‚üπ finite ((valid_states PROB) :: 'a state set)"
proof (induction PROB rule: finite.induct)
  case emptyI
  then have "valid_states {} = {fmempty}"
    unfolding valid_states_def prob_dom_def
    using empty_domain_fmap_set
    by force
  then show ?case
    by(subst ‚Äπvalid_states {} = {fmempty}‚Ä∫) auto
next
  case (insertI A a)
  {
    then have "finite (insert a A)"
      by blast
    then have "finite (prob_dom (insert a A))"
      using FINITE_prob_dom
      by blast
    then have "finite {s :: 'a state. fmdom' s = prob_dom (insert a A)}"
      using FINITE_states
      by blast
  }
  then show ?case
    unfolding valid_states_def
    by simp
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE type of 'PROB' had to be fixed for use of 'FINITE\_valid\_states'.‚Ä∫
lemma lemma_2:
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem" and as :: "('a action) list" and s :: "'a state"
  assumes "finite PROB" "s ‚àà (valid_states PROB)" "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
    "((length as) > (2 ^ (card (fmdom' s)) - 1))"
  shows "(‚àÉas1 as2 as3.
    (as1 @ as2 @ as3 = as)
    ‚àß (exec_plan s (as1 @ as2) = exec_plan s as1)
    ‚àß ¬¨(as2 = [])
  )"
proof -
  have "Suc (length as) > 2^(card (fmdom' s))"
    using assms(4)
    by linarith
  then have 1: "card (state_set (state_list s as)) > 2^card (fmdom' s)"
    using card_state_set[symmetric]
    by metis
  {
    ‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE type of 'valid\_states PROB' had to be asserted to match 'FINITE\_valid\_states'.‚Ä∫
    have 2: "finite (prob_dom PROB)" "finite ((valid_states PROB)  :: 'a state set)"
      using assms(1) FINITE_prob_dom FINITE_valid_states
      by blast+
    have 3: "fmdom' s = prob_dom PROB"
      using assms(2) valid_states_def
      by fast
    then have "card ((valid_states PROB) :: 'a state set) = 2^card (fmdom' s)"
      using assms(1) CARD_valid_states
      by auto
    then have 4: "card (state_set (state_list (s :: 'a state) as)) > card ((valid_states PROB) :: 'a state set)"
      unfolding valid_states_def
      using 1 2(1) 3 card_of_set_of_all_possible_states[of "prob_dom PROB"]
      by argo
        ‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO refactor into lemma.‚Ä∫
    {
      let ?S="state_set (state_list (s :: 'a state) as)"
      let ?T="valid_states PROB :: 'a state set"
      assume C2: "inj_on last ?S"
        ‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO unwrap the metis step or refactor into lemma.‚Ä∫
      have a: "?T ‚äÜ last ` ?S"
        using C2
        by (metis "2"(2) "4" assms(2) assms(3) card_image card_mono lemma_1 not_less)
      have "finite (state_set (state_list s as))"
        using state_set_finite
        by auto
      then have "card (last ` ?S) = card ?S"
        using C2 inj_on_iff_eq_card
        by blast
      also have "‚Ä¶ > card ?T"
        using 4
        by blast
      then have "‚àÉx. x ‚àà (last ` ?S) ‚àß x ‚àâ ?T"
        using C2 a assms(2) assms(3) calculation lemma_1
        by fastforce
    }
    note 5 = this
    moreover
    {
      assume C: "inj last (state_set (state_list (s :: 'a state) as)) (valid_states PROB)"
      then have "inj_on last (state_set (state_list (s :: 'a state) as))"
        using C inj_def
        by blast
      then obtain x where "x ‚àà last ` (state_set (state_list s as)) ‚àß x ‚àâ valid_states PROB"
        using 5
        by presburger
      then have "¬¨(‚àÄx‚ààstate_set (state_list s as). last x ‚àà valid_states PROB)"
        by blast
      then have "¬¨inj last (state_set (state_list (s :: 'a state) as)) (valid_states PROB)"
        using inj_def
        by metis
      then have False
        using C
        by simp
    }
    ultimately have "¬¨inj last (state_set (state_list (s :: 'a state) as)) (valid_states PROB)"
      unfolding inj_def
      by blast
  }
  then obtain slist_1 slist_2 where 6:
    "slist_1 ‚àà state_set (state_list s as)"
    "slist_2 ‚àà state_set (state_list s as)"
    "(last slist_1 = last slist_2)"
    "length slist_1 ‚â† length slist_2"
    using assms(2, 3) not_eq_last_diff_paths
    by blast
  then show ?thesis
  proof (cases as)
    case Nil
    text ‚Äπ 4th assumption is violated in the 'Nil' case. ‚Ä∫
    then have "¬¨(2 ^ card (fmdom' s) - 1 < length as)"
      using Nil
      by simp
    then show ?thesis
      using assms(4)
      by blast
  next
    case (Cons a list)
    then have "as ‚â† []"
      by simp
    moreover have "slist_1 ‚â† []" "slist_2 ‚â† []"
      using 6(1, 2) NIL_NOTIN_stateset
      by blast+
    ultimately show ?thesis
      using assms(2, 3) 6(1, 2, 3, 4) eq_last_state_imp_append_nempty_as
      by fastforce
  qed
qed


lemma lemma_2_prob_dom:
  fixes PROB and as :: "('a action) list" and s :: "'a state"
  assumes "finite PROB" "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)" "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
    "(length as > (2 ^ (card (prob_dom PROB))) - 1)"
  shows "(‚àÉas1 as2 as3.
    (as1 @ as2 @ as3 = as)
    ‚àß (exec_plan s (as1 @ as2) = exec_plan s as1)
    ‚àß ¬¨(as2 = [])
  )"
proof -
  have "prob_dom PROB = fmdom' s"
    using assms(2) valid_states_def
    by fast
  then have "2 ^ card (fmdom' s) - 1 < length as"
    using assms(4)
    by argo
  then show ?thesis
    using assms(1, 2, 3) lemma_2
    by blast
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE type for `s` had to be fixed (type mismatch in obtain statement).‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE type for `as1`, `as2` and `as3` had to be fixed (due type mismatch on `as1` in
`cycle\_removal\_lemma`)‚Ä∫
lemma lemma_3:
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem" and s :: "'a state"
  assumes "finite PROB" "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)" "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
    "(length as > (2 ^ (card (prob_dom PROB)) - 1))"
  shows "(‚àÉas'.
    (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as')
    ‚àß (length as' < length as)
    ‚àß (subseq as' as)
  )"
proof -
  have "prob_dom PROB = fmdom' s"
    using assms(2) valid_states_def
    by fast
  then have "2 ^ card (fmdom' s) - 1 < length as"
    using assms(4)
    by argo
  then obtain as1 as2 as3 :: "'a action list" where 1:
    "as1 @ as2 @ as3 = as" "exec_plan s (as1 @ as2) = exec_plan s as1" "as2 ‚â† []"
    using assms(1, 2, 3) lemma_2
    by metis
  have 2: "exec_plan s (as1 @ as3) = exec_plan s (as1 @ as2 @ as3)"
    using 1 cycle_removal_lemma
    by fastforce
  let ?as' = "as1 @ as3"
  have "exec_plan s as = exec_plan s ?as'"
    using 1 2
    by auto
  moreover have "length ?as' < length as"
    using 1 nempty_list_append_length_add
    by blast
  moreover have "subseq ?as' as"
    using 1 subseq_append'
    by blast
  ultimately show "(‚àÉas'.
      (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as') ‚àß (length as' < length as) ‚àß (subseq as' as))"
    by blast
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO unwrap meson step.‚Ä∫
lemma sublist_valid_is_valid:
  fixes as' as PROB
  assumes "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)" "(subseq as' as)"
  shows "as' ‚àà valid_plans PROB"
  using assms
  by (simp add: valid_plans_def) (meson dual_order.trans fset_of_list_subset sublist_subset)


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE type of 's' had to be fixed (type mismatch in goal).‚Ä∫
theorem main_lemma:
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem" and as s
  assumes "finite PROB" "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)" "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
  shows "(‚àÉas'.
    (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as')
    ‚àß (subseq as' as)
    ‚àß (length  as' ‚â§ (2 ^ (card (prob_dom PROB))) - 1)
  )"
proof (cases "length as ‚â§ (2 ^ (card (prob_dom PROB))) - 1")
  case True
  then have "exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as"
    by simp
  then have "subseq as as"
    by auto
  then have "length as ‚â§ (2^(card (prob_dom PROB)) - 1)"
    using True
    by auto
  then show ?thesis
    by blast
next
  case False
  then have "length as > (2 ^ (card (prob_dom PROB))) - 1"
    using False
    by auto
  then obtain as' where 1:
    "exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as'" "length as' < length as" "subseq as' as"
    using assms lemma_3
    by blast
  {
    fix p
    assume "exec_plan s as = exec_plan s p" "subseq p as"
      "2 ^ card (prob_dom PROB) - 1 < length p"
    then have "(‚àÉp'. (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s p' ‚àß subseq p' as) ‚àß length p' < length p)"
      using assms(1, 2, 3) lemma_3 sublist_valid_is_valid
      by fastforce
  }
  then have "‚àÄp. exec_plan s as = exec_plan s p ‚àß subseq p as ‚ü∂
      (‚àÉp'. (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s p' ‚àß subseq p' as)
      ‚àß length p' ‚â§ 2 ^ card (prob_dom PROB) - 1)"
    using general_theorem[where
        P = "Œª(as'' :: 'a action list). (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as'') ‚àß subseq as'' as"
        and l = "(2 ^ (card (prob_dom (PROB ::'a problem)))) - 1" and f = length]
    by blast
  then obtain p' where
    "exec_plan s as = exec_plan s p'" "subseq p' as" "length p' ‚â§ 2 ^ card (prob_dom PROB) - 1"
    by blast
  then show ?thesis
    using sublist_refl
    by blast
qed


subsection "Reachable States"


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE shortened to 'reachable\_s'‚Ä∫
definition reachable_s where
  "reachable_s PROB s ‚â° {exec_plan s as | as. as ‚àà valid_plans PROB}"


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE types for `s` and `PROB` had to be fixed (type mismatch in goal).‚Ä∫
lemma valid_as_valid_exec:
  fixes as and s :: "'a state" and PROB :: "'a problem"
  assumes "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)" "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)"
  shows "(exec_plan s as ‚àà valid_states PROB)"
  using assms
proof (induction as arbitrary: s PROB)
  case (Cons a as)
  then have "a ‚àà PROB"
    using valid_plan_valid_head
    by metis
  then have "state_succ s a ‚àà valid_states PROB"
    using Cons.prems(2) valid_action_valid_succ
    by blast
  moreover have "as ‚àà valid_plans PROB"
    using Cons.prems(1) valid_plan_valid_tail
    by fast
  ultimately show ?case
    using Cons.IH
    by force
qed simp


lemma exec_plan_fdom_subset:
  fixes as s PROB
  assumes "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
  shows "(fmdom' (exec_plan s as) ‚äÜ (fmdom' s ‚à™ prob_dom PROB))"
  using assms
proof (induction as arbitrary: s PROB)
  case (Cons a as)
  have "as ‚àà valid_plans PROB"
    using Cons.prems valid_plan_valid_tail
    by fast
  then have "fmdom' (exec_plan (state_succ s a) as) ‚äÜ fmdom' (state_succ s a) ‚à™ prob_dom PROB"
    using Cons.IH[of _ "state_succ s a"]
    by simp
      ‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO unwrap metis proofs.‚Ä∫
  moreover have "fmdom' s ‚à™ fmdom' (snd a) ‚à™ prob_dom PROB = fmdom' s ‚à™ prob_dom PROB"
    by (metis
        Cons.prems FDOM_eff_subset_prob_dom_pair sup_absorb2 sup_assoc valid_plan_valid_head)
  ultimately show ?case
    by (metis (no_types, lifting)
        FDOM_state_succ_subset exec_plan.simps(2) order_refl subset_trans sup.mono)
qed simp


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
lemma reachable_s_finite_thm_1_a:
  fixes s and PROB :: "'a problem"
  assumes "(s :: 'a state) ‚àà valid_states PROB"
  shows "(‚àÄl‚ààreachable_s PROB s. l‚ààvalid_states PROB)"
proof -
  have 1: "‚àÄl‚ààreachable_s PROB s. ‚àÉas. l = exec_plan s as ‚àß as ‚àà valid_plans PROB"
    using reachable_s_def
    by fastforce
  {
    fix l
    assume P1: "l ‚àà reachable_s PROB s"
      ‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE type for 's' and 'as' had to be fixed due to type mismatch in obtain statement.‚Ä∫
    then obtain as :: "'a action list" where a: "l = exec_plan s as ‚àß as ‚àà valid_plans PROB"
      using 1
      by blast
    then have "exec_plan s as ‚àà valid_states PROB"
      using assms a valid_as_valid_exec
      by blast
    then have "l ‚àà valid_states PROB"
      using a
      by simp
  }
  then show "‚àÄl ‚àà reachable_s PROB s. l ‚àà valid_states PROB"
    by blast
qed

lemma reachable_s_finite_thm_1:
  assumes "((s :: 'a state) ‚àà valid_states PROB)"
  shows "(reachable_s PROB s ‚äÜ valid_states PROB)"
  using assms reachable_s_finite_thm_1_a
  by blast


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE second declaration skipped (this is declared twice in the source; see above)‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE type for `s` had to be fixed (type mismatch in goal).‚Ä∫
lemma reachable_s_finite_thm:
  fixes s :: "'a state"
  assumes "finite (PROB :: 'a problem)" "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)"
  shows "finite (reachable_s PROB s)"
  using assms
  by (meson FINITE_valid_states reachable_s_finite_thm_1 rev_finite_subset)


lemma empty_plan_is_valid: "[] ‚àà (valid_plans PROB)"
  by (simp add: valid_plans_def)


lemma valid_head_and_tail_valid_plan:
  assumes "(h ‚àà PROB)" "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
  shows "((h # as) ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
  using assms
  by (auto simp: valid_plans_def)


‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO refactor‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma‚Ä∫
lemma lemma_1_reachability_s_i:
  fixes PROB s
  assumes "s ‚àà valid_states PROB"
  shows "s ‚àà reachable_s PROB s"
proof -
  have "[] ‚àà valid_plans PROB"
    using empty_plan_is_valid
    by blast
  then show ?thesis
    unfolding reachable_s_def
    by force
qed

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE types for 'PROB' and 's' had to be fixed (type mismatch in goal).‚Ä∫
lemma lemma_1_reachability_s:
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem" and s :: "'a state" and as
  assumes "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)" "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
  shows "((last ` state_set (state_list s as)) ‚äÜ (reachable_s PROB s))"
  using assms
proof(induction as arbitrary: PROB s)
  case Nil
  then have "(last ` state_set (state_list s [])) = {s}"
    by force
  then show ?case
    unfolding reachable_s_def
    using empty_plan_is_valid
    by force
next
  case cons: (Cons a as)
  let ?S="last ` state_set (state_list s (a # as))"
  {
    let ?as="[]"
    have "last [s] = exec_plan s ?as"
      by simp
    moreover have "?as ‚àà valid_plans PROB"
      using empty_plan_is_valid
      by auto
    ultimately have "‚àÉas. (last [s] = exec_plan s as) ‚àß as ‚àà valid_plans PROB"
      by blast
  }
  note 1 = this
  {
    fix x
    assume P: "x ‚àà ?S"
    then consider
      (a) "x = last [s]"
      | (b) "x ‚àà last ` ((#) s ` state_set (state_list (state_succ s a) as))"
      by auto
    then have "x ‚àà reachable_s PROB s"
    proof (cases)
      case a
      then have "x = s"
        by simp
      then show ?thesis
        using cons.prems(1) P lemma_1_reachability_s_i
        by blast
    next
      case b
      then obtain x'' where i:
        "x'' ‚àà state_set (state_list (state_succ s a) as)"
        "x = last (s # x'')"
        by blast
      then show ?thesis
      proof (cases "x''")
        case Nil
        then have "x = s"
          using i
          by fastforce
        then show ?thesis
          using cons.prems(1) lemma_1_reachability_s_i
          by blast
      next
        case (Cons a' list)
        then obtain x' where a:
          "last (a' # list) = last x'" "x' ‚àà state_set (state_list (state_succ s a) as)"
          using i(1)
          by blast
        {
          have "state_succ s a ‚àà valid_states PROB"
            using cons.prems(1, 2) valid_action_valid_succ valid_plan_valid_head
            by metis
          moreover have "as ‚àà valid_plans PROB"
            using cons.prems(2) valid_plan_valid_tail
            by fast
          ultimately have
            "last ` state_set (state_list (state_succ s a) as) ‚äÜ reachable_s PROB (state_succ s a)"
            using cons.IH[of "state_succ s a"]
            by auto
          then have "‚àÉas'.
                  last (a' # list) = exec_plan (state_succ s a) as' ‚àß (as' ‚àà (valid_plans PROB))"
            unfolding state_set.simps state_list.simps reachable_s_def
            using i(1) Cons
            by blast
        }
        then obtain as' where b:
          "last (a' # list) = exec_plan (state_succ s a) as'" "(as' ‚àà (valid_plans PROB))"
          by blast
        then have "x = exec_plan (state_succ s a) as'"
          using i(2) Cons a(1)
          by auto
        then show ?thesis unfolding reachable_s_def
          using cons.prems(2) b(2)
          by (metis (mono_tags, lifting)  exec_plan.simps(2) mem_Collect_eq
              valid_head_and_tail_valid_plan valid_plan_valid_head)
      qed
    qed
  }
  then show ?case
    by blast
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE types for `PROB` and `s` had to be fixed for use of `lemma\_1\_reachability\_s`.‚Ä∫
lemma not_eq_last_diff_paths_reachability_s:
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem" and s :: "'a state" and as
  assumes "s ‚àà valid_states PROB" "as ‚àà valid_plans PROB"
    "¬¨(inj last (state_set (state_list s as)) (reachable_s PROB s))"
  shows "(‚àÉslist_1 slist_2.
    slist_1 ‚àà state_set (state_list s as)
    ‚àß slist_2 ‚àà state_set (state_list s as)
    ‚àß (last slist_1 = last slist_2)
    ‚àß ¬¨(length slist_1 = length slist_2)
  )"
proof -
  {
    fix x
    assume P1: "x ‚àà state_set (state_list s as)"
    have a: "last ` state_set (state_list s as) ‚äÜ reachable_s PROB s"
      using assms(1, 2) lemma_1_reachability_s
      by fast
    then have "‚àÄas PROB. s ‚àà (valid_states PROB) ‚àß as ‚àà (valid_plans PROB) ‚ü∂ (last ` (state_set (state_list s as)) ‚äÜ reachable_s PROB s)"
      using lemma_1_reachability_s
      by fast
    then have "last x ‚àà valid_states PROB"
      using assms(1, 2) P1 lemma_1
      by fast
    then have "last x ‚àà reachable_s PROB s"
      using P1 a
      by fast
  }
  note 1 = this
  text ‚Äπ Show the goal by disproving the contradiction. ‚Ä∫
  {
    assume C: "(‚àÄslist_1 slist_2. (slist_1 ‚àà state_set (state_list s as)
      ‚àß slist_2 ‚àà state_set (state_list s as)
      ‚àß (last slist_1 = last slist_2)) ‚ü∂ (length slist_1 = length slist_2))"
    moreover {
      fix slist_1 slist_2
      assume C1: "slist_1 ‚àà state_set (state_list s as)" "slist_2 ‚àà state_set (state_list s as)"
        "(last slist_1 = last slist_2)"
      moreover have i: "(length slist_1 = length slist_2)"
        using C1 C
        by blast
      moreover have "slist_1 = slist_2"
        using C1(1, 2) i neq_mems_state_set_neq_len
        by auto
      ultimately have "inj_on last (state_set (state_list s as))"
        unfolding inj_on_def
        using C neq_mems_state_set_neq_len
        by blast
      then have False
        using 1 inj_def assms(3)
        by blast
    }
    ultimately have False
      by (metis empty_state_list_lemma nempty_sl_in_state_set)
  }
  then show ?thesis
    by blast
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma ( translation of `PHP` in pred\_setScript.sml:3155).‚Ä∫
lemma lemma_2_reachability_s_i:
  fixes f :: "'a ‚áí 'b" and s t
  assumes "finite t" "card t < card s"
  shows "¬¨(inj f s t)"
proof -
  {
    assume C: "inj f s t"
    then have 1: "(‚àÄx‚ààs. f x ‚àà t)" "inj_on f s"
      unfolding inj_def
      by blast+
    moreover {
      have "f ` s ‚äÜ t"
        using 1
        by fast
      then have "card (f ` s) ‚â§ card t"
        using assms(1) card_mono
        by auto
    }
    moreover have "card (f ` s) = card s"
      using 1 card_image
      by fast
    ultimately have False
      using assms(2)
      by linarith
  }
  then show ?thesis
    by blast
qed

lemma lemma_2_reachability_s:
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem" and as s
  assumes "finite PROB" "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)" "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
    "(length as > card (reachable_s PROB s) - 1)"
  shows "(‚àÉas1 as2 as3.
    (as1 @ as2 @ as3 = as) ‚àß (exec_plan s (as1 @ as2) = exec_plan s as1) ‚àß ¬¨(as2 = []))"
proof -
  {
    have "Suc (length as) > card (reachable_s PROB s)"
      using assms(4)
      by fastforce
    then have "card (state_set (state_list s as)) > card (reachable_s PROB s)"
      using card_state_set
      by metis
  }
  note 1 = this
  {
    have "finite (reachable_s PROB s)"
      using assms(1, 2) reachable_s_finite_thm
      by blast
    then have "¬¨(inj last (state_set (state_list s as)) (reachable_s PROB s))"
      using assms(4) 1 lemma_2_reachability_s_i
      by blast
  }
  note 2 = this
  obtain slist_1 slist_2 where 3:
    "slist_1 ‚àà state_set (state_list s as)" "slist_2 ‚àà state_set (state_list s as)"
    "(last slist_1 = last slist_2)" "length slist_1 ‚â† length slist_2"
    using assms(2, 3) 2 not_eq_last_diff_paths_reachability_s
    by blast
  then show ?thesis using assms
  proof(cases as)
    case (Cons a list)
    then show ?thesis
      using assms(2, 3) 3 eq_last_state_imp_append_nempty_as state_set_thm list.distinct(1)
      by metis
  qed force
qed


lemma lemma_3_reachability_s:
  fixes as and PROB :: "'a problem" and s
  assumes "finite PROB" "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)" "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
    "(length as > (card (reachable_s PROB s) - 1))"
  shows "(‚àÉas'.
    (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as')
    ‚àß (length as' < length as)
    ‚àß (subseq as' as)
  )"
proof -
  obtain as1 as2 as3 :: "'a action list" where 1:
    "(as1 @ as2 @ as3 = as)" "(exec_plan s (as1 @ as2) = exec_plan s as1)" "~(as2=[])"
    using assms lemma_2_reachability_s
    by metis
  then have "(exec_plan s (as1 @ as2) = exec_plan s as1)"
    using 1
    by blast
  then have 2: "exec_plan s (as1 @ as3) = exec_plan s (as1 @ as2 @ as3)"
    using 1 cycle_removal_lemma
    by fastforce
  let ?as' = "as1 @ as3"
  have 3: "exec_plan s as = exec_plan s ?as'"
    using 1 2
    by argo
  then have "as2 ‚â† []"
    using 1
    by blast
  then have 4: "length ?as' < length as"
    using nempty_list_append_length_add 1
    by blast
  then have "subseq ?as' as"
    using 1 subseq_append'
    by blast
  then show ?thesis
    using 3 4
    by blast
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE type for `as` had to be fixed (type mismatch in goal).‚Ä∫
lemma main_lemma_reachability_s:
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem" and as and s :: "'a state"
  assumes "finite PROB" "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)" "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
  shows "(‚àÉas'.
      (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as') ‚àß subseq as' as
      ‚àß (length as' ‚â§ (card (reachable_s PROB s) - 1)))"
proof (cases "length as ‚â§ card (reachable_s PROB s) - 1")
  case False
  let ?as' = "as"
  have "length as > card (reachable_s PROB s) - 1"
    using False
    by simp
  {
    fix p
    assume P: "exec_plan s as = exec_plan s p" "subseq p as"
      "card (reachable_s PROB s) - 1 < length p"
    moreover have "p ‚àà valid_plans PROB"
      using assms(3) P(2) sublist_valid_is_valid
      by blast
    ultimately obtain as' where 1:
      "exec_plan s p = exec_plan s as'" "length as' < length p" "subseq as' p"
      using assms lemma_3_reachability_s
      by blast
    then have "exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as'"
      using P
      by presburger
    moreover have "subseq as' as"
      using P 1 sublist_trans
      by blast
    ultimately have "(‚àÉp'. (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s p' ‚àß subseq p' as) ‚àß length p' < length p)"
      using 1
      by blast
  }
  then have "‚àÄp.
      exec_plan s as = exec_plan s p ‚àß subseq p as
      ‚ü∂ (‚àÉp'.
        (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s p' ‚àß subseq p' as)
        ‚àß length p' ‚â§ card (reachable_s PROB s) - 1)"
    using general_theorem[of "Œªas''. (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as'') ‚àß subseq as'' as"
        "(card (reachable_s (PROB :: 'a problem) (s :: 'a state)) - 1)" length]
    by blast
  then show ?thesis
    by blast
qed blast


lemma reachable_s_non_empty: "¬¨(reachable_s PROB s = {})"
  using empty_plan_is_valid reachable_s_def
  by blast


lemma card_reachable_s_non_zero:
  fixes s
  assumes "finite (PROB :: 'a problem)" "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)"
  shows "(0 < card (reachable_s PROB s))"
  using assms
  by (simp add: card_gt_0_iff reachable_s_finite_thm reachable_s_non_empty)


lemma exec_fdom_empty_prob:
  fixes s
  assumes "(prob_dom PROB = {})" "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)" "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
  shows "(exec_plan s as = fmempty)"
proof -
  have "fmdom' s = {}"
    using assms(1, 2)
    by (simp add: valid_states_def)
  then show "exec_plan s as = fmempty"
    using assms(1, 3)
    by (metis
        exec_plan_fdom_subset fmrestrict_set_dom fmrestrict_set_null subset_empty
        sup_bot.left_neutral)
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE types for `PROB` and `s` had to be fixed (type mismatch in goal).‚Ä∫
lemma reachable_s_empty_prob:
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem" and s :: "'a state"
  assumes "(prob_dom PROB = {})" "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)"
  shows "((reachable_s PROB s) ‚äÜ {fmempty})"
proof -
  {
    fix x
    assume P1: "x ‚àà reachable_s PROB s"
    then obtain as :: "'a action list" where a:
      "as ‚àà valid_plans PROB" "x = exec_plan s as"
      using reachable_s_def
      by blast
    then have "as ‚àà valid_plans PROB" "x = exec_plan s as"
      using a
      by auto
    then have "x = fmempty" using assms(1, 2) exec_fdom_empty_prob
      by blast
  }
  then show "((reachable_s PROB s) ‚äÜ {fmempty})"
    by blast
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE this is semantically equivalent to `sublist\_valid\_is\_valid`.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE Renamed to 'sublist\_valid\_plan\_alt' because another lemma by the same name is declared
later.‚Ä∫
lemma sublist_valid_plan__alt:
  assumes "(as1 ‚àà valid_plans PROB)" "(subseq as2 as1)"
  shows "(as2 ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
  using assms
  by (auto simp add: sublist_valid_is_valid)


lemma fmsubset_eq:
  assumes "s1 ‚äÜ‚á©f s2"
  shows "(‚àÄa. a |‚àà| fmdom s1 ‚ü∂ fmlookup s1 a = fmlookup s2 a)"
  using assms
  by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) domIff fmdom_notI fmsubset.rep_eq map_le_def)


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO refactor/move into 'FmapUtils.thy'.‚Ä∫
lemma submap_imp_state_succ_submap_a:
  assumes "s1 ‚äÜ‚á©f s2" "s2 ‚äÜ‚á©f s3"
  shows "s1 ‚äÜ‚á©f s3"
  using assms fmsubset.rep_eq map_le_trans
  by blast


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO refactor into FmapUtils?‚Ä∫
lemma submap_imp_state_succ_submap_b:
  assumes "s1 ‚äÜ‚á©f s2"
  shows "(s0 ++ s1) ‚äÜ‚á©f (s0 ++ s2)"
proof -
  {
    assume C: "¬¨((s0 ++ s1) ‚äÜ‚á©f (s0 ++ s2))"
    then have 1: "(s0 ++ s1) = (s1 ++‚á©f s0)"
      using fmap_add_ltr_def
      by blast
    then have 2: "(s0 ++ s2) = (s2 ++‚á©f s0)"
      using fmap_add_ltr_def
      by auto
    then obtain a where 3:
      "a |‚àà| fmdom (s1 ++‚á©f s0) ‚àß fmlookup (s1 ++‚á©f s0) ‚â† fmlookup (s2 ++‚á©f s0)"
      using C 1 2 fmsubset.rep_eq domIff fmdom_notD map_le_def
      by (metis (no_types, lifting))
    then have False
      using assms(1) C proof (cases "a |‚àà| fmdom s1")
      case True
      moreover have "fmlookup s1 a = fmlookup s2 a"
        by (meson assms(1) calculation fmsubset_eq)
      moreover have "fmlookup (s0 ++‚á©f s1) a = fmlookup s1 a"
        by (simp add: True)
      moreover have "a |‚àà| fmdom s2"
        using True calculation(2) fmdom_notD by fastforce
      moreover have "fmlookup (s0 ++‚á©f s2) a = fmlookup s2 a"
        by (simp add: calculation(4))
      moreover have "fmlookup (s0 ++‚á©f s1) a = fmlookup (s0 ++‚á©f s2) a"
        using calculation(2, 3, 5)
        by auto
      ultimately show ?thesis
        by (smt "1" "2" C assms domIff fmlookup_add fmsubset.rep_eq map_le_def)
    next
      case False
      moreover have "fmlookup (s0 ++‚á©f s1) a = fmlookup s0 a"
        by (auto simp add: False)
      ultimately show ?thesis proof (cases "a |‚àà| fmdom s0")
        case True
        have "a |‚àâ| fmdom (s1 ++‚á©f s0)"
          by (smt "1" "2" C UnE assms dom_map_add fmadd.rep_eq fmsubset.rep_eq map_add_def
              map_add_dom_app_simps(1) map_le_def)
        then show ?thesis
          using 3 by blast
      next
        case False
        then have "a |‚àâ| fmdom (s1 ++‚á©f s0)"
          using ‚Äπfmlookup (s0 ++‚á©f s1) a = fmlookup s0 a‚Ä∫
          by force
        then show ?thesis
          using 3
          by blast
      qed
    qed
  }
  then show ?thesis
    by blast
qed

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE type for `a` had to be fixed (type mismatch in goal).‚Ä∫
lemma submap_imp_state_succ_submap:
  fixes a :: "'a action" and s1 s2
  assumes "(fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s1)" "(s1 ‚äÜ‚á©f s2)"
  shows "(state_succ s1 a ‚äÜ‚á©f state_succ s2 a)"
proof -
  have 1: "state_succ s1 a = (snd a ++ s1)"
    using assms(1)
    by (simp add: state_succ_def)
  then have "fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s2"
    using assms(1, 2) submap_imp_state_succ_submap_a
    by auto
  then have 2: "state_succ s2 a = (snd a ++ s2)"
    using 1 state_succ_def
    by metis
  then have "snd a ++ s1 ‚äÜ‚á©f snd a ++ s2"
    using assms(2) submap_imp_state_succ_submap_b
    by fast
  then show ?thesis
    using 1 2
    by argo
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE types for `a`, `s1` and `s2` had to be fixed (type mismatch in goal).‚Ä∫
lemma pred_dom_subset_succ_submap:
  fixes a :: "'a action" and s1 s2 :: "'a state"
  assumes "(fmdom' (fst a) ‚äÜ fmdom' s1)" "(s1 ‚äÜ‚á©f s2)"
  shows "(state_succ s1 a ‚äÜ‚á©f state_succ s2 a)"
  using assms
  unfolding state_succ_def
proof (auto)
  assume P1: "fmdom' (fst a) ‚äÜ fmdom' s1" "s1 ‚äÜ‚á©f s2" "fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s1" "fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s2"
  then show "snd a ++ s1 ‚äÜ‚á©f snd a ++ s2"
    using submap_imp_state_succ_submap_b
    by fast
next
  assume P2: "fmdom' (fst a) ‚äÜ fmdom' s1" "s1 ‚äÜ‚á©f s2" "fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s1" "¬¨ fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s2"
  then show "snd a ++ s1 ‚äÜ‚á©f s2"
    using submap_imp_state_succ_submap_a
    by blast
next
  assume P3: "fmdom' (fst a) ‚äÜ fmdom' s1" "s1 ‚äÜ‚á©f s2" "¬¨ fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s1" "fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s2"
  {
    have a: "fmlookup s1 ‚äÜ‚á©m fmlookup s2"
      using P3(2) fmsubset.rep_eq
      by blast
    {
      have "¬¨(fmlookup (fst a) ‚äÜ‚á©m fmlookup s1)"
        using P3(3) fmsubset.rep_eq
        by blast
      then have "‚àÉv ‚àà dom (fmlookup (fst a)). fmlookup (fst a) v ‚â† fmlookup s1 v"
        using map_le_def
        by fast
    }
    then obtain v where b: "v ‚àà dom (fmlookup (fst a))" "fmlookup (fst a) v ‚â† fmlookup s1 v"
      by blast
    then have "fmlookup (fst a) v ‚â† fmlookup s2 v"
      using assms(1) a  contra_subsetD fmdom'.rep_eq map_le_def
      by metis
    then have "¬¨(fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s2)"
      using b fmsubset.rep_eq map_le_def
      by metis
  }
  then show "s1 ‚äÜ‚á©f snd a ++ s2"
    using P3(4)
    by simp
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO refactor.‚Ä∫
lemma valid_as_submap_init_submap_exec_i:
  fixes s a
  shows "fmdom' s ‚äÜ fmdom' (state_succ s a)"
proof (cases "fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s")
  case True
  then have "state_succ s a = s ++‚á©f (snd a)"
    unfolding state_succ_def
    using fmap_add_ltr_def
    by auto
  then have "fmdom' (state_succ s a) = fmdom' s ‚à™ fmdom' (snd a)"
    using fmdom'_add
    by simp
  then show ?thesis
    by simp
next
  case False
  then show ?thesis
    unfolding state_succ_def
    by simp
qed

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE types for `s1` and `s2` had to be fixed in order to apply `pred\_dom\_subset\_succ\_submap`.‚Ä∫
lemma valid_as_submap_init_submap_exec:
  fixes s1 s2 :: "'a state"
  assumes "(s1 ‚äÜ‚á©f s2) " "(‚àÄa. ListMem a as ‚ü∂ (fmdom' (fst a) ‚äÜ fmdom' s1))"
  shows "(exec_plan s1 as ‚äÜ‚á©f exec_plan s2 as)"
  using assms
proof (induction as arbitrary: s1 s2)
  case (Cons a as)
  {
    have "ListMem a (a # as)"
      using elem
      by fast
    then have "fmdom' (fst a) ‚äÜ fmdom' s1"
      using Cons.prems(2)
      by blast
    then have "state_succ s1 a ‚äÜ‚á©f state_succ s2 a"
      using Cons.prems(1) pred_dom_subset_succ_submap
      by fast
  }
  note 1 = this
  {
    fix b
    assume "ListMem b as"
    then have "ListMem b (a # as)"
      using insert
      by fast
    then have a: "fmdom' (fst b) ‚äÜ fmdom' s1"
      using Cons.prems(2)
      by blast
    then have "fmdom' s1 ‚äÜ fmdom' (state_succ s1 a)"
      using valid_as_submap_init_submap_exec_i
      by metis
    then have "fmdom' (fst b) ‚äÜ fmdom' (state_succ s1 a)"
      using a
      by simp
  }
  then show ?case
    using 1 Cons.IH[of "(state_succ s1 a)" "(state_succ s2 a)"]
    by fastforce
qed auto


lemma valid_plan_mems:
  assumes "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)" "(ListMem a as)"
  shows "a ‚àà PROB"
  using assms ListMem_iff in_set_conv_decomp valid_append_valid_suff valid_plan_valid_head
  by (metis)


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE typing moved into 'fixes' due to type mismatches when using lemma.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE showcase (this can't be used due to type problems when the type is specified within
proposition.‚Ä∫
lemma valid_states_nempty:
  fixes PROB :: "(('a, 'b) fmap √ó ('a, 'b) fmap) set"
  assumes "finite PROB"
  shows "‚àÉs. s ‚àà (valid_states PROB)"
  unfolding valid_states_def
  using fmchoice'[OF FINITE_prob_dom[OF assms], where Q = "Œª_ _. True"]
  by auto


lemma empty_prob_dom_single_val_state:
  assumes "(prob_dom PROB = {})"
  shows "(‚àÉs. valid_states PROB = {s})"
proof -
  {
    assume C: "¬¨(‚àÉs. valid_states PROB = {s})"
    then have "valid_states PROB = {s. fmdom' s = {}}"
      using assms
      by (simp add: valid_states_def)
    then have "‚àÉs. valid_states PROB = {s}"
      using empty_domain_fmap_set
      by blast
    then have False
      using C
      by blast
  }
  then show ?thesis
    by blast
qed


lemma empty_prob_dom_imp_empty_plan_always_good:
  fixes PROB s
  assumes "(prob_dom PROB = {})" "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)" "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
  shows "(exec_plan s [] = exec_plan s as)"
  using assms empty_plan_is_valid exec_fdom_empty_prob
  by fastforce


lemma empty_prob_dom:
  fixes PROB
  assumes "(prob_dom PROB = {})"
  shows "(PROB = {(fmempty, fmempty)} ‚à® PROB = {})"
  using assms
proof (cases "PROB = {}")
  case False
  have "‚ãÉ((Œª(s1, s2). fmdom' s1 ‚à™ fmdom' s2) ` PROB) = {}"
    using assms
    by (simp add: prob_dom_def action_dom_def)
  then have 1:"‚àÄa‚ààPROB. (Œª(s1, s2). fmdom' s1 ‚à™ fmdom' s2) a = {}"
    using  Union_empty_conv
    by auto
  {
    fix a
    assume P1: "a‚ààPROB"
    then have "(Œª(s1, s2). fmdom' s1 ‚à™ fmdom' s2) a = {}"
      using 1
      by simp
    then have a: "fmdom' (fst a) = {}" "fmdom' (snd a) = {}"
      by auto+
    then have b: "fst a = fmempty"
      using fmrestrict_set_dom fmrestrict_set_null
      by metis
    then have "snd a = fmempty"
      using a(2) fmrestrict_set_dom fmrestrict_set_null
      by metis
    then have "a = (fmempty, fmempty)"
      using b surjective_pairing
      by metis
  }
  then have "PROB = {(fmempty, fmempty)}"
    using False
    by blast
  then show ?thesis
    by blast
qed simp


lemma empty_prob_dom_finite:
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem"
  assumes "prob_dom PROB = {}"
  shows "finite PROB"
proof -
  consider (i) "PROB = {(fmempty, fmempty)}" | (ii) "PROB = {}"
    using assms empty_prob_dom
    by auto
  then show ?thesis by (cases) auto
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE type for `a` had to be fixed (type mismatch in goal).‚Ä∫
lemma disj_imp_eq_proj_exec:
  fixes a :: "('a, 'b) fmap √ó ('a, 'b) fmap" and vs s
  assumes "(fmdom' (snd a) ‚à© vs) = {}"
  shows "(fmrestrict_set vs s = fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s a))"
proof -
  have "disjnt (fmdom' (snd a)) vs"
    using assms disjnt_def
    by fast
  then show ?thesis
    using disj_dom_drest_fupdate_eq state_succ_pair surjective_pairing
    by metis
qed


lemma no_change_vs_eff_submap:
  fixes a vs s
  assumes "(fmrestrict_set vs s = fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s a))" "(fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s)"
  shows "(fmrestrict_set vs (snd a) ‚äÜ‚á©f (fmrestrict_set vs s))"
proof -
  {
    fix x
    assume P3: "x ‚àà dom (fmlookup (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)))"
    then have "(fmlookup (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a))) x = (fmlookup (fmrestrict_set vs s)) x"
    proof (cases "fmlookup (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) x")
      case None
      then show ?thesis using P3 by blast
    next
      case (Some y)
      then have "fmrestrict_set vs s = fmrestrict_set vs (s ++‚á©f snd a)"
        using assms
        by (simp add: state_succ_def fmap_add_ltr_def)
      then have "fmlookup (fmrestrict_set vs s) = fmlookup (fmrestrict_set vs (s ++‚á©f snd a))"
        by auto
      then have 1: "
            fmlookup (fmrestrict_set vs s) x
            = (if x ‚àà vs then fmlookup (s ++‚á©f snd a) x else None)
          "
        using fmlookup_restrict_set
        by metis
      then show ?thesis
      proof (cases "x ‚àà vs")
        case True
        then have "fmlookup (fmrestrict_set vs s) x = fmlookup (s ++‚á©f snd a) x"
          using True 1
          by auto
        then show ?thesis
          using Some fmadd.rep_eq fmlookup_restrict_set map_add_Some_iff
          by (metis (mono_tags, lifting))
      next
        case False
        then have 1: "fmlookup (fmrestrict_set vs s) x = None"
          using False "1"
          by auto
        then show ?thesis
          using 1 False
          by auto
      qed
    qed
  }
  then have "(fmlookup (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) ‚äÜ‚á©m fmlookup (fmrestrict_set vs s))"
    using map_le_def
    by blast
  then show ?thesis
    using fmsubset.rep_eq
    by blast
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE type of `a` had to be fixed.‚Ä∫
lemma sat_precond_as_proj_3:
  fixes s and a :: "('a, 'b) fmap √ó ('a, 'b) fmap" and vs
  assumes "(fmdom' (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) = {})"
  shows "((fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s a)) = (fmrestrict_set vs s))"
proof -
  have "fmdom' (fmrestrict_set vs (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a))) = {}"
    using assms fmrestrict_set_dom fmrestrict_set_empty fmrestrict_set_null
    by metis
  {
    fix x
    assume C: "x ‚àà fmdom' (snd a) ‚àß x ‚àà vs"
    then have a: "x ‚àà fmdom' (snd a)" "x ‚àà vs"
      using C
      by blast+
    then have "fmlookup (snd a) x ‚â† None"
      using fmdom'_notI
      by metis
    then have "fmlookup (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) x ‚â† None"
      using a(2)
      by force
    then have "x ‚àà fmdom' (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a))"
      using fmdom'_notD
      by metis
    then have "fmdom' (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) ‚â† {}"
      by blast
    then have False
      using assms
      by blast
  }
  then have "‚àÄx. ¬¨(x ‚àà fmdom' (snd a) ‚àß x ‚àà vs)"
    by blast
  then have 1: "fmdom' (snd a) ‚à© vs = {}"
    by blast
  have "disjnt (fmdom' (snd a)) vs"
    using 1 disjnt_def
    by blast
  then show ?thesis
    using 1 disj_imp_eq_proj_exec
    by metis
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE type for `a` had to be fixed (type mismatch in goal).‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO showcase (quick win with simp).‚Ä∫
lemma proj_eq_proj_exec_eq:
  fixes s s' vs and a :: "('a, 'b) fmap √ó ('a, 'b) fmap" and a'
  assumes "((fmrestrict_set vs s) = (fmrestrict_set vs s'))" "((fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s) = (fst a' ‚äÜ‚á©f s'))"
    "(fmrestrict_set vs (snd a) = fmrestrict_set vs (snd a'))"
  shows "(fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s a) = fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s' a'))"
  using assms
  by (simp add: fmap_add_ltr_def state_succ_def)


lemma empty_eff_exec_eq:
  fixes s a
  assumes "(fmdom' (snd a) = {})"
  shows "(state_succ s a = s)"
  using assms
  unfolding state_succ_def fmap_add_ltr_def
  by (metis fmadd_empty(2) fmrestrict_set_dom fmrestrict_set_null)


lemma exec_as_proj_valid_2:
  fixes a
  assumes "a ‚àà PROB"
  shows "(action_dom (fst a) (snd a) ‚äÜ prob_dom PROB)"
  using assms
  by (simp add: FDOM_eff_subset_prob_dom_pair FDOM_pre_subset_prob_dom_pair action_dom_def)


lemma valid_filter_valid_as:
  assumes "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
  shows "(filter P as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
  using assms
  by(auto simp: valid_plans_def)


lemma sublist_valid_plan:
  assumes "(subseq as' as)" "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
  shows "(as' ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
  using assms
  by (auto simp: valid_plans_def) (meson fset_mp fset_of_list_elem sublist_subset subsetCE)


lemma prob_subset_dom_subset:
  assumes "PROB1 ‚äÜ PROB2"
  shows "(prob_dom PROB1 ‚äÜ prob_dom PROB2)"
  using assms
  by (auto simp add: prob_dom_def)


lemma state_succ_valid_act_disjoint:
  assumes "(a ‚àà PROB)" "(vs ‚à© (prob_dom PROB) = {})"
  shows "(fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s a) = fmrestrict_set vs s)"
  using assms
  by (smt
      FDOM_eff_subset_prob_dom_pair disj_imp_eq_proj_exec inf.absorb1
      inf_bot_right inf_commute inf_left_commute
      )


lemma exec_valid_as_disjoint:
  fixes s
  assumes "(vs ‚à© (prob_dom PROB) = {})" "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
  shows "(fmrestrict_set vs (exec_plan s as) = fmrestrict_set vs s)"
  using assms
proof (induction as arbitrary: s vs PROB)
  case (Cons a as)
  then show ?case
    by (metis exec_plan.simps(2) state_succ_valid_act_disjoint valid_plan_valid_head
        valid_plan_valid_tail)
qed simp


definition state_successors where
  "state_successors PROB s ‚â° ((state_succ s ` PROB) - {s})"


subsection "State Spaces"


definition stateSpace where
  "stateSpace ss vs ‚â° (‚àÄs. s ‚àà ss ‚ü∂ (fmdom' s = vs))"


lemma EQ_SS_DOM:
  assumes "¬¨(ss = {})" "(stateSpace ss vs1)" "(stateSpace ss vs2)"
  shows "(vs1 = vs2)"
  using assms
  by (auto simp: stateSpace_def)


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE Name 'dom' changed to 'domain' because of name clash with 'Map.dom'.‚Ä∫
lemma FINITE_SS:
  fixes ss :: "('a, bool) fmap set"
  assumes "¬¨(ss = {})" "(stateSpace ss domain)"
  shows "finite ss"
proof -
  have 1: "stateSpace ss domain = (‚àÄs. s ‚àà ss ‚ü∂ (fmdom' s = domain))"
    by (simp add: stateSpace_def)
  {
    fix s
    assume P1: "s ‚àà ss"
    have "fmdom' s = domain"
      using assms 1 P1
      by blast
    then have "s ‚àà {s. fmdom' s = domain}"
      by auto
  }
  then have 2: "ss ‚äÜ {s. fmdom' s = domain}"
    by blast
      ‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO add lemma (finite (fmdom' s))‚Ä∫
  then have "finite domain"
    using 1 assms
    by fastforce
  then have "finite {s :: 'a state. fmdom' s = domain}"
    using FINITE_states
    by blast
  then show ?thesis
    using 2 finite_subset
    by auto
qed


lemma disjoint_effects_no_effects:
  fixes s
  assumes "(‚àÄa. ListMem a as ‚ü∂ (fmdom' (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) = {}))"
  shows "(fmrestrict_set vs (exec_plan s as) = (fmrestrict_set vs s))"
  using assms
proof (induction as arbitrary: s vs)
  case (Cons a as)
  then have "ListMem a (a # as)"
    using elem
    by fast
  then have "fmdom' (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) = {}"
    using Cons.prems(1)
    by blast
  then have "fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s a) = fmrestrict_set vs s"
    using sat_precond_as_proj_3
    by blast
  then show ?case
    by (simp add: Cons.IH Cons.prems insert)
qed auto


subsection "Needed Asses"


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE name shortened.‚Ä∫
definition action_needed_vars where
  "action_needed_vars a s ‚â° {v. (v ‚àà fmdom' s) ‚àß (v ‚àà fmdom' (fst a))
    ‚àß (fmlookup (fst a) v = fmlookup s v)}"
  ‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE name shortened to 'action\_needed\_asses'.‚Ä∫
definition action_needed_asses where
  "action_needed_asses a s ‚â° fmrestrict_set (action_needed_vars a s) s"


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE type for 'a' had to be fixed (type mismatch in goal).‚Ä∫
lemma act_needed_asses_submap_succ_submap:
  fixes a s1 s2
  assumes "(action_needed_asses a s2 ‚äÜ‚á©f action_needed_asses a s1)" "(s1 ‚äÜ‚á©f s2)"
  shows "(state_succ s1 a ‚äÜ‚á©f state_succ s2 a)"
  using assms
  unfolding state_succ_def
proof (auto)
  assume P1: "action_needed_asses a s2 ‚äÜ‚á©f action_needed_asses a s1" "s1 ‚äÜ‚á©f s2" "fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s1"
    "fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s2"
  then show "snd a ++ s1 ‚äÜ‚á©f snd a ++ s2"
    using submap_imp_state_succ_submap_b
    by blast
next
  assume P2: "action_needed_asses a s2 ‚äÜ‚á©f action_needed_asses a s1" "s1 ‚äÜ‚á©f s2" "fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s1"
    "¬¨ fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s2"
  then show "snd a ++ s1 ‚äÜ‚á©f s2"
    using submap_imp_state_succ_submap_a
    by blast
next
  assume P3: "action_needed_asses a s2 ‚äÜ‚á©f action_needed_asses a s1" "s1 ‚äÜ‚á©f s2" "¬¨ fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s1"
    "fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s2"
  let ?vs1="{v ‚àà fmdom' s1. v ‚àà fmdom' (fst a) ‚àß fmlookup (fst a) v = fmlookup s1 v}"
  let ?vs2="{v ‚àà fmdom' s2. v ‚àà fmdom' (fst a) ‚àß fmlookup (fst a) v = fmlookup s2 v}"
  let ?f="fmrestrict_set ?vs1 s1"
  let ?g="fmrestrict_set ?vs2 s2"
  have 1: "fmdom' ?f = ?vs1" "fmdom' ?g = ?vs2"
    unfolding action_needed_asses_def action_needed_vars_def fmdom'_restrict_set_precise
    by blast+
  have 2: "fmlookup ?g ‚äÜ‚á©m fmlookup ?f"
    using P3(1)
    unfolding action_needed_asses_def action_needed_vars_def
    using fmsubset.rep_eq
    by blast
  {
    {
      fix v
      assume P3_1: "v ‚àà fmdom' ?g"
      then have "v ‚àà fmdom' s2" "v ‚àà fmdom' (fst a)" "fmlookup (fst a) v = fmlookup s2 v"
        using 1
        by simp+
      then have "fmlookup (fst a) v = fmlookup ?g v"
        by simp
      then have "fmlookup (fst a) v = fmlookup ?f v"
        using 2
        by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) P3_1 domIff fmdom'_notI map_le_def)
    }
    then have i: "fmlookup (fst a) ‚äÜ‚á©m fmlookup ?f"
      using P3(4) 1(2)
      by (smt domIff fmdom'_notD fmsubset.rep_eq map_le_def mem_Collect_eq)
    {
      fix v
      assume P3_2: "v ‚àà dom (fmlookup (fst a))"
      then have "fmlookup (fst a) v = fmlookup ?f v"
        using i
        by (meson domIff fmdom'_notI map_le_def)
      then have "v ‚àà ?vs1"
        using P3_2 1(1)
        by (metis (no_types, lifting) domIff fmdom'_notD)
      then have "fmlookup (fst a) v = fmlookup s1 v"
        by blast
    }
    then have "fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s1"
      by (simp add: map_le_def fmsubset.rep_eq)
  }
  then show "s1 ‚äÜ‚á©f snd a ++ s2"
    using P3(3)
    by simp
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO refactor.‚Ä∫
lemma as_needed_asses_submap_exec_i:
  fixes a s
  assumes "v ‚àà fmdom' (action_needed_asses a s)"
  shows "
    fmlookup (action_needed_asses a s) v = fmlookup s v
    ‚àß fmlookup (action_needed_asses a s) v = fmlookup (fst a) v"
  using assms
  unfolding action_needed_asses_def action_needed_vars_def
  using fmdom'_notI fmlookup_restrict_set
  by (smt mem_Collect_eq)

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO refactor.‚Ä∫
lemma as_needed_asses_submap_exec_ii:
  fixes f g v
  assumes "v ‚àà fmdom' f" "f ‚äÜ‚á©f g"
  shows "fmlookup f v = fmlookup g v"
  using assms
  by (meson fmdom'_notI fmdom_notD fmsubset_eq)

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO refactor.‚Ä∫
lemma as_needed_asses_submap_exec_iii:
  fixes f g v
  shows "
    fmdom' (action_needed_asses a s)
    = {v ‚àà fmdom' s. v ‚àà fmdom' (fst a) ‚àß fmlookup (fst a) v = fmlookup s v}"
  unfolding action_needed_asses_def action_needed_vars_def
  by (simp add: Set.filter_def fmfilter_alt_defs(4))

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
lemma as_needed_asses_submap_exec_iv:
  fixes f a v
  assumes "v ‚àà fmdom' (action_needed_asses a s)"
  shows "
    fmlookup (action_needed_asses a s) v = fmlookup s v
    ‚àß fmlookup (action_needed_asses a s) v = fmlookup (fst a) v
    ‚àß fmlookup (fst a) v = fmlookup s v"
  using assms
proof -
  have 1: "v ‚àà {v ‚àà fmdom' s. v ‚àà fmdom' (fst a) ‚àß fmlookup (fst a) v = fmlookup s v}"
    using assms as_needed_asses_submap_exec_iii
    by metis
  then have 2: "fmlookup (action_needed_asses a s) v = fmlookup s v"
    unfolding action_needed_asses_def action_needed_vars_def
    by force
  moreover have 3: "fmlookup (action_needed_asses a s) v = fmlookup (fst a) v"
    using 1 2
    by simp
  moreover have "fmlookup (fst a) v = fmlookup s v"
    using 2 3
    by argo
  ultimately show ?thesis
    by blast
qed

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO refactor (into Fmap\_Utils.thy).‚Ä∫
lemma as_needed_asses_submap_exec_v:
  fixes f g v
  assumes "v ‚àà fmdom' f" "f ‚äÜ‚á©f g"
  shows "v ‚àà fmdom' g"
proof -
  obtain b where 1: "fmlookup f v = b" "b ‚â† None"
    using assms(1)
    by (meson fmdom'_notI)
  then have "fmlookup g v = b"
    using as_needed_asses_submap_exec_ii[OF assms]
    by argo
  then show ?thesis
    using 1 fmdom'_notD
    by fastforce
qed

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO refactor.‚Ä∫
lemma as_needed_asses_submap_exec_vi:
  fixes a s1 s2 v
  assumes "v ‚àà fmdom' (action_needed_asses a s1)"
    "(action_needed_asses a s1) ‚äÜ‚á©f (action_needed_asses a s2)"
  shows
    "(fmlookup (action_needed_asses a s1) v) = fmlookup (fst a) v
    ‚àß (fmlookup (action_needed_asses a s2) v) = fmlookup (fst a) v ‚àß
    fmlookup s1 v = fmlookup (fst a) v ‚àß fmlookup s2 v = fmlookup (fst a) v"
  using assms
proof -
  have 1:
    "fmlookup (action_needed_asses a s1) v = fmlookup s1 v"
    "fmlookup (action_needed_asses a s1) v = fmlookup (fst a) v"
    "fmlookup (fst a) v = fmlookup s1 v"
    using as_needed_asses_submap_exec_iv[OF assms(1)]
    by blast+
  moreover {
    have "fmlookup (action_needed_asses a s1) v = fmlookup (action_needed_asses a s2) v"
      using as_needed_asses_submap_exec_ii[OF assms]
      by simp
    then have "fmlookup (action_needed_asses a s2) v = fmlookup (fst a) v"
      using 1(2)
      by argo
  }
  note 2 = this
  moreover {
    have "v ‚àà fmdom' (action_needed_asses a s2)"
      using as_needed_asses_submap_exec_v[OF assms]
      by simp
    then have "fmlookup s2 v = fmlookup (action_needed_asses a s2) v"
      using as_needed_asses_submap_exec_i
      by metis
    also have "‚Ä¶ = fmlookup (fst a) v"
      using 2
      by simp
    finally have "fmlookup s2 v = fmlookup (fst a) v"
      by simp
  }
  ultimately show ?thesis
    by argo
qed

‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO refactor.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
lemma as_needed_asses_submap_exec_vii:
  fixes f g v
  assumes "‚àÄv ‚àà fmdom' f. fmlookup f v = fmlookup g v"
  shows "f ‚äÜ‚á©f g"
proof -
  {
    fix v
    assume a: "v ‚àà fmdom' f"
    then have "v ‚àà dom (fmlookup f)"
      by simp
    moreover have "fmlookup f v = fmlookup g v"
      using assms a
      by blast
    ultimately have "v ‚àà dom (fmlookup f) ‚ü∂ fmlookup f v = fmlookup g v"
      by blast
  }
  then have "fmlookup f ‚äÜ‚á©m fmlookup g"
    by (simp add: map_le_def)
  then show ?thesis
    by (simp add: fmsubset.rep_eq)
qed

‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO refactor.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
lemma as_needed_asses_submap_exec_viii:
  fixes f g v
  assumes "f ‚äÜ‚á©f g"
  shows "‚àÄv ‚àà fmdom' f. fmlookup f v = fmlookup g v"
proof -
  have 1: "fmlookup f ‚äÜ‚á©m fmlookup g"
    using assms
    by (simp add: fmsubset.rep_eq)
  {
    fix v
    assume "v ‚àà fmdom' f"
    then have "v ‚àà dom (fmlookup f)"
      by simp
    then have "fmlookup f v = fmlookup g v"
      using 1 map_le_def
      by metis
  }
  then show ?thesis
    by blast
qed

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
lemma as_needed_asses_submap_exec_viii':
  fixes f g v
  assumes "f ‚äÜ‚á©f g"
  shows "fmdom' f ‚äÜ fmdom' g"
  using assms as_needed_asses_submap_exec_v subsetI
  by metis

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO refactor.‚Ä∫
lemma as_needed_asses_submap_exec_ix:
  fixes f g
  shows "f ‚äÜ‚á©f g = (‚àÄv ‚àà fmdom' f. fmlookup f v = fmlookup g v)"
  using as_needed_asses_submap_exec_vii  as_needed_asses_submap_exec_viii
  by metis

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
lemma as_needed_asses_submap_exec_x:
  fixes f a v
  assumes "v ‚àà fmdom' (action_needed_asses a f)"
  shows "v ‚àà fmdom' (fst a) ‚àß v ‚àà fmdom' f ‚àß fmlookup (fst a) v = fmlookup f v"
  using assms
  unfolding action_needed_asses_def action_needed_vars_def
  using as_needed_asses_submap_exec_i assms
  by (metis fmdom'_notD fmdom'_notI)

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO refactor.‚Ä∫
lemma as_needed_asses_submap_exec_xi:
  fixes v a f g
  assumes "v ‚àà fmdom' (action_needed_asses a (f ++ g))" "v ‚àà fmdom' f"
  shows "
    fmlookup (action_needed_asses a (f ++ g)) v = fmlookup f v
    ‚àß fmlookup (action_needed_asses a (f ++ g)) v = fmlookup (fst a) v"
proof -
  have 1: "v ‚àà {v ‚àà fmdom' (f ++ g). v ‚àà fmdom' (fst a) ‚àß fmlookup (fst a) v = fmlookup (f ++ g) v}"
    using as_needed_asses_submap_exec_x[OF assms(1)]
    by blast
  {
    have "v |‚àà| fmdom f"
      using assms(2)
      by (meson fmdom'_notI fmdom_notD)
    then have "fmlookup (f ++ g) v = fmlookup f v"
      unfolding fmap_add_ltr_def fmlookup_add
      by simp
  }
  note 2 = this
  {

    have "fmlookup (action_needed_asses a (f ++ g)) v = fmlookup (f ++ g) v"
      unfolding action_needed_asses_def action_needed_vars_def
      using 1
      by force
    then have "fmlookup (action_needed_asses a (f ++ g)) v = fmlookup f v"
      using 2
      by simp
  }
  note 3 = this
  moreover {
    have "fmlookup (fst a) v = fmlookup (f ++ g) v"
      using 1
      by simp
    also have "‚Ä¶ = fmlookup f v"
      using 2
      by simp
    also have "‚Ä¶ = fmlookup (action_needed_asses a (f ++ g)) v"
      using 3
      by simp
    finally have "fmlookup (action_needed_asses a (f ++ g)) v = fmlookup (fst a) v"
      by simp
  }
  ultimately show ?thesis
    by blast
qed

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO refactor (into Fmap\_Utils.thy).‚Ä∫
lemma as_needed_asses_submap_exec_xii:
  fixes f g v
  assumes "v ‚àà fmdom' f"
  shows "fmlookup (f ++ g) v = fmlookup f v"
proof -
  have "v |‚àà| fmdom f"
    using assms(1) fmdom'_notI fmdom_notD
    by metis
  then show ?thesis
    unfolding fmap_add_ltr_def
    using fmlookup_add
    by force
qed

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
lemma as_needed_asses_submap_exec_xii':
  fixes f g v
  assumes "v ‚àâ fmdom' f" "v ‚àà fmdom' g"
  shows "fmlookup (f ++ g) v = fmlookup g v"
proof -
  have "¬¨(v |‚àà| fmdom f)"
    using assms(1) fmdom'_notI fmdom_notD
    by fastforce
  moreover have "v |‚àà| fmdom g"
    using assms(2) fmdom'_notI fmdom_notD
    by metis
  ultimately show ?thesis
    unfolding fmap_add_ltr_def
    using fmlookup_add
    by simp
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE showcase.‚Ä∫
lemma as_needed_asses_submap_exec:
  fixes s1 s2
  assumes "(s1 ‚äÜ‚á©f s2)"
    "(‚àÄa. ListMem a as ‚ü∂ (action_needed_asses a s2 ‚äÜ‚á©f action_needed_asses a s1))"
  shows "(exec_plan s1 as ‚äÜ‚á©f exec_plan s2 as)"
  using assms
proof (induction as arbitrary: s1 s2)
  case (Cons a as)
    ‚Äï ‚ÄπProof the premises of the induction hypothesis for 'state\_succ s1 a' and 'state\_succ s2 a'.‚Ä∫
  {
    then have "action_needed_asses a s2 ‚äÜ‚á©f action_needed_asses a s1"
      using Cons.prems(2) elem
      by metis
    then have "state_succ s1 a ‚äÜ‚á©f state_succ s2 a"
      using Cons.prems(1) act_needed_asses_submap_succ_submap
      by blast
  }
  note 1 = this
  moreover {
    fix a'
    assume P: "ListMem a' as"
      ‚Äï ‚ÄπShow the goal by rule 'as\_needed\_asses\_submap\_exec\_ix'.‚Ä∫
    let ?f="action_needed_asses a' (state_succ s2 a)"
    let ?g="action_needed_asses a' (state_succ s1 a)"
    {
      fix v
      assume P_1: "v ‚àà fmdom' ?f"
      then have "fmlookup ?f v = fmlookup ?g v"
        unfolding state_succ_def
        text ‚Äπ Split cases on the if-then branches introduced by the definition of 'state\_succ'.‚Ä∫
      proof (auto)
        assume P_1_1: "v ‚àà fmdom' (action_needed_asses a' (snd a ++ s2))" "fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s2"
          "fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s1"
        have i: "action_needed_asses a' s2 ‚äÜ‚á©f action_needed_asses a' s1"
          using Cons.prems(2) P insert
          by fast
        then show "
            fmlookup (action_needed_asses a' (snd a ++ s2)) v
            = fmlookup (action_needed_asses a' (snd a ++ s1)) v"
        proof (cases "v ‚àà fmdom' ?g")
          case true: True
          then have A:
            "v ‚àà fmdom' (fst a') ‚àß v ‚àà fmdom' (snd a ++ s1)
                ‚àß fmlookup (fst a') v = fmlookup (snd a ++ s1) v"
            using as_needed_asses_submap_exec_x[OF true]
            unfolding state_succ_def
            using P_1_1(3)
            by simp
          then have B:
            "v ‚àà fmdom' (fst a') ‚àß v ‚àà fmdom' (snd a ++ s2)
                ‚àß fmlookup (fst a') v = fmlookup (snd a ++ s2) v"
            using as_needed_asses_submap_exec_x[OF P_1]
            unfolding state_succ_def
            using P_1_1(2)
            by simp
          then show ?thesis
          proof (cases "v ‚àà fmdom' (snd a)")
            case True
            then have I:
              "fmlookup (snd a ++ s2) v = fmlookup (snd a) v"
              "fmlookup (snd a ++ s1) v = fmlookup (snd a) v"
              using as_needed_asses_submap_exec_xii
              by fast+
            moreover {
              have "fmlookup ?f v = fmlookup (snd a ++ s2) v"
                using as_needed_asses_submap_exec_iv[OF P_1]
                unfolding state_succ_def
                using P_1_1(2)
                by presburger
              then have "fmlookup ?f v = fmlookup (snd a) v"
                using I(1)
                by argo
            }
            moreover {
              have "fmlookup ?g v = fmlookup (snd a ++ s1) v"
                using as_needed_asses_submap_exec_iv[OF true]
                unfolding state_succ_def
                using P_1_1(3)
                by presburger
              then have "fmlookup ?g v = fmlookup (snd a) v"
                using I(2)
                by argo
            }
            ultimately show ?thesis
              unfolding state_succ_def
              using P_1_1(2, 3)
              by presburger
          next
            case False
            then have I: "v ‚àà fmdom' s1" "v ‚àà fmdom' s2"
              using A B
              unfolding fmap_add_ltr_def fmdom'_add
              by blast+
            {
              have "fmlookup ?g v = fmlookup (snd a ++ s1) v"
                using as_needed_asses_submap_exec_iv[OF true]
                unfolding state_succ_def
                using P_1_1(3)
                by presburger
              then have "fmlookup ?g v = fmlookup s1 v"
                using as_needed_asses_submap_exec_xii'[OF False I(1)]
                by simp
              moreover {
                have "fmlookup (snd a ++ s1) v = fmlookup s1 v"
                  using as_needed_asses_submap_exec_xii'[OF False I(1)]
                  by simp
                moreover from ‚Äπfmlookup (snd a ++ s1) v = fmlookup s1 v‚Ä∫
                have "fmlookup (fst a') v = fmlookup s1 v"
                  using A(1)
                  by argo
                ultimately have "fmlookup (action_needed_asses a' s1) v = fmlookup s1 v"
                  using A(1) I(1)
                  unfolding action_needed_asses_def action_needed_vars_def
                    fmlookup_restrict_set
                  by simp
              }
              ultimately have "fmlookup ?g v = fmlookup (action_needed_asses a' s1) v"
                by argo
            }
            note II = this
            {
              have "fmlookup ?f v = fmlookup (snd a ++ s2) v"
                using as_needed_asses_submap_exec_iv[OF P_1]
                unfolding state_succ_def
                using P_1_1(2)
                by presburger
              moreover from ‚Äπfmlookup ?f v = fmlookup (snd a ++ s2) v‚Ä∫
              have Œ±: "fmlookup ?f v = fmlookup s2 v"
                using as_needed_asses_submap_exec_xii'[OF False I(2)]
                by argo
              ultimately have "fmlookup (snd a ++ s2) v = fmlookup s2 v"
                by argo
              moreover {
                from ‚Äπfmlookup (snd a ++ s2) v = fmlookup s2 v‚Ä∫
                have "fmlookup (fst a') v = fmlookup s2 v"
                  using B(1)
                  by argo
                then have "fmlookup (action_needed_asses a' s2) v = fmlookup s2 v"
                  using B(1) I(2)
                  unfolding action_needed_asses_def action_needed_vars_def
                    fmlookup_restrict_set
                  by simp
              }
              ultimately have "fmlookup ?f v = fmlookup (action_needed_asses a' s2) v"
                using Œ±
                by argo
            }
            note III = this
            {
              have "v ‚àà fmdom' (action_needed_asses a' s2)"
              proof -
                have "fmlookup (fst a') v = fmlookup s1 v"
                  by (simp add: A False I(1) as_needed_asses_submap_exec_xii')
                then show ?thesis
                  by (simp add: A Cons.prems(1) I(1, 2)
                      as_needed_asses_submap_exec_ii as_needed_asses_submap_exec_iii)
              qed
              then have "
                      fmlookup (action_needed_asses a' s2) v
                      = fmlookup (action_needed_asses a' s1) v"
                using i as_needed_asses_submap_exec_ix[of "action_needed_asses a' s2"
                    "action_needed_asses a' s1"]
                by blast
            }
            note IV = this
            {
              have "fmlookup ?f v = fmlookup (action_needed_asses a' s2) v"
                using III
                by simp
              also have "‚Ä¶ = fmlookup (action_needed_asses a' s1) v"
                using IV
                by simp
              finally have "‚Ä¶ = fmlookup ?g v"
                using II
                by simp
            }
            then show ?thesis
              unfolding action_needed_asses_def action_needed_vars_def state_succ_def
              using P_1_1 A B
              by simp
          qed
        next
          case false: False
          have A:
            "v ‚àà fmdom' (fst a') ‚àß v ‚àà fmdom' (snd a ++ s2)
                ‚àß fmlookup (fst a') v = fmlookup (snd a ++ s2) v"
            using as_needed_asses_submap_exec_x[OF P_1]
            unfolding state_succ_def
            using P_1_1(2)
            by simp
          from false have B:
            "¬¨(v ‚àà fmdom' (snd a ++ s1)) ‚à® ¬¨(fmlookup (fst a') v = fmlookup (snd a ++ s1) v)"
            by (simp add: A P_1_1(3) as_needed_asses_submap_exec_iii state_succ_def)
          then show ?thesis
          proof (cases "v ‚àà fmdom' (snd a)")
            case True
            then have I: "v ‚àà fmdom' (snd a ++ s1)"
              unfolding fmap_add_ltr_def fmdom'_add
              by simp
            {
              from True have
                "fmlookup (snd a ++ s2) v = fmlookup (snd a) v"
                "fmlookup (snd a ++ s1) v = fmlookup (snd a) v"
                using as_needed_asses_submap_exec_xii
                by fast+
              then have "fmlookup (snd a ++ s1) v = fmlookup (snd a ++ s2) v"
                by auto
              also have " ‚Ä¶ = fmlookup (fst a') v"
                using A
                by simp
              finally have "fmlookup (snd a ++ s1) v = fmlookup (fst a') v"
                by simp
            }
            then show ?thesis using B I
              by presburger
          next
            case False
            then have I: "v ‚àà fmdom' s2"
              using A unfolding fmap_add_ltr_def fmdom'_add
              by blast
            {
              from P_1 have "fmlookup ?f v ‚â† None"
                by (meson fmdom'_notI)
              moreover from false
              have "fmlookup ?g v = None"
                by (simp add: fmdom'_notD)
              ultimately have "fmlookup ?f v ‚â† fmlookup ?g v"
                by simp
            }
            moreover
            {
              {
                from P_1_1(2) have "state_succ s2 a = snd a ++ s2"
                  unfolding state_succ_def
                  by simp
                moreover from ‚Äπstate_succ s2 a = snd a ++ s2‚Ä∫ have
                  "fmlookup (state_succ s2 a) v = fmlookup s2 v"
                  using as_needed_asses_submap_exec_xii'[OF False I]
                  by simp
                ultimately have "fmlookup ?f v = fmlookup (action_needed_asses a' s2) v"
                  unfolding action_needed_asses_def action_needed_vars_def
                  by (simp add: A I)
              }
              note I = this
              moreover {
                from P_1_1(3) have "state_succ s1 a = snd a ++ s1"
                  unfolding state_succ_def
                  by simp
                moreover from ‚Äπstate_succ s1 a = snd a ++ s1‚Ä∫ False
                have "fmlookup (state_succ s1 a) v = fmlookup s1 v"
                  unfolding fmap_add_ltr_def
                  using fmlookup_add
                  by (simp add: fmdom'_alt_def fmember.rep_eq)
                ultimately have "fmlookup ?g v = fmlookup (action_needed_asses a' s1) v"
                  unfolding action_needed_asses_def action_needed_vars_def
                  using FDOM_state_succ_subset
                  by auto
              }
              moreover {
                have "v ‚àà fmdom' (action_needed_asses a' s2)"
                proof -
                  have "v ‚àà fmdom' s2 ‚à™ fmdom' (snd a)"
                    by (metis (no_types) A FDOM_state_succ_subset P_1_1(2) state_succ_def subsetCE)
                  then show ?thesis
                    by (simp add: A False as_needed_asses_submap_exec_iii as_needed_asses_submap_exec_xii')
                qed
                then have "
                      fmlookup (action_needed_asses a' s2) v
                      = fmlookup (action_needed_asses a' s1) v"
                  using i as_needed_asses_submap_exec_ix[of "action_needed_asses a' s2"
                      "action_needed_asses a' s1"]
                  by blast
              }
              ultimately have "fmlookup ?f v = fmlookup ?g v"
                by simp
            }
            ultimately show ?thesis
              by simp
          qed
        qed
      next
        assume P2: "v ‚àà fmdom' (action_needed_asses a' (snd a ++ s2))" "fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s2"
          "¬¨ fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s1"
        then show "
            fmlookup (action_needed_asses a' (snd a ++ s2)) v
            = fmlookup (action_needed_asses a' s1) v"
        proof -
          obtain aa :: "('a, 'b) fmap ‚áí ('a, 'b) fmap ‚áí 'a" where
            "‚àÄx0 x1. (‚àÉv2. v2 ‚àà fmdom' x1
                ‚àß fmlookup x1 v2 ‚â† fmlookup x0 v2) = (aa x0 x1 ‚àà fmdom' x1
                ‚àß fmlookup x1 (aa x0 x1) ‚â† fmlookup x0 (aa x0 x1))"
            by moura
          then have f1: "‚àÄf fa. aa fa f ‚àà fmdom' f
              ‚àß fmlookup f (aa fa f) ‚â† fmlookup fa (aa fa f) ‚à® f ‚äÜ‚á©f fa"
            by (meson as_needed_asses_submap_exec_vii)
          then have f2: "aa s1 (fst a) ‚àà fmdom' (fst a)
              ‚àß fmlookup (fst a) (aa s1 (fst a)) ‚â† fmlookup s1 (aa s1 (fst a))"
            using P2(3) by blast
          then have "aa s1 (fst a) ‚àà fmdom' s2"
            by (metis (full_types) P2(2) as_needed_asses_submap_exec_v)
          then have "aa s1 (fst a) ‚àà fmdom' (action_needed_asses a s2)"
            using f2 by (simp add: P2(2) as_needed_asses_submap_exec_iii
                as_needed_asses_submap_exec_viii)
          then show ?thesis
            using f1 by (metis (no_types) Cons.prems(2) P2(3) as_needed_asses_submap_exec_vi elem)
        qed
      next
        assume P3: "v ‚àà fmdom' (action_needed_asses a' s2)" "¬¨ fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s2" "fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s1"
        then show "
            fmlookup (action_needed_asses a' s2) v
            = fmlookup (action_needed_asses a' (snd a ++ s1)) v"
          using Cons.prems(1) submap_imp_state_succ_submap_a
          by blast
      next
        assume P4: "v ‚àà fmdom' (action_needed_asses a' s2)" "¬¨ fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s2" "¬¨ fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s1"
        then show "
            fmlookup (action_needed_asses a' s2) v
            = fmlookup (action_needed_asses a' s1) v"
          by (simp add: Cons.prems(2) P as_needed_asses_submap_exec_ii insert)
      qed
    }
    then have a: "?f ‚äÜ‚á©f ?g"
      using as_needed_asses_submap_exec_ix
      by blast
  }
  note 2 = this
  then show ?case
    unfolding exec_plan.simps
    using Cons.IH[of "state_succ s1 a" "state_succ s2 a", OF 1]
    by blast
qed simp


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE name shortened.‚Ä∫
definition system_needed_vars where
  "system_needed_vars PROB s ‚â° (‚ãÉ{action_needed_vars a s | a. a ‚àà PROB})"

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE name shortened.‚Ä∫
definition system_needed_asses where
  "system_needed_asses PROB s ‚â° (fmrestrict_set (system_needed_vars PROB s) s)"


lemma action_needed_vars_subset_sys_needed_vars_subset:
  assumes "(a ‚àà PROB)"
  shows "(action_needed_vars a s ‚äÜ system_needed_vars PROB s)"
  using assms
  by (auto simp: system_needed_vars_def) (metis surjective_pairing)


lemma action_needed_asses_submap_sys_needed_asses:
  assumes "(a ‚àà PROB)"
  shows "(action_needed_asses a s ‚äÜ‚á©f system_needed_asses PROB s)"
proof -
  have "action_needed_asses a s = fmrestrict_set (action_needed_vars a s) s"
    unfolding action_needed_asses_def
    by simp
  then have "system_needed_asses PROB s = (fmrestrict_set (system_needed_vars PROB s) s)"
    unfolding system_needed_asses_def
    by simp
  then have 1: "action_needed_vars a s ‚äÜ system_needed_vars PROB s"
    unfolding action_needed_vars_subset_sys_needed_vars_subset
    using assms action_needed_vars_subset_sys_needed_vars_subset
    by fast
  {
    fix x
    assume P1: "x ‚àà dom (fmlookup (fmrestrict_set (action_needed_vars a s) s))"
    then have a: "fmlookup (fmrestrict_set (action_needed_vars a s) s) x = fmlookup s x"
      by (auto simp: fmdom'_restrict_set_precise)
    then have "fmlookup (fmrestrict_set (system_needed_vars PROB s) s) x = fmlookup s x"
      using 1 contra_subsetD
      by fastforce
    then have "
      fmlookup (fmrestrict_set (action_needed_vars a s) s) x
      = fmlookup (fmrestrict_set (system_needed_vars PROB s) s) x
    "
      using a
      by argo
  }
  then have "
      fmlookup (fmrestrict_set (action_needed_vars a s) s)
      ‚äÜ‚á©m fmlookup (fmrestrict_set (system_needed_vars PROB s) s)
    "
    using map_le_def
    by blast
  then show "(action_needed_asses a s ‚äÜ‚á©f system_needed_asses PROB s)"
    by (simp add: fmsubset.rep_eq action_needed_asses_def system_needed_asses_def)
qed


lemma system_needed_asses_include_action_needed_asses_1:
  assumes "(a ‚àà PROB)"
  shows "(action_needed_vars a (fmrestrict_set (system_needed_vars PROB s) s) = action_needed_vars a s)"
proof -
  let ?A="{v ‚àà fmdom' (fmrestrict_set (system_needed_vars PROB s) s).
      v ‚àà fmdom' (fst a)
      ‚àß fmlookup (fst a) v = fmlookup (fmrestrict_set (system_needed_vars PROB s) s) v}"
  let ?B="{v ‚àà fmdom' s. v ‚àà fmdom' (fst a) ‚àß fmlookup (fst a) v = fmlookup s v}"
  {
    fix v
    assume "v ‚àà ?A"
    then have i: "v ‚àà fmdom' (fmrestrict_set (system_needed_vars PROB s) s)" "v ‚àà fmdom' (fst a)"
      "fmlookup (fst a) v = fmlookup (fmrestrict_set (system_needed_vars PROB s) s) v"
      by blast+
    then have "v ‚àà fmdom' s"
      by (simp add: fmdom'_restrict_set_precise)
    moreover have "fmlookup (fst a) v = fmlookup s v"
      using i(2, 3) fmdom'_notI
      by force
    ultimately have "v ‚àà ?B"
      using i
      by blast
  }
  then have 1: "?A ‚äÜ ?B"
    by blast
  {
    fix v
    assume P: "v ‚àà ?B"
    then have ii: "v ‚àà fmdom' s" "v ‚àà fmdom' (fst a)" "fmlookup (fst a) v = fmlookup s v"
      by blast+
    moreover {
      have "‚àÉs'. v ‚àà s' ‚àß (‚àÉa. (s' = action_needed_vars a s) ‚àß a ‚àà PROB)"
        unfolding action_needed_vars_def
        using assms P action_needed_vars_def
        by metis
      then obtain s' where Œ±: "v ‚àà s'" "(‚àÉa. (s' = action_needed_vars a s) ‚àß a ‚àà PROB)"
        by blast
      moreover obtain a' where "s' = action_needed_vars a' s" "a' ‚àà PROB"
        using Œ±
        by blast
      ultimately have "v ‚àà fmdom' (fmrestrict_set (system_needed_vars PROB s) s)"
        unfolding fmdom'_restrict_set_precise
        using action_needed_vars_subset_sys_needed_vars_subset ii(1) by blast
    }
    note iii = this
    moreover have "fmlookup (fst a) v = fmlookup (fmrestrict_set (system_needed_vars PROB s) s) v"
      using ii(3) iii fmdom'_notI
      by force
    ultimately have "v ‚àà ?A"
      by blast
  }
  then have "?B ‚äÜ ?A"
    by blast
  then show ?thesis
    unfolding action_needed_vars_def
    using 1
    by blast
qed

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO refactor (proven elsewhere?).‚Ä∫
lemma system_needed_asses_include_action_needed_asses_i:
  fixes A B f
  assumes "A ‚äÜ B"
  shows "fmrestrict_set A (fmrestrict_set B f) = fmrestrict_set A f"
proof -
  {
    let ?f'="fmrestrict_set A f"
    let ?f''="fmrestrict_set A (fmrestrict_set B f)"
    assume C: "?f'' ‚â† ?f'"
    then obtain v where 1: "fmlookup ?f'' v ‚â† fmlookup ?f' v"
      by (meson fmap_ext)
    then have False
    proof (cases "v ‚àà A")
      case True
      have "fmlookup ?f'' v = fmlookup (fmrestrict_set B f) v"
        using True fmlookup_restrict_set
        by simp
      moreover have "fmlookup (fmrestrict_set B f) v = fmlookup ?f' v"
        using True assms(1)
        by auto
      ultimately show ?thesis
        using 1
        by argo
    next
      case False
      then have "fmlookup ?f' v = None" "fmlookup ?f'' v = None"
        using fmlookup_restrict_set
        by auto+
      then show ?thesis
        using 1
        by argo
    qed
  }
  then show ?thesis
    by blast
qed


lemma system_needed_asses_include_action_needed_asses:
  assumes "(a ‚àà PROB)"
  shows "(action_needed_asses a (system_needed_asses PROB s) = action_needed_asses a s)"
proof -
  {
    have " action_needed_vars a s ‚äÜ system_needed_vars PROB s"
      using action_needed_vars_subset_sys_needed_vars_subset[OF assms]
      by simp
    then have "
        fmrestrict_set (action_needed_vars a s) (fmrestrict_set (system_needed_vars PROB s) s) =
        fmrestrict_set (action_needed_vars a s) s"
      using system_needed_asses_include_action_needed_asses_i
      by fast
  }
  moreover
  {
    have
      "action_needed_vars a (fmrestrict_set (system_needed_vars PROB s) s) = action_needed_vars a s"
      using system_needed_asses_include_action_needed_asses_1[OF assms]
      by simp
    then have "fmrestrict_set (action_needed_vars a (fmrestrict_set (system_needed_vars PROB s) s))
        (fmrestrict_set (system_needed_vars PROB s) s) =
        fmrestrict_set (action_needed_vars a s) s
        ‚ü∑ fmrestrict_set (action_needed_vars a s) (fmrestrict_set (system_needed_vars PROB s) s) =
            fmrestrict_set (action_needed_vars a s) s"
      by simp
  }
  ultimately show ?thesis
    unfolding  action_needed_asses_def system_needed_asses_def
    by simp
qed


lemma system_needed_asses_submap:
  "system_needed_asses PROB s ‚äÜ‚á©f s"
proof -
  {
    fix x
    assume P: "x‚àà dom (fmlookup (system_needed_asses PROB s))"
    then have "system_needed_asses PROB s = (fmrestrict_set (system_needed_vars PROB s) s)"
      by (simp add: system_needed_asses_def)
    then have "fmlookup (system_needed_asses PROB s) x = fmlookup s x"
      using P
      by (auto simp: fmdom'_restrict_set_precise)
  }
  then have "fmlookup (system_needed_asses PROB s) ‚äÜ‚á©m fmlookup s"
    using map_le_def
    by blast
  then show ?thesis
    using fmsubset.rep_eq
    by fast
qed


lemma as_works_from_system_needed_asses:
  assumes "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
  shows "(exec_plan (system_needed_asses PROB s) as ‚äÜ‚á©f exec_plan s as)"
  using assms
  by (metis
      action_needed_asses_def
      as_needed_asses_submap_exec
      fmsubset_restrict_set_mono system_needed_asses_def
      system_needed_asses_include_action_needed_asses
      system_needed_asses_include_action_needed_asses_1
      system_needed_asses_submap
      valid_plan_mems
      )


end

Theory ActionSeqProcess

theory ActionSeqProcess
  imports Main "HOL-Library.Sublist" FactoredSystemLib FactoredSystem FSSublist
begin

section "Action Sequence Process"

text ‚Äπ This section defines the preconditions satisfied predicate for action sequences and shows
relations between the execution of action sequnences and their projections some. The preconditions
satisfied predicate (`sat\_precond\_as`) states that in each recursion step, the given state and the
next action are compatible, i.e. the actions preconditions are met by the state. This is used as
premise to propositions on projections of action sequences to avoid that an invalid unprojected
sequence is suddenly valid after projection. [Abdulaziz et al., p.13] ‚Ä∫

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE curried.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE 'fun' because of multiple defining equations.‚Ä∫
fun sat_precond_as where
  "sat_precond_as s [] = True"
| "sat_precond_as s (a # as) = (fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s ‚àß sat_precond_as (state_succ s a) as)"


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
lemma sat_precond_as_pair:
  "sat_precond_as s ((p, e) # as) = (p ‚äÜ‚á©f s ‚àß sat_precond_as (state_succ s (p, e)) as)"
  by simp


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE 'fun' because of multiple defining equations.‚Ä∫
fun rem_effectless_act where
  "rem_effectless_act [] = []"
| "rem_effectless_act (a # as) = (if fmdom' (snd a) ‚â† {}
  then (a # rem_effectless_act as)
  else rem_effectless_act as
)"


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE 'fun' because of multiple defining equations.‚Ä∫
fun no_effectless_act where
  "no_effectless_act [] = True"
| "no_effectless_act (a # as) = ((fmdom' (snd a) ‚â† {}) ‚àß no_effectless_act as)"


lemma graph_plan_lemma_4:
  fixes s s' as vs P
  assumes "(‚àÄa. (ListMem a as ‚àß P a) ‚ü∂ ((fmdom' (snd a) ‚à© vs) = {}))" "sat_precond_as s as"
    "sat_precond_as s' (filter (Œªa. ¬¨(P a)) as)" "(fmrestrict_set vs s = fmrestrict_set vs s')"
  shows "
    (fmrestrict_set vs (exec_plan s as)
    = fmrestrict_set vs (exec_plan s' (filter (Œª a. ¬¨(P a)) as)))
  "
  using assms
  unfolding exec_plan.simps
proof(induction as arbitrary: s s' vs P)
  case (Cons a as)
  then have 1: "fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s" "sat_precond_as (state_succ s a) as"
    by auto
  then have 2: "‚àÄa'. ListMem a' as ‚àß P a' ‚ü∂ fmdom' (snd a') ‚à© vs = {}"
    by (simp add: Cons.prems(1) insert)
  then show ?case
  proof (cases "P a")
    case True
    {
      then have "filter (Œªa. ¬¨(P a)) (a # as) = filter (Œªa. ¬¨(P a)) as"
        by simp
      then have "sat_precond_as s' (filter (Œªa. ¬¨(P a)) as)"
        using Cons.prems(3) True
        by argo
    }
    note a = this
    {
      then have "ListMem a (a # as)"
        using elem
        by fast
      then have "(fmdom' (snd a) ‚à© vs) = {}"
        using Cons.prems(1) True
        by blast
      then have "fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s a) = fmrestrict_set vs s"
        using disj_imp_eq_proj_exec[symmetric]
        by fast
    }
    then show ?thesis
      unfolding exec_plan.simps
      using Cons.prems(4) 1(2) 2 True a Cons.IH[where s="state_succ s a" and s'=s']
      by fastforce
  next
    case False
    {
      have "filter (Œªa. ¬¨(P a)) (a # as) = a # filter (Œªa. ¬¨(P a)) as"
        using False
        by auto
      then have "fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s'" "sat_precond_as (state_succ s' a) (filter (Œªa. ¬¨(P a)) as)"
        using Cons.prems(3) False
        by force+
    }
    note b = this
    then have "fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s a) = fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s' a)"
      using proj_eq_proj_exec_eq
      using Cons.prems(4) 1(1)
      by blast
    then show ?thesis
      unfolding exec_plan.simps
      using 1(2) 2 False b Cons.IH[where s="state_succ s a" and s'="state_succ s' a"]
      by force
  qed
qed simp


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE curried instead of triples.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE 'fun' because of multiple defining equations.‚Ä∫
fun rem_condless_act where
  "rem_condless_act s pfx_a [] = pfx_a"
| "rem_condless_act s pfx_a (a # as) = (if fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f exec_plan s pfx_a
    then rem_condless_act s (pfx_a @ [a]) as
    else rem_condless_act s pfx_a as
  )"


lemma rem_condless_act_pair: "
    rem_condless_act s pfx_a ((p, e) # as) = (if p ‚äÜ‚á©f exec_plan s pfx_a
      then rem_condless_act s (pfx_a @ [(p,e)]) as
      else rem_condless_act s pfx_a as
    )
  "
  "(rem_condless_act s pfx_a [] = pfx_a)"
  by simp+


lemma exec_remcondless_cons:
  fixes s h as pfx
  shows "
    exec_plan s (rem_condless_act s (h # pfx) as)
    = exec_plan (state_succ s h) (rem_condless_act (state_succ s h) pfx as)
  "
  by (induction as arbitrary: s h pfx) auto


lemma rem_condless_valid_1:
  fixes as s
  shows "(exec_plan s as = exec_plan s (rem_condless_act s [] as))"
  by (induction as arbitrary: s)
    (auto simp add: exec_remcondless_cons FDOM_state_succ state_succ_def)


lemma rem_condless_act_cons:
  fixes h' pfx as s
  shows "(rem_condless_act s (h' # pfx) as) = (h' # rem_condless_act (state_succ s h') pfx as)"
  by (induction as arbitrary: h' pfx s) auto


lemma rem_condless_act_cons_prefix:
  fixes h h' as as' s
  assumes "prefix (h' # as') (rem_condless_act s [h] as)"
  shows "(
    (prefix as' (rem_condless_act (state_succ s h) [] as))
    ‚àß h' = h
  )"
  using assms
proof (induction as arbitrary: h h' as' s)
  case Nil
  then have "rem_condless_act s [h] [] = [h]"
    by simp
  then have 1: "as' = []"
    using Nil.prems
    by simp
  then have "rem_condless_act (state_succ s h) [] [] = []"
    by simp
  then have 2: "prefix as' (rem_condless_act (state_succ s h) [] [])"
    using 1
    by simp
  then have "h = h'"
    using Nil.prems
    by force
  then show ?case
    using 2
    by blast
next
  case (Cons a as)
  {
    have "rem_condless_act s [h] (a # as) = h # rem_condless_act (state_succ s h) [] (a # as)"
      using rem_condless_act_cons
      by fast
