    then have "h = h'"
      using Cons.prems
      by simp
  }
  moreover {
    obtain l where "(h' # as') @ l = (h # rem_condless_act (state_succ s h) [] (a # as))"
      using Cons.prems rem_condless_act_cons prefixE
      by metis
    then have "prefix (as' @ l) (rem_condless_act (state_succ s h) [] (a # as))"
      by simp
    then have "prefix as' (rem_condless_act (state_succ s h) [] (a # as))"
      using append_prefixD
      by blast
  }
  ultimately show ?case
    by fastforce
qed


lemma rem_condless_valid_2:
  fixes as s
  shows "sat_precond_as s (rem_condless_act s [] as)"
  by (induction as arbitrary: s) (auto simp: rem_condless_act_cons)


lemma rem_condless_valid_3:
  fixes as s
  shows "length (rem_condless_act s [] as) ‚â§ length as"
  by (induction as arbitrary: s)
    (auto simp: rem_condless_act_cons le_SucI)


lemma rem_condless_valid_4:
  fixes as A s
  assumes "(set as ‚äÜ A)"
  shows "(set (rem_condless_act s [] as) ‚äÜ A)"
  using assms
  by (induction as arbitrary: A s) (auto simp: rem_condless_act_cons)


lemma rem_condless_valid_6:
  fixes as s P
  shows "length (filter P (rem_condless_act s [] as)) ‚â§ length (filter P as)"
proof (induction as arbitrary: P s)
  case (Cons a as)
  then show ?case
    by (simp add: rem_condless_act_cons le_SucI)
qed simp


lemma rem_condless_valid_7:
  fixes s P as as2
  assumes "(list_all P as ‚àß list_all P as2)"
  shows "list_all P (rem_condless_act s as2 as)"
  using assms
  by (induction as arbitrary: P s as2) auto


lemma rem_condless_valid_8:
  fixes s as
  shows "subseq (rem_condless_act s [] as) as"
  by (induction as arbitrary: s) (auto simp: sublist_cons_4 rem_condless_act_cons)


lemma rem_condless_valid_10:
  fixes PROB as
  assumes "as ‚àà (valid_plans PROB)"
  shows "(rem_condless_act s [] as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
  using assms valid_plans_def rem_condless_valid_1 rem_condless_valid_4
  by blast


lemma rem_condless_valid:
  fixes as A s
  assumes "(exec_plan s as = exec_plan s (rem_condless_act s [] as))"
    "(sat_precond_as s (rem_condless_act s [] as))"
    "(length (rem_condless_act s [] as) ‚â§ length as)"
    "((set as ‚äÜ A) ‚ü∂ (set (rem_condless_act s [] as) ‚äÜ A))"
  shows "(‚àÄP. (length (filter P (rem_condless_act s [] as)) ‚â§ length (filter P as)))"
  using rem_condless_valid_1  rem_condless_valid_2 rem_condless_valid_3 rem_condless_valid_6
    rem_condless_valid_4
  by fast


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE type of `as` had to be fixed for lemma submap\_imp\_state\_succ\_submap.‚Ä∫
lemma submap_sat_precond_submap:
  fixes as :: "'a action list"
  assumes "(s1  ‚äÜ‚á©f s2)" "(sat_precond_as s1 as)"
  shows "(sat_precond_as s2 as)"
  using assms
proof (induction as arbitrary: s1 s2)
  case (Cons a as)
  {
    have "fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s1"
      using Cons.prems(2)
      by simp
    then have "fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s2"
      using Cons.prems(1) submap_imp_state_succ_submap_a
      by blast
  }
  note 1 = this
  {
    have 2: "fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s1" "sat_precond_as (state_succ s1 a) as"
      using Cons.prems(2)
      by simp+
    then have "state_succ s1 a ‚äÜ‚á©f state_succ s2 a"
      using Cons.prems(1) submap_imp_state_succ_submap
      by blast
    then have 3: "sat_precond_as (state_succ s2 a) as"
      using 2(2) Cons.IH
      by blast
  }
  then show ?case
    using 1
    by auto
qed auto


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
lemma submap_init_submap_exec_i:
  fixes s1 s2
  assumes "(s1 ‚äÜ‚á©f s2)" "(sat_precond_as s1 (a # as))"
  shows "state_succ s1 a ‚äÜ‚á©f state_succ s2 a"
  using assms
proof (cases "fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s1")
  case true: True
  then show ?thesis
  proof (cases "fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s2")
    case True
    then show ?thesis
      unfolding state_succ_def
      using assms submap_imp_state_succ_submap_b state_succ_def true
      by auto
  next
    case False
    then show ?thesis
      using assms submap_imp_state_succ_submap_a true
      by blast
  qed
next
  case false: False
  then show ?thesis
  proof (cases "fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s2")
    case True
    then show ?thesis
      using assms false
      by auto
  next
    case False
    then show ?thesis
      unfolding state_succ_def
      using false assms
      by simp
  qed
qed

lemma submap_init_submap_exec:
  fixes s1 s2
  assumes "(s1 ‚äÜ‚á©f s2)" "(sat_precond_as s1 as)"
  shows "(exec_plan s1 as ‚äÜ‚á©f exec_plan s2 as)"
  using assms
proof (induction as arbitrary: s1 s2)
  case (Cons a as)
  have "state_succ s1 a ‚äÜ‚á©f state_succ s2 a"
    using Cons.prems submap_init_submap_exec_i
    by blast
  moreover have "sat_precond_as (state_succ s1 a) as"
    using Cons.prems(2)
    by simp
  ultimately have "exec_plan (state_succ s1 a) as ‚äÜ‚á©f exec_plan (state_succ s2 a) as"
    using Cons.IH
    by blast
  then show ?case
    by simp
qed simp


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE type of `as` had to be fixed for `submap\_sat\_precond\_submap`.‚Ä∫
lemma sat_precond_drest_sat_precond:
  fixes vs s and as :: "'a action list"
  assumes "sat_precond_as (fmrestrict_set vs s) as"
  shows "(sat_precond_as s as)"
proof -
  have "fmrestrict_set vs s ‚äÜ‚á©f s"
    by simp
  then show "(sat_precond_as s as)"
    using assms submap_sat_precond_submap
    by blast
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE name shortened to 'varset\_action'.‚Ä∫
definition varset_action where
  "varset_action a varset ‚â° (fmdom' (snd a) ‚äÜ varset)"
for a :: "'a action"


lemma varset_action_pair: "(varset_action (p, e) vs) = (fmdom' e ‚äÜ vs)"
  unfolding varset_action_def
  by auto


lemma eq_effect_eq_vset:
  fixes x y
  assumes "(snd x = snd y)"
  shows "((Œªa. varset_action a vs) x = (Œªa. varset_action a vs) y)"
  unfolding varset_action_def
  using assms
  by presburger


lemma rem_effectless_works_1:
  fixes s as
  shows "(exec_plan s as = exec_plan s (rem_effectless_act as))"
  by (induction as arbitrary: s) (auto simp: empty_eff_exec_eq)


lemma rem_effectless_works_2:
  fixes as s
  assumes "(sat_precond_as s as)"
  shows "(sat_precond_as s (rem_effectless_act as))"
  using assms
  by (induction as arbitrary: s) (auto simp: empty_eff_exec_eq)


lemma rem_effectless_works_3:
  fixes as
  shows "length (rem_effectless_act as) ‚â§ length as"
  by (induction as) auto


lemma rem_effectless_works_4:
  fixes A as
  assumes "(set as ‚äÜ A)"
  shows "(set (rem_effectless_act as) ‚äÜ A)"
  using assms
  by (induction as arbitrary: A)  auto


lemma rem_effectless_works_4':
  fixes A as
  assumes "(as ‚àà valid_plans A)"
  shows "(rem_effectless_act as ‚àà valid_plans A)"
  using assms
  by (induction as arbitrary: A) (auto simp: valid_plans_def)


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
lemma rem_effectless_works_5_i:
  shows "subseq (rem_effectless_act as) as"
  by (induction as) auto

lemma rem_effectless_works_5:
  fixes P as
  shows "length (filter P (rem_effectless_act as)) ‚â§ length (filter P as)"
  using rem_effectless_works_5_i sublist_imp_len_filter_le
  by blast


lemma rem_effectless_works_6:
  fixes as
  shows "no_effectless_act (rem_effectless_act as)"
  by (induction as) auto


lemma rem_effectless_works_7:
  fixes as
  shows "no_effectless_act as =  list_all (Œªa. fmdom' (snd a) ‚â† {}) as"
  by (induction as) auto


lemma rem_effectless_works_8:
  fixes P as
  assumes "(list_all P as)"
  shows "list_all P (rem_effectless_act as)"
  using assms
  by (induction as arbitrary: P) auto


‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO move and replace `rem\_effectless\_works\_5\_i`.‚Ä∫
lemma rem_effectless_works_9:
  fixes as
  shows "subseq (rem_effectless_act as) as"
  by (induction as) auto


lemma rem_effectless_works_10:
  fixes as P
  assumes "(no_effectless_act as)"
  shows "(no_effectless_act (filter P as))"
  using assms
  by (auto simp: rem_effectless_works_7) (metis Ball_set filter_set member_filter)


lemma rem_effectless_works_11:
  fixes as1 as2
  assumes "subseq as1 (rem_effectless_act as2)"
  shows "(subseq as1 as2)"
  using assms rem_effectless_works_9 sublist_trans
  by blast


lemma rem_effectless_works_12:
  fixes as1 as2
  shows "(no_effectless_act (as1 @ as2)) = (no_effectless_act as1 ‚àß no_effectless_act(as2))"
  by (induction as1) auto


‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO refactor into 'List\_Utils.thy'.‚Ä∫
lemma rem_effectless_works_13_i:
  fixes x l
  assumes "ListMem x l" "list_all P l"
  shows "P x"
  using assms proof (induction l)
  case (insert x xs y)
  have 1: "P y"
    using insert.prems list.pred_inject
    by simp
  then have 2: "list_all P l"
    using assms(2) list.pred_inject
    by force
  then show ?case
    using 1
  proof (cases "y = x")
    case False
    then show ?thesis
      using insert 2
      by fastforce
  qed simp
qed simp

lemma rem_effectless_works_13:
  fixes as1 as2
  assumes "(subseq as1 as2)" "(no_effectless_act as2)"
  shows "(no_effectless_act as1)"
  using assms
proof (induction as1 arbitrary: as2)
  case (Cons a as1)
  {
    have "subseq as1 as2"
      using Cons.prems(1) sublist_CONS1_E
      by metis
    then have "no_effectless_act as1"
      using Cons.prems(2) Cons.IH
      by blast
  }
  moreover
  {
    have "list_all (Œªa. fmdom' (snd a) ‚â† {}) as2"
      using Cons.prems(2) rem_effectless_works_7
      by blast
    moreover have "ListMem a as2"
      using Cons.prems(1) sublist_MEM
      by fast
    ultimately have "fmdom' (snd a) ‚â† {}"
      using rem_effectless_works_13_i
      by fastforce
  }
  ultimately show ?case
    by simp
qed simp


lemma rem_effectless_works_14:
  fixes PROB as
  shows "exec_plan s as = exec_plan s (rem_effectless_act as)"
  using rem_effectless_works_1
  by blast


lemma rem_effectless_works:
  fixes s A as
  assumes "(exec_plan s as = exec_plan s (rem_effectless_act as))"
    "(sat_precond_as s as ‚ü∂ sat_precond_as s (rem_effectless_act as))"
    "(length (rem_effectless_act as) ‚â§ length as)"
    "((set as ‚äÜ A) ‚ü∂ (set (rem_effectless_act as) ‚äÜ A))"
    "(no_effectless_act (rem_effectless_act as))"
  shows "(‚àÄP. length (filter P (rem_effectless_act as)) ‚â§ length (filter P as))"
  using assms rem_effectless_works_5
  by blast


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE name shortened.‚Ä∫
definition rem_effectless_act_set where
  "rem_effectless_act_set A ‚â° {a ‚àà A. fmdom' (snd a) ‚â† {}}"


lemma rem_effectless_act_subset_rem_effectless_act_set_thm:
  fixes as A
  assumes "(set as ‚äÜ A)"
  shows "(set (rem_effectless_act as) ‚äÜ rem_effectless_act_set A)"
  unfolding rem_effectless_act_set_def
  using assms
  by (induction as) auto


lemma rem_effectless_act_set_no_empty_actions_thm:
  fixes A
  shows "rem_effectless_act_set A ‚äÜ {a. fmdom' (snd a) ‚â† {}}"
  unfolding rem_effectless_act_set_def
  by blast


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE proof required additional lemmas 'rem\_effectless\_works\_7' and 'rem\_condless\_valid\_7'.‚Ä∫
lemma rem_condless_valid_9:
  fixes s as
  assumes "no_effectless_act as"
  shows "no_effectless_act (rem_condless_act s [] as)"
  using assms
proof (induction as arbitrary: s)
  case (Cons a as)
  then show ?case
    using Cons
  proof (cases " fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f exec_plan s []")
    case True
    then have "rem_condless_act s [] (a # as) = a # rem_condless_act (state_succ s a) [] as"
      using rem_condless_act_cons
      by fastforce
    moreover
    {
      have "fmdom' (snd a) ‚â† {}"  "no_effectless_act as"
        using Cons.prems
        by simp+
      then have "no_effectless_act (rem_condless_act (state_succ s a) [] as)"
        using Cons.IH
        by blast
    }
    moreover have "no_effectless_act [a]"
      using Cons.prems
      by simp
    ultimately show ?thesis
      using rem_effectless_works_12
      by force
  qed simp
qed simp


lemma graph_plan_lemma_17:
  fixes as_1 as_2 as s
  assumes "(as_1 @ as_2 = as)" "(sat_precond_as s as)"
  shows "((sat_precond_as s as_1) ‚àß sat_precond_as (exec_plan s as_1) as_2)"
  using assms
proof (induction as arbitrary: as_1 as_2 s)
  case (Cons a as)
  then show ?case proof(cases "as_1")
    case Nil
    then show ?thesis
      using Cons.prems(1, 2)
      by auto
  next
    case (Cons a list)
    then show ?thesis
      using Cons.prems(1, 2) Cons.IH hd_append2  list.distinct(1) list.sel(1, 3) tl_append2
      by auto
  qed
qed auto


lemma nempty_eff_every_nempty_act:
  fixes as
  assumes "(no_effectless_act as)" "(‚àÄx. ¬¨(fmdom' (snd (f x)) = {}))"
  shows "(list_all (Œªa. ¬¨(f a = (fmempty, fmempty))) as)"
  using assms
proof (induction as arbitrary: f)
  case (Cons a as)
  then show ?case using fmdom'_empty snd_conv
    by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) Ball_set)
qed simp


lemma empty_replace_proj_dual7:
  fixes s as as'
  assumes "sat_precond_as s (as @ as')"
  shows "sat_precond_as (exec_plan s as) as'"
  using assms
  by (induction as arbitrary: as' s) auto


lemma not_vset_not_disj_eff_prod_dom_diff:
  fixes PROB a vs
  assumes "(a ‚àà PROB)" "(¬¨varset_action a vs)"
  shows "¬¨((fmdom' (snd a) ‚à© ((prob_dom PROB) - vs)) = {})"
proof -
  have 1: "fmdom' (snd a) ‚â† {}"
    using assms(2) varset_action_def
    by blast
  {
    have "fmdom' (snd a) ‚äÜ prob_dom PROB"
      using assms(1) FDOM_eff_subset_prob_dom_pair
      by metis
    then have "
      fmdom' (snd a) ‚à© (prob_dom PROB - vs)
      = (fmdom' (snd a)) - (fmdom' (snd a) ‚à© vs)"
      using Diff_Int_distrib
      by blast
  }
  note 2 = this
  then show ?thesis
    using 1 2
  proof (cases "fmdom' (snd a) ‚à© vs = {}")
    case False
    {
      have "¬¨(fmdom' (snd a) ‚äÜ vs)"
        using assms(2) varset_action_def
        by fast
      then have "(fmdom' (snd a) ‚à© vs ‚â† fmdom' (snd a))"
        by auto
      then have "(fmdom' (snd a) ‚à© vs) ‚äÇ fmdom' (snd a)"
        by blast
    }
    then show ?thesis using 2
      by auto
  qed force
qed


lemma vset_disj_dom_eff_diff:
  fixes PROB a vs
  assumes "(varset_action a vs)"
  shows "(((fmdom' (snd a)) ‚à© (prob_dom PROB - vs)) = {})"
  using assms
  unfolding varset_action_def
  by auto


lemma vset_diff_disj_eff_vs:
  fixes PROB a vs
  assumes "(varset_action a (prob_dom PROB - vs))"
  shows "(((fmdom' (snd a)) ‚à© vs) = {})"
  using assms
  unfolding varset_action_def
  by blast


lemma vset_nempty_efff_not_disj_eff_vs:
  fixes PROB a vs
  assumes "(varset_action a vs)" "(fmdom' (snd a) ‚â† {})"
  shows "¬¨((fmdom' (snd a) ‚à© vs)) = {}"
  using assms
  unfolding varset_action_def
  by auto


lemma vset_disj_eff_diff:
  fixes s a vs
  assumes "(varset_action a vs)"
  shows "((fmdom' (snd a) ‚à© (s - vs)) = {})"
proof -
  have 1: "fmdom' (snd a) ‚äÜ vs"
    using assms
    by (simp add: varset_action_def)
  moreover {
    have "fmdom' (snd a) ‚à© (s - vs) = (fmdom' (snd a) ‚à© s) - (fmdom' (snd a) ‚à© vs)"
      using Diff_Int_distrib
      by fast
    also have " ‚Ä¶ = (fmdom' (snd a) ‚à© s) - (fmdom' (snd a))"
      using 1
      by auto
    finally have "fmdom' (snd a) ‚à© (s - vs) = {}"
      by simp
  }
  ultimately show ?thesis
    by blast
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
lemma list_all_list_mem:
  fixes P and l :: "'a list"
  shows "list_all P l ‚ü∑ (‚àÄe. ListMem e l ‚ü∂ P e)"
proof -
  {
    assume P1: "list_all P l"
    {
      fix e
      assume P11: "ListMem e l"
      then have "P e"
        using P1 P11
      proof (induction l arbitrary: P)
        case (insert x xs y)
        then show ?case proof (cases "y = x")
          case False
          then have "list_all P xs" "ListMem x xs"
            using insert.prems(1) insert.hyps
            by fastforce+
          then show ?thesis
            using insert.IH
            by blast
        qed simp
      qed simp
    }
  }
  moreover
  {
    assume P2: "(‚àÄe. ListMem e l ‚ü∂ P e)"
    then have "list_all P l"
    proof(induction l arbitrary: P)
      case (Cons a l)
      {
        have "‚àÄe. ListMem e l ‚ü∂ P e"
          using Cons.prems insert
          by fast
        then have "list_all P l"
          using Cons.IH
          by blast
      }
      moreover have "P a"
        using Cons.prems elem
        by fast
      ultimately show ?case
        by simp
    qed simp
  }
  ultimately show ?thesis
    by blast
qed


lemma every_vset_imp_drestrict_exec_eq:
  fixes PROB vs as s
  assumes "(list_all (Œªa. varset_action a ((prob_dom PROB) - vs)) as)"
  shows "(fmrestrict_set vs s = fmrestrict_set vs (exec_plan s as))"
proof -
  have 1: "‚àÄe. ListMem e as ‚ü∂ varset_action e ((prob_dom PROB) - vs)"
    using assms list_all_list_mem
    by metis
  {
    fix a
    assume "ListMem a as"
    then have "varset_action a (prob_dom PROB - vs)"
      using 1
      by blast
    then have "disjnt (fmdom' (snd a)) vs"
      unfolding disjnt_def
      using vset_diff_disj_eff_vs
      by blast
  }
  then have "list_all (Œªa. disjnt (fmdom' (snd a)) vs) as"
    using list_all_list_mem
    by blast
  then have "list_all (Œªa. disjnt (fmdom' (snd a)) vs) (rem_condless_act s [] as)"
    by (simp add: rem_condless_valid_7)
  then have "exec_plan s as = exec_plan s (rem_condless_act s [] as)"
    using rem_condless_valid_1
    by blast
  then have"sat_precond_as s (rem_condless_act s [] as)"
    using rem_condless_valid_2
    by blast
  then have "sat_precond_as s [a‚Üêas . ¬¨ varset_action a (prob_dom PROB - vs)]"
    by (simp add: 1 ListMem_iff)
  then have "fmrestrict_set vs s = fmrestrict_set vs s" by simp
  then have "
    fmrestrict_set vs (exec_plan s as) =
    fmrestrict_set vs (exec_plan s [a‚Üêas . ¬¨ varset_action a (prob_dom PROB - vs)])
  "
    using 1 graph_plan_lemma_4[where
        s = s and s' = s and as = "rem_condless_act s [] as" and vs = vs and
        P = "Œªa. varset_action a (prob_dom PROB - vs)"
        ] filter_empty_every_not vset_diff_disj_eff_vs 1disjoint_effects_no_effects
      exec_plan.simps(1) fmdom'_restrict_set_precise list_all_list_mem
    by smt
  then have "list_all (Œªa. varset_action a (prob_dom PROB - vs)) (rem_condless_act s [] as)"
    using assms(1) rem_condless_valid_7 list.pred_inject(1)
    by blast
  then have "filter (Œªa. ¬¨(varset_action a (prob_dom PROB - vs))) (rem_condless_act s [] as) = []"
    using filter_empty_every_not
    by fastforce
  then have "
    sat_precond_as s (filter (Œªa. ¬¨(varset_action a (prob_dom PROB - vs)))
    (rem_condless_act s []as))
  "
    by fastforce
  then show ?thesis
    using 1 vset_diff_disj_eff_vs disjoint_effects_no_effects fmdom'_restrict_set_precise
    by metis
qed


lemma no_effectless_act_works:
  fixes as
  assumes "(no_effectless_act as)"
  shows "(filter (Œªa. ¬¨(fmdom' (snd a) = {})) as = as)"
  using assms
  by (simp add: Ball_set rem_effectless_works_7)


lemma varset_act_diff_un_imp_varset_diff:
  fixes a vs vs' vs''
  assumes "(varset_action a (vs'' -  (vs' ‚à™ vs)))"
  shows "(varset_action a (vs'' - vs))"
  using assms
  unfolding varset_action_def
  by blast


lemma vset_diff_union_vset_diff:
  fixes s vs vs' a
  assumes "(varset_action a (s - (vs ‚à™ vs')))"
  shows "(varset_action a (s - vs'))"
  using assms
  unfolding varset_action_def
  by blast


lemma valid_filter_vset_dom_idempot:
  fixes PROB as
  assumes "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
  shows "(filter (Œªa. varset_action a (prob_dom PROB)) as = as)"
  using assms
proof (induction as)
  case (Cons a as)
  {
    have "as ‚àà valid_plans PROB"
      using Cons.prems valid_plan_valid_tail
      by fast
    then have "(filter (Œªa. varset_action a (prob_dom PROB)) as = as)"
      using Cons.IH
      by blast
  }
  moreover {
    have "a ‚àà PROB"
      using Cons.prems valid_plan_valid_head
      by fast
    then have "varset_action a (prob_dom PROB)"
      unfolding varset_action_def
      using FDOM_eff_subset_prob_dom_pair
      by metis
  }
  ultimately show ?case
    by simp
qed fastforce


lemma n_replace_proj_le_n_as_1:
  fixes a vs vs'
  assumes "(vs ‚äÜ vs')" "(varset_action a vs)"
  shows "(varset_action a vs')"
  using assms
  unfolding varset_action_def
  by simp


lemma sat_precond_as_pfx:
  fixes s
  assumes "(sat_precond_as s (as @ as'))"
  shows "(sat_precond_as s as)"
  using assms
proof (induction as arbitrary: s as')
  case (Cons a as)
  have "fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s"
    using Cons.prems
    by fastforce
  moreover have "sat_precond_as (state_succ s a) (as @ as')"
    using Cons.prems
    by simp
  ultimately show ?case
    using Cons.IH sat_precond_as.simps(2)
    by blast
qed simp


end

Theory RelUtils

theory RelUtils
  imports Main "HOL.Transitive_Closure"
begin

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added definition.‚Ä∫
definition reflexive where 
  "reflexive R ‚â° ‚àÄx. R x x"

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE translation of 'TC' in relationScript.sml:69.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO can we replace this with something from 'HOL.Transitive\_Closure'?‚Ä∫
definition TC where
  "TC R a b ‚â° (‚àÄP. (‚àÄx y. R x y ‚ü∂ P x y) ‚àß (‚àÄx y z. P x y ‚àß P y z ‚ü∂ P x z) ‚ü∂ P a b)"

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE adapts transitive closure definitions of Isabelle and HOL4.‚Ä∫
lemma TC_equiv_tranclp: "TC R a b ‚ü∑ (R‚áß+‚áß+ a b)"
proof -
  {
    have "TC R a b ‚üπ (R‚áß+‚áß+ a b)"
      unfolding TC_def 
      using tranclp.r_into_trancl tranclp_trans
      by metis
  }
  moreover 
  {
    have "(R‚áß+‚áß+ a b) ‚üπ TC R a b" proof(induction rule: tranclp.induct)
      case (r_into_trancl a b)
      then show ?case by(subst TC_def; auto)
    next
      case (trancl_into_trancl a b c)
      then show ?case unfolding TC_def by blast
    qed 
  }
  ultimately show ?thesis
    by fast
qed

lemma TC_IMP_NOT_TC_CONJ_1:
  fixes R P  and  x y
  assumes "¬¨(R‚áß+‚áß+ x y)"
  shows "¬¨((Œªx y. R x y ‚àß P x y)‚áß+‚áß+ x y)"
proof -
  from assms(1) have 1: "¬¨TC R x y"
    using TC_equiv_tranclp
    by fast
  {
    assume P: "¬¨TC R x y"
    then obtain P where a: "(‚àÄx y. R x y ‚ü∂ P x y) ‚àß (‚àÄx y z. P x y ‚àß P y z ‚ü∂ P x z) ‚ü∂ ¬¨P x y" 
      unfolding TC_def
      by blast
    {
      assume P_1: "(‚àÄx y. R x y ‚ü∂ P x y)" "(‚àÄx y z. P x y ‚àß P y z ‚ü∂ P x z)"
      then have "(‚àÄx y. R x y ‚àß P x y ‚ü∂ P x y)" "(‚àÄx y z. P x y ‚àß P y z ‚ü∂ P x z)"
        by blast+
      moreover from a and P_1 have "¬¨P x y"
        by blast
      then have "‚àÉP. (‚àÄx y. R x y ‚àß P x y ‚ü∂ P x y) ‚àß (‚àÄx y z. P x y ‚àß P y z ‚ü∂ P x z) ‚ü∂ ¬¨P x y"
        by blast
    }
    then have "‚àÉP. 
      (‚àÄx y. R x y ‚àß P x y ‚ü∂ P x y) ‚àß (‚àÄx y z. P x y ‚àß P y z ‚ü∂ P x z) ‚ü∂ ¬¨P x y" 
      by blast 
  }
  note 2 = this
  {
    from 1 2 have "‚àÉP. 
      (‚àÄx y. R x y ‚àß P x y ‚ü∂ P x y) ‚àß (‚àÄx y z. P x y ‚àß P y z ‚ü∂ P x z) ‚ü∂ ¬¨P x y" 
      by blast
    then have "¬¨TC (Œªx y. R x y ‚àß P x y) x y" 
      unfolding TC_def  
      by (metis assms tranclp.r_into_trancl tranclp_trans)
    then have "¬¨(Œªx y. R x y ‚àß P x y)‚áß+‚áß+ x y" 
      using TC_equiv_tranclp
      by fast
  }
  then show ?thesis
    by blast
qed

lemma TC_IMP_NOT_TC_CONJ:
  fixes R R' P x y
  assumes "‚àÄx y. P x y ‚ü∂ R' x y ‚ü∂ R x y" "¬¨R‚áß+‚áß+ x y"
  shows "¬¨(Œªx y. R' x y ‚àß P x y)‚áß+‚áß+ x y" 
proof -
  from assms(2)
  have 1: "¬¨(Œªx y. R x y ‚àß P x  y)‚áß+‚áß+ x y"
    using TC_IMP_NOT_TC_CONJ_1[where P="Œªx y. P x y"]
    by blast
  {
    {
      from 1 have  "¬¨TC (Œªx y. R x y ‚àß P x  y) x y" 
        using TC_equiv_tranclp 
        by fast
      then have "‚àÉPa.
      (‚àÄx y. R x y ‚àß P x y ‚ü∂ Pa x y) ‚àß (‚àÄx y z. Pa x y ‚àß Pa y z ‚ü∂ Pa x z) 
      ‚ü∂ ¬¨Pa x y"
        unfolding TC_def
        by blast
    }
    then obtain Pa where a: 
      "(‚àÄx y. R x y ‚àß P x y ‚ü∂ Pa x y) ‚àß (‚àÄx y z. Pa x y ‚àß Pa y z ‚ü∂ Pa x z) ‚ü∂ ¬¨Pa x y"
      by blast
    then have "¬¨(‚àÄPa. (‚àÄx y. R' x y ‚àß P x y ‚ü∂ Pa x y) ‚àß (‚àÄx y z. Pa x y ‚àß Pa y z ‚ü∂ Pa x z) ‚ü∂ Pa x y)"
      by (metis assms(1) assms(2) tranclp.r_into_trancl tranclp_trans) 
    then have "¬¨TC (Œªx y. R' x y ‚àß P x y) x y" 
      unfolding TC_def
      by blast
  }
  then show ?thesis
    using TC_equiv_tranclp
    by fast
qed

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma (relationScript.sml:314)‚Ä∫ 
lemma TC_INDUCT:
  fixes R :: "'a ‚áí 'a ‚áí bool" and P
  assumes "(‚àÄx y. R x y ‚ü∂ P x y)" "(‚àÄx y z. P x y ‚àß P y z ‚ü∂ P x z)" 
  shows "‚àÄu v. (TC R) u v ‚ü∂ P u v"
  using assms
  unfolding TC_def
  by metis

lemma REFL_IMP_3_CONJ_1:
  fixes R P x y
  assumes "((Œªx y. R x y ‚àß P x y)‚áß+‚áß+ x y)"
  shows "R‚áß+‚áß+ x y" 
  using assms 
proof -
  show ?thesis
    using assms TC_IMP_NOT_TC_CONJ_1
    by fast
qed

lemma REFL_IMP_3_CONJ:
  fixes R'
  assumes "reflexive R'" 
  shows "(‚àÄP x y. 
    (R'‚áß+‚áß+ x y) ‚ü∂ ( ((Œªx y. R' x y ‚àß P x ‚àß P y)‚áß+‚áß+ x y) ‚à® (‚àÉz. ¬¨P z ‚àß R'‚áß+‚áß+ x z ‚àß R'‚áß+‚áß+ z y)))"
proof -
  {
    fix P
    {
      have "‚àÄx y. R' x y ‚ü∂ (Œªx y. R' x y ‚àß P x ‚àß P y)‚áß+‚áß+ x y ‚à® (‚àÉz. ¬¨ P z ‚àß R'‚áß+‚áß+ x z ‚àß R'‚áß+‚áß+ z y)" 
      proof (auto)
        fix x y
        assume P: "R' x y" "‚àÄz. R'‚áß+‚áß+ x z ‚ü∂ P z ‚à® ¬¨ R'‚áß+‚áß+ z y"
        then show "(Œªx y. R' x y ‚àß P x ‚àß P y)‚áß+‚áß+ x y"
        proof -
          have a: "‚ãÄa. ¬¨ R' x a ‚à® ¬¨ R' a y ‚à® P a"
            using P(2)
            by blast
          have "reflexive R'"
            by (meson assms)
          then show ?thesis
            using a P(1)
            by (simp add: reflexive_def tranclp.r_into_trancl)
        qed
      qed
    }
    moreover {
      have "‚àÄx y z. ((Œªx y. R' x y ‚àß P x ‚àß P y)‚áß+‚áß+ x y ‚à® (‚àÉz. ¬¨ P z ‚àß R'‚áß+‚áß+ x z ‚àß R'‚áß+‚áß+ z y)) ‚àß
         ((Œªx y. R' x y ‚àß P x ‚àß P y)‚áß+‚áß+ y z ‚à® (‚àÉza. ¬¨ P za ‚àß R'‚áß+‚áß+ y za ‚àß R'‚áß+‚áß+ za z)) ‚ü∂
         (Œªx y. R' x y ‚àß P x ‚àß P y)‚áß+‚áß+ x z ‚à® (‚àÉza. ¬¨ P za ‚àß R'‚áß+‚áß+ x za ‚àß R'‚áß+‚áß+ za z)" 
      proof (auto)
        fix x y z za
        assume P: "‚àÄza. R'‚áß+‚áß+ x za ‚ü∂ P za ‚à® ¬¨ R'‚áß+‚áß+ za z" "(Œªx y. R' x y ‚àß P x ‚àß P y)‚áß+‚áß+ x y"
          "¬¨ P za" "R'‚áß+‚áß+ y za" "R'‚áß+‚áß+ za z" 
        then show "(Œªx y. R' x y ‚àß P x ‚àß P y)‚áß+‚áß+ x z"
          using P
          by (meson P rtranclp_tranclp_tranclp TC_IMP_NOT_TC_CONJ_1  tranclp_into_rtranclp)
      next 
        fix x y z za
        assume P: "‚àÄza. R'‚áß+‚áß+ x za ‚ü∂ P za ‚à® ¬¨ R'‚áß+‚áß+ za z" "¬¨ P za" "R'‚áß+‚áß+ x za" "R'‚áß+‚áß+ za y" 
          "(Œªx y. R' x y ‚àß P x ‚àß P y)‚áß+‚áß+ y z" 
        then show "(Œªx y. R' x y ‚àß P x ‚àß P y)‚áß+‚áß+ x z"
          by (meson P TC_IMP_NOT_TC_CONJ_1 tranclp_trans)
      qed
    }
    ultimately have "‚àÄu v. 
      TC R' u v 
      ‚ü∂ (Œªx y. R' x y ‚àß P x ‚àß P y)‚áß+‚áß+ u v ‚à® (‚àÉz. ¬¨ P z ‚àß R'‚áß+‚áß+ u z ‚àß R'‚áß+‚áß+ z v)"
      using TC_INDUCT[where R="R'" and
          P="Œªx y. ( ((Œªx y. R' x y ‚àß P x ‚àß P y)‚áß+‚áß+ x y) ‚à® (‚àÉz. ¬¨P z ‚àß R'‚áß+‚áß+ x z ‚àß R'‚áß+‚áß+ z y))"]
      by fast
  }
  then show ?thesis 
    by (simp add: TC_equiv_tranclp)
qed

lemma REFL_TC_CONJ:
  fixes R R' :: "'a ‚áí 'a ‚áí bool" and P x y
  assumes "reflexive R'" "‚àÄx y. P x ‚àß P y ‚ü∂ (R' x y ‚ü∂ R x y)" "¬¨(R‚áß+‚áß+ x y)"
  shows "(¬¨(R'‚áß+‚áß+ x y) ‚à® (‚àÉz. ¬¨P z ‚àß (R')‚áß+‚áß+ x z ‚àß (R')‚áß+‚áß+ z y))"
  using assms
proof (cases "¬¨R'‚áß+‚áß+ x y")
next
  case False
  then show ?thesis using assms 
      TC_IMP_NOT_TC_CONJ[where P="Œªx y. P x ‚àß P y"]
      REFL_IMP_3_CONJ[of R']
    by blast
qed blast

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE 
  This is not a trivial translation: 'TC\_INDUCT' in relationScript.sml:314 differs significantly
from 'trancl\_induct' and 'trancl\_trans\_induct' in Transitive\_Closure:375, 391‚Ä∫
lemma TC_CASES1_NEQ:
  fixes R x z
  assumes "R‚áß+‚áß+ x z"
  shows "R x z ‚à® (‚àÉy :: 'a. ¬¨(x = y) ‚àß ¬¨(y = z) ‚àß R x y ‚àß R‚áß+‚áß+ y z)"
proof -
  {
    fix u v
    have "‚àÄx y. R x y ‚ü∂ R x y ‚à® (‚àÉya. x ‚â† ya ‚àß ya ‚â† y ‚àß R x ya ‚àß R‚áß+‚áß+ ya y)"
      by meson
    moreover have "‚àÄx y z. 
      (R x y ‚à® (‚àÉya. x ‚â† ya ‚àß ya ‚â† y ‚àß R x ya ‚àß R‚áß+‚áß+ ya y)) 
      ‚àß (R y z ‚à® (‚àÉya. y ‚â† ya ‚àß ya ‚â† z ‚àß R y ya ‚àß R‚áß+‚áß+ ya z)) 
      ‚ü∂ R x z ‚à® (‚àÉy. x ‚â† y ‚àß y ‚â† z ‚àß R x y ‚àß R‚áß+‚áß+ y z)"
      by (metis tranclp.r_into_trancl tranclp_trans)
    ultimately have "TC R u v ‚ü∂ R u v ‚à® (‚àÉy. u ‚â† y ‚àß y ‚â† v ‚àß R u y ‚àß R‚áß+‚áß+ y v)" 
      using TC_INDUCT[where P="Œªx z. R x z ‚à® (‚àÉy :: 'a. ¬¨(x = y) ‚àß ¬¨(y = z) ‚àß R x y ‚àß R‚áß+‚áß+ y z)"]
      by blast
  }
  then show ?thesis 
    using assms TC_equiv_tranclp
    by (simp add: TC_equiv_tranclp)
qed
end

Theory Dependency

theory Dependency
  imports Main "HOL-Library.Finite_Map" FactoredSystem ActionSeqProcess RelUtils
begin 


section ‚ÄπDependency‚Ä∫

text ‚Äπ State variable dependency analysis may be used to find structure in a factored system and 
find useful projections, for example on variable sets which are closed under mutual dependency. 
[Abdulaziz et al., p.13]

In the following the dependency predicate (`dep`) is formalized and some dependency related 
propositions are proven. Dependency between variables `v1`, `v2` w.r.t to an action set @{term "Œ¥"} is given
if one of the following holds:
  (1) `v1` and `v2` are equal
  (2) an action @{term "(p, e) ‚àà Œ¥"} exists where @{term "v1 ‚àà ùíü(p)"} and @{term "v2 ‚àà ùíü(e)"} (meaning that it is a
necessary condition that `p v1` is given if the action has effect `e v2`).
  (3) or, an action @{term "(p, e) ‚àà Œ¥"} exists s.t. @{term "v1 v2 ‚àà ùíü(e)"}
This notion is extended to sets of variables `vs1`, `vs2` (`dep\_var\_set`): `vs1` and `vs2` are 
dependent iff `vs1` and `vs2` are disjoint and if dependent `v1`, `v2` exist where @{term "v1 ‚àà vs1"}, 
@{term "v2 ‚àà vs2"}. [Abdulaziz et al., Definition 7, p.13][Abdulaziz et al., HOL4 Definition 5, p.14] ‚Ä∫


subsection ‚ÄπDependent Variables and Variable Sets‚Ä∫

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE name shortened to 'dep'.‚Ä∫
definition dep where
  "dep PROB v1 v2 ‚â° (‚àÉa. 
    a ‚àà PROB 
    ‚àß (
      ((v1 ‚àà fmdom' (fst a)) ‚àß (v2 ‚àà fmdom' (snd a))) 
      ‚à® ((v1 ‚àà fmdom' (snd a) ‚àß v2 ‚àà fmdom' (snd a)))
    )
  ) 
    ‚à® (v1 = v2)"

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE name shortened to 'dep\_var\_set'.‚Ä∫
definition dep_var_set where
  "dep_var_set PROB vs1 vs2 ‚â° (disjnt vs1 vs2) ‚àß 
                              (‚àÉ v1 v2. (v1 ‚àà vs1) ‚àß (v2 ‚àà vs2) ‚àß (dep PROB v1 v2)
  )"


lemma  dep_var_set_self_empty: 
  fixes PROB vs
  assumes "dep_var_set PROB vs vs"
  shows "(vs = {})"
  using assms
  unfolding dep_var_set_def
proof -
  obtain v1 v2 where
    "v1 ‚àà vs" "v2 ‚àà vs" "disjnt vs vs" "dep PROB v1 v2" 
    using assms 
    unfolding dep_var_set_def
    by blast
  then show ?thesis
    by force
qed


lemma DEP_REFL: 
  fixes PROB 
  shows "reflexive (Œªv v'. dep PROB v v')"
  unfolding dep_def reflexive_def
  by presburger


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫ 
lemma NEQ_DEP_IMP_IN_DOM_i:
  fixes a v
  assumes "a ‚àà PROB" "v ‚àà fmdom' (fst a)"
  shows "v ‚àà prob_dom PROB"
proof -
  have "v ‚àà fmdom' (fst a)"
    using assms(2)
    by simp
  moreover have "fmdom' (fst a) ‚äÜ prob_dom PROB" 
    using assms(1)
    unfolding prob_dom_def action_dom_def
    using case_prod_beta' 
    by auto
  ultimately show ?thesis
    by blast
qed

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫ 
lemma NEQ_DEP_IMP_IN_DOM_ii:
  fixes a v
  assumes "a ‚àà PROB" "v ‚àà fmdom' (snd a)"
  shows "v ‚àà prob_dom PROB"
proof -
  have "v ‚àà fmdom' (snd a)"
    using assms(2)
    by simp
  moreover have "fmdom' (snd a) ‚äÜ prob_dom PROB" 
    using assms(1)
    unfolding prob_dom_def action_dom_def
    using case_prod_beta' 
    by auto
  ultimately show ?thesis
    by blast
qed

lemma NEQ_DEP_IMP_IN_DOM: 
  fixes PROB :: "(('a, 'b) fmap √ó ('a, 'b) fmap) set" and  v v'
  assumes "¬¨(v = v')" "(dep PROB v v')" 
  shows "(v ‚àà (prob_dom PROB) ‚àß v' ‚àà (prob_dom PROB))"
  using assms 
  unfolding dep_def 
  using FDOM_pre_subset_prob_dom_pair FDOM_eff_subset_prob_dom_pair
proof -
  obtain a where 1:
    "a ‚àà PROB"
    "(v ‚àà fmdom' (fst a) ‚àß v' ‚àà fmdom' (snd a) ‚à® v ‚àà fmdom' (snd a) ‚àß v' ‚àà fmdom' (snd a))"
    using assms
    unfolding dep_def
    by blast
  then consider 
    (i) "v ‚àà fmdom' (fst a) ‚àß v' ‚àà fmdom' (snd a)"
    | (ii) "v ‚àà fmdom' (snd a) ‚àß v' ‚àà fmdom' (snd a)" 
    by blast
  then show ?thesis 
  proof (cases)
    case i
    then have "v ‚àà fmdom' (fst a)" "v' ‚àà fmdom' (snd a)"
      by simp+
    then have "v ‚àà prob_dom PROB"  "v' ‚àà prob_dom PROB" 
      using 1 NEQ_DEP_IMP_IN_DOM_i NEQ_DEP_IMP_IN_DOM_ii
      by metis+
    then show ?thesis
      by simp
  next
    case ii
    then have "v ‚àà fmdom' (snd a)" "v' ‚àà fmdom' (snd a)"
      by simp+
    then have "v ‚àà prob_dom PROB"  "v' ‚àà prob_dom PROB" 
      using 1 NEQ_DEP_IMP_IN_DOM_ii
      by metis+
    then show ?thesis
      by simp
  qed
qed


lemma dep_sos_imp_mem_dep: 
  fixes PROB S vs
  assumes "(dep_var_set PROB (‚ãÉ S) vs)"
  shows "(‚àÉvs'. vs' ‚àà S ‚àß dep_var_set PROB vs' vs)"
proof -
  obtain v1 v2 where obtain_v1_v2: "v1 ‚àà ‚ãÉS" "v2 ‚àà vs" "disjnt (‚ãÉS) vs" "dep PROB v1 v2"
    using assms dep_var_set_def[of PROB "‚ãÉ S" vs]
    by blast
  moreover
  {
    fix vs'
    assume "vs' ‚àà S" 
    moreover have "vs' ‚äÜ (‚ãÉS)"
      using calculation Union_upper
      by blast
    ultimately have "disjnt vs' vs" 
      using obtain_v1_v2(3) disjnt_subset1
      by blast
  }
  ultimately show ?thesis 
    unfolding dep_var_set_def
    by blast
qed


lemma dep_union_imp_or_dep: 
  fixes PROB vs vs' vs''
  assumes "(dep_var_set PROB vs (vs' ‚à™ vs''))"
  shows "(dep_var_set PROB vs vs' ‚à® dep_var_set PROB vs vs'')"
proof -
  obtain v1 v2 where 
    obtain_v1_v2: "v1 ‚àà vs" "v2 ‚àà vs' ‚à™ vs''" "disjnt vs (vs' ‚à™ vs'')" "dep PROB v1 v2"
    using assms dep_var_set_def[of PROB vs "(vs' ‚à™ vs'')"]
    by blast
      ‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE The proofs for the cases introduced here yield the goal's left and right side 
    respectively.‚Ä∫
  consider (i) "v2 ‚àà vs'" | (ii) "v2 ‚àà vs''" 
    using obtain_v1_v2(2) 
    by blast
  then show ?thesis 
  proof (cases)
    case i
    have "vs' ‚äÜ vs' ‚à™ vs''" 
      by auto
    moreover have "disjnt (vs' ‚à™ vs'') vs" 
      using obtain_v1_v2(3) disjnt_sym
      by blast
    ultimately have "disjnt vs vs'" 
      using disjnt_subset1 disjnt_sym
      by blast
    then have "dep_var_set PROB vs vs'" 
      unfolding dep_var_set_def 
      using obtain_v1_v2(1, 4) i
      by blast
    then show ?thesis 
      by simp
  next
    case ii
    then have "vs'' ‚äÜ vs' ‚à™ vs''" 
      by simp
    moreover have "disjnt (vs' ‚à™ vs'') vs" 
      using obtain_v1_v2(3) disjnt_sym
      by fast
    ultimately have "disjnt vs vs''" 
      using disjnt_subset1 disjnt_sym
      by metis
    then have "dep_var_set PROB vs vs''" 
      unfolding dep_var_set_def 
      using obtain_v1_v2(1, 4) ii 
      by blast
    then show ?thesis 
      by simp
  qed
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE This is symmetrical to `dep\_sos\_imp\_mem\_dep` w.r.t to `vs` and @{term "‚ãÉ S"}.‚Ä∫
lemma dep_biunion_imp_or_dep: 
  fixes PROB vs S
  assumes "(dep_var_set PROB vs (‚ãÉS))"
  shows "(‚àÉvs'. vs' ‚àà S ‚àß dep_var_set PROB vs vs')"
proof -
  obtain v1 v2 where obtain_v1_v2: "v1 ‚àà vs" "v2 ‚àà (‚ãÉS)" "disjnt vs (‚ãÉS)" "dep PROB v1 v2"
    using assms dep_var_set_def[of PROB vs "‚ãÉ S"]
    by blast
  moreover
  {
    fix vs'
    assume "vs' ‚àà S" 
    then have "vs' ‚äÜ (‚ãÉS)"
      using calculation Union_upper
      by blast
    moreover have "disjnt (‚ãÉS) vs" 
      using obtain_v1_v2(3) disjnt_sym
      by blast
    ultimately have "disjnt vs vs'" 
      using obtain_v1_v2(3) disjnt_subset1 disjnt_sym
      by metis
  }
  ultimately show ?thesis 
    unfolding dep_var_set_def
    by blast
qed


subsection "Transitive Closure of Dependent Variables and Variable Sets"


definition dep_tc where
  "dep_tc PROB = TC (Œªv1' v2'. dep PROB v1' v2')"


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE type of `PROB` had to be fixed for MP on `NEQ\_DEP\_IMP\_IN\_DOM`.‚Ä∫
lemma dep_tc_imp_in_dom: 
  fixes PROB :: "(('a, 'b) fmap √ó ('a, 'b) fmap) set" and v1 v2
  assumes "¬¨(v1 = v2)" "(dep_tc PROB v1 v2)"
  shows "(v1 ‚àà prob_dom PROB)"
proof -
  have "TC (dep PROB) v1 v2" 
    using assms(2) 
    unfolding dep_tc_def
    by simp
  then have "dep PROB v1 v2 ‚à® (‚àÉy. v1 ‚â† y ‚àß y ‚â† v2 ‚àß dep PROB v1 y ‚àß TC (dep PROB) y v2)"
    using TC_CASES1_NEQ[where R = "(Œªv1' v2'. dep PROB v1' v2')" and x = v1 and z = v2]
    by (simp add: TC_equiv_tranclp)
      ‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE Split on the disjunction yielded by the previous step.‚Ä∫
  then consider 
    (i) "dep PROB v1 v2" 
    | (ii) "(‚àÉy. v1 ‚â† y ‚àß y ‚â† v2 ‚àß dep PROB v1 y ‚àß TC (dep PROB) y v2)"
    by fast 
  then show ?thesis 
  proof (cases)
    case i
    {
      consider 
        (II) "(‚àÉa. 
            a ‚àà PROB ‚àß
            (
              v1 ‚àà fmdom' (fst a) ‚àß v2 ‚àà fmdom' (snd a) 
              ‚à® v1 ‚àà fmdom' (snd a) ‚àß v2 ‚àà fmdom' (snd a)))"
        | (III) "v1 = v2"
        using i 
        unfolding dep_def 
        by blast
      then have ?thesis 
      proof (cases)
        case II
        then obtain a where 1:
          "a ‚àà PROB" "(v1 ‚àà fmdom' (fst a) ‚àß v2 ‚àà fmdom' (snd a) 
              ‚à® v1 ‚àà fmdom' (snd a) ‚àß v2 ‚àà fmdom' (snd a))"
          by blast
        then have "v1 ‚àà fmdom' (fst a) ‚à™ fmdom' (snd a)" 
          by blast 
        then have 2: "v1 ‚àà action_dom (fst a) (snd a)" 
          unfolding action_dom_def
          by blast 
        then have "action_dom (fst a) (snd a) ‚äÜ prob_dom PROB" 
          using 1(1) exec_as_proj_valid_2
          by fast
        then have "v1 ‚àà prob_dom PROB"
          using 1 2
          by fast
        then show ?thesis
          by simp
      next
        case III
        then show ?thesis 
          using assms(1)
          by simp 
      qed
    }
    then show ?thesis
      by simp
  next
    case ii
    then obtain y where "v1 ‚â† y" "y ‚â† v2" "dep PROB v1 y" "TC (dep PROB) y v2"
      using ii
      by blast
    then show ?thesis 
      using NEQ_DEP_IMP_IN_DOM 
      by metis
  qed
qed


lemma not_dep_disj_imp_not_dep: 
  fixes PROB vs_1 vs_2 vs_3
  assumes "((vs_1 ‚à© vs_2) = {})" "(vs_3 ‚äÜ vs_2)" "¬¨(dep_var_set PROB vs_1 vs_2)"
  shows "¬¨(dep_var_set PROB vs_1 vs_3)"
  using assms subset_eq
  unfolding dep_var_set_def disjnt_def
  by blast


lemma dep_slist_imp_mem_dep: 
  fixes PROB vs lvs
  assumes "(dep_var_set PROB (‚ãÉ (set lvs)) vs)"
  shows "(‚àÉvs'. ListMem vs' lvs ‚àß dep_var_set PROB vs' vs)"
proof -
  obtain v1 v2 where 
    obtain_v1_v2: "v1 ‚àà ‚ãÉ(set lvs)" "v2 ‚àà vs" "disjnt (‚ãÉ(set lvs)) vs" "dep PROB v1 v2" 
    using assms dep_var_set_def[of PROB "‚ãÉ (set lvs)" vs] 
    by blast
  then obtain vs' where obtain_vs': "vs' ‚àà set lvs" "v1 ‚àà vs'" 
    by blast
  then have "ListMem vs' lvs" 
    using ListMem_iff
    by fast
  moreover {
    have "disjnt vs' vs"
      using obtain_v1_v2(3) obtain_vs'(1) by auto
    then have "dep_var_set PROB vs' vs" 
      unfolding dep_var_set_def 
      using obtain_v1_v2(1, 2, 4) obtain_vs'(2)
      by blast
  }
  ultimately show ?thesis
    by blast
qed


lemma n_bigunion_le_sum_3: 
  fixes PROB vs svs
  assumes "(‚àÄ vs'. vs' ‚àà svs ‚ü∂ ¬¨(dep_var_set PROB vs' vs))"
  shows "¬¨(dep_var_set PROB (‚ãÉsvs) vs)"
proof -
  {
    assume "(dep_var_set PROB (‚ãÉsvs) vs)"
    then obtain v1 v2 where obtain_vs: "v1 ‚àà ‚ãÉsvs" "v2 ‚àà vs" "disjnt (‚ãÉsvs) vs" "dep PROB v1 v2"
      unfolding dep_var_set_def
      by blast
    then obtain vs' where obtain_vs': "v1 ‚àà vs'" "vs' ‚àà svs" 
      by blast 
    then have a: "disjnt vs' vs" 
      using obtain_vs(3) obtain_vs'(2) disjnt_subset1 
      by blast
    then have "‚àÄv1 v2. ¬¨(v1 ‚àà vs') ‚à® ¬¨(v2 ‚àà vs) ‚à® ¬¨disjnt vs' vs ‚à® ¬¨dep PROB v1 v2" 
      using assms obtain_vs'(2) dep_var_set_def
      by fast
    then have False
      using a obtain_vs'(1) obtain_vs(2, 4)
      by blast
  }
  then show ?thesis
    by blast
qed


lemma disj_not_dep_vset_union_imp_or:
  fixes PROB a vs vs' 
  assumes "(a ‚àà PROB)" "(disjnt vs vs')" 
    "(¬¨(dep_var_set PROB vs' vs) ‚à® ¬¨(dep_var_set PROB vs vs'))"
    "(varset_action a (vs ‚à™ vs'))"
  shows "(varset_action a vs ‚à® varset_action a vs')"
  using assms
  unfolding varset_action_def dep_var_set_def dep_def
proof -
  assume a1: "fmdom' (snd a) ‚äÜ vs ‚à™ vs'"
  assume "disjnt vs vs'"
  assume " ¬¨ (disjnt vs' vs ‚àß
        (‚àÉv1 v2. v1 ‚àà vs' ‚àß v2 ‚àà vs ‚àß ((‚àÉa. a ‚àà PROB ‚àß (v1 ‚àà fmdom' (fst a) ‚àß v2 ‚àà fmdom' (snd a) ‚à® v1 ‚àà fmdom' (snd a) ‚àß v2 ‚àà fmdom' (snd a))) ‚à® v1 = v2))) ‚à®
       ¬¨ (disjnt vs vs' ‚àß
        (‚àÉv1 v2. v1 ‚àà vs ‚àß v2 ‚àà vs' ‚àß ((‚àÉa. a ‚àà PROB ‚àß (v1 ‚àà fmdom' (fst a) ‚àß v2 ‚àà fmdom' (snd a) ‚à® v1 ‚àà fmdom' (snd a) ‚àß v2 ‚àà fmdom' (snd a))) ‚à® v1 = v2))) "
  then have f2: "‚ãÄaa ab. aa ‚àâ vs ‚à® ab ‚àâ vs' ‚à® aa ‚àâ fmdom' (snd a) ‚à® ab ‚àâ fmdom' (snd a)"
    using ‚Äπa ‚àà PROB‚Ä∫ ‚Äπdisjnt vs vs'‚Ä∫ disjnt_sym by blast
  obtain aa :: "'a set ‚áí 'a set ‚áí 'a" where
    f3: "‚ãÄA Aa a Ab Ac. (A ‚äÜ Aa ‚à® aa A Aa ‚àà A) ‚àß (aa A Aa ‚àâ Aa ‚à® A ‚äÜ Aa) 
      ‚àß ((a::'a) ‚àâ Ab ‚à® ¬¨ Ab ‚äÜ Ac ‚à® a ‚àà Ac)"
    by moura
  then have "‚ãÄA. fmdom' (snd a) ‚äÜ A ‚à® aa (fmdom' (snd a)) A ‚àà vs ‚à® aa (fmdom' (snd a)) A ‚àà vs'"
    using a1 by (meson Un_iff)
  then show "fmdom' (snd a) ‚äÜ vs ‚à® fmdom' (snd a) ‚äÜ vs'"
    using f3 f2 by meson
qed


end

Theory Invariants

theory Invariants
  imports Main "FactoredSystem"
begin

definition fdom :: "('a ‚áí 'b) ‚áí 'a set" where 
  "fdom f ‚â° {x. ‚àÉy. f x = y}"

‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO function domain for total function in Isabelle/HOL?‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO why is fm total? Shouldn't it be partial and thus needing the the premise `fm x = Some True` instead of just `fm x`?‚Ä∫
definition invariant :: "('a ‚áí bool) ‚áí bool" where
  "invariant fm ‚â° (‚àÄx. (x ‚àà fdom fm ‚àß fm x) ‚ü∂ False) ‚àß (‚àÉx. x ‚àà fdom fm ‚àß fm x)"

end

Theory SetUtils

theory SetUtils
  imports Main
begin

‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO use Inf instead of Min where necessary.‚Ä∫

‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO can be replaced by @{term "card_Un_disjoint (‚ü¶finite A; finite B; A ‚à© B = {}‚üß 
  ‚üπ card (A ‚à™ B) = card A + card B)"} ?‚Ä∫
lemma card_union': "(finite s) ‚àß (finite t) ‚àß (disjnt s t) ‚üπ (card (s ‚à™ t) = card s + card t)"
  by (simp add: card_Un_disjoint disjnt_def)

lemma CARD_INJ_IMAGE_2: 
  fixes f s
  assumes "finite s" "(‚àÄx y. ((x ‚àà s) ‚àß (y ‚àà s)) ‚ü∂ ((f x = f y) ‚ü∑ (x = y)))"
  shows "(card (f ` s) = card s)"
proof -
  {
    fix x y
    assume "x ‚àà s" "y ‚àà s" 
    then have "f x = f y ‚ü∂ x = y"
      using assms(2)
      by blast
  }
  then have "inj_on f s"
    by (simp add: inj_onI)
  then show ?thesis
    using assms(1) inj_on_iff_eq_card
    by blast
qed

lemma scc_main_lemma_x: "‚ãÄs t x. (x ‚àà s) ‚àß ¬¨(x ‚àà t) ‚üπ ¬¨(s = t)"
  by blast

lemma neq_funs_neq_images:
  fixes s 
  assumes "‚àÄx. x ‚àà s ‚ü∂ (‚àÄy. y ‚àà s ‚ü∂ f1 x ‚â† f2 y)" "‚àÉx. x ‚àà s" 
  shows "f1 ` s ‚â† f2 ` s"
  using assms 
  by blast 

subsection "Sets of Numbers"

‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO 
  Is '<=' natural number lte or overloaded? 
  If it's overloaded for reals, this might be wrong (e.g. the real set s = [0; 1] is not finite even 
though @{term "‚àÄ x ‚àà s. x ‚â§ 1"} holds).‚Ä∫
lemma mems_le_finite_i: 
  fixes s :: "nat set" and k :: nat
  shows "(‚àÄ x. x ‚àà s ‚ü∂ x ‚â§ k) ‚üπ finite s"
proof -
  assume P: "(‚àÄ x. x ‚àà s ‚ü∂ x ‚â§ k)"
  let ?f = "id :: nat ‚áí nat"
  let ?S = "{i. i ‚â§ k}"
  have "s ‚äÜ ?S" using P by blast
  moreover have "?f ` ?S = ?S" by auto
  moreover have "finite ?S" using nat_seg_image_imp_finite by auto
  moreover have "finite s" using calculation finite_subset by auto
  ultimately show ?thesis by auto
qed
lemma mems_le_finite: 
  fixes s :: "nat set" and k :: nat
  shows "‚ãÄ(s :: nat set) k. (‚àÄ x. x ‚àà s ‚ü∂ x ‚â§ k) ‚üπ finite s"  
  using mems_le_finite_i by auto

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE translated `s` to `nat set` (more generality wasn't required.).‚Ä∫ 
lemma mem_le_imp_MIN_le: 
  fixes s :: "nat set" and k :: nat 
  assumes "‚àÉx. (x ‚àà s) ‚àß (x ‚â§ k)" 
  shows "(Inf s ‚â§ k)" 
proof -
  from assms obtain x where 1: "x ‚àà s" "x ‚â§ k"
    by blast
  {
    assume C: "Inf s > k"
    then have "Inf s > x" using 1(2)
      by fastforce
    then have False 
      using 1(1) cInf_lower leD
      by fast
  }
  then show ?thesis
    by fastforce
qed

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE 
  nat --> bool is the type of a HOL4 set and was translated to 'nat set'.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE 
  We cannot use 'Min' instead of 'Inf' because there is no indication that '{n. s n}' will be
finite. Without that @{term "Min {n. s n} ‚àà {n. s n}"} is not necessarily true.‚Ä∫
lemma mem_lt_imp_MIN_lt: 
  fixes s :: "nat set" and k :: nat
  assumes "(‚àÉx. x ‚àà s ‚àß x < k)"
  shows "(Inf s) < k" 
proof -
  obtain x where 1: "x ‚àà s" "x < k"
    using assms
    by blast
  then have 2: "s ‚â† {}" 
    by blast
  then have "Inf s ‚àà s" 
    using Inf_nat_def LeastI
    by force
  moreover have "‚àÄx‚ààs. Inf s ‚â§ x"
    by (simp add: cInf_lower)
  ultimately show "(Inf s) < k"
    using assms leD 
    by force
qed

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE type for 'k' had to be fixed (type unordered error; also not true for e.g. real sets).‚Ä∫
lemma bound_child_parent_neq_mems_state_set_neq_len: 
  fixes s and k :: nat
  assumes "(‚àÄx. x ‚àà s ‚ü∂ x < k)"
  shows "finite s"
  using assms bounded_nat_set_is_finite 
  by blast 

lemma bound_main_lemma_2: "‚ãÄ(s :: nat set) k. (s ‚â† {}) ‚àß (‚àÄx. x ‚àà s ‚ü∂ x ‚â§ k) ‚üπ Sup s ‚â§ k"
proof -
  fix s :: "nat set" and k
  {
    assume P1: "s ‚â† {}"
    assume P2: "(‚àÄx. x ‚àà s ‚ü∂ x ‚â§ k)"
    have "finite s" using P2 mems_le_finite by auto
    moreover have "Max s ‚àà s" using P1 calculation Max_in by auto
    moreover have "Max s ‚â§ k" using P2 calculation by auto 
  }
  then show "(s ‚â† {}) ‚àß (‚àÄx. x ‚àà s ‚ü∂ x ‚â§ k) ‚üπ Sup s ‚â§ k"
    by (simp add: Sup_nat_def)
qed

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE type of 'k' fixed to nat to be able to use 'bound\_child\_parent\_neq\_mems\_state\_set\_neq\_len'.‚Ä∫
lemma bound_child_parent_not_eq_last_diff_paths: "‚ãÄs (k :: nat).
  (s ‚â† {}) 
  ‚üπ (‚àÄx. x ‚àà s ‚ü∂ x < k) 
  ‚üπ Sup s < k
"
  by (simp add: Sup_nat_def bound_child_parent_neq_mems_state_set_neq_len)

lemma FINITE_ALL_DISTINCT_LISTS_i:
  fixes P
  assumes "finite P"
  shows "
    {p. distinct p ‚àß set p ‚äÜ P} 
    = {[]} ‚à™ (‚ãÉ ((Œªe. {e # p0 | p0. distinct p0 ‚àß set p0 ‚äÜ (P - {e})}) ` P))"
proof -
  let ?A="{p. distinct p ‚àß set p ‚äÜ P }"
  let ?B="{[]} ‚à™ (‚ãÉ ((Œªe. {e # p0 | p0. distinct p0 ‚àß set p0 ‚äÜ (P - {e})}) ` P))"
  {
    {
      fix a
      assume P: "a ‚àà ?A"
      then have "a ‚àà ?B" 
      proof (cases a)
        text ‚Äπ The empty list is distinct and its corresponding set is the empty set which is a 
            trivial subset of `?B`. The `Nil` case can therefore be derived by automation. ‚Ä∫
        case (Cons h list)
        {
          let ?b'="h"
          {
            from P have "set a ‚äÜ P"
              by simp
            then have "set list ‚äÜ (P - {h})"
              using P dual_order.trans local.Cons 
              by auto
          }
          moreover from P Cons 
          have "distinct list"
            by force
          ultimately have "a ‚àà ((Œªe. {e # p0 | p0. distinct p0 ‚àß set p0 ‚äÜ (P - {e})}) ?b')"
            using Cons
            by blast
          moreover {
            from P Cons have "?b' ‚àà set a"
              by simp
            moreover from P have "set a ‚äÜ P"
              by simp
            ultimately have "?b' ‚àà P" 
              by auto
          }
          ultimately have 
            "‚àÉb' ‚àà P. a ‚àà ((Œªe. {e # p0 | p0. distinct p0 ‚àß set p0 ‚äÜ (P - {e})}) b')"
            by meson 
        }
        then obtain b' where
          "b' ‚àà P" "a ‚àà ((Œªe. {e # p0 | p0. distinct p0 ‚àß set p0 ‚äÜ (P - {e})}) b')"
          by blast
        then show ?thesis 
          by blast
      qed blast
    }
    then have "?A ‚äÜ ?B"
      by auto
  }
  moreover {
    {
      fix b
      assume P: "b ‚àà ?B"
      have "b ‚àà ?A" 
        text ‚Äπ The empty list is in `?B` by construction. The `Nil` case can therefore be derived  
          straightforwardly.‚Ä∫
      proof (cases b)
        case (Cons a list)
        from P Cons obtain b' where a: 
          "b' ‚àà P" "b ‚àà {b' # p0 | p0. distinct p0 ‚àß set p0 ‚äÜ (P - {b'})}"
          by fast
        then obtain p0 where b: "b = b' # p0" "distinct p0" "set p0 ‚äÜ (P - {b'})"
          by blast
        then have "distinct (b' # p0)"
          by (simp add: subset_Diff_insert)
        moreover have "set (b' # p0) ‚äÜ P"
          using a(1) b(3)
          by auto
        ultimately show ?thesis 
          using b(1)
          by fast
      qed simp
    }
    then have "?B ‚äÜ ?A"
      by blast
  }
  ultimately show ?thesis
    using set_eq_subset 
    by blast
qed

lemma FINITE_ALL_DISTINCT_LISTS:
  fixes P
  assumes "finite P"
  shows "finite {p. distinct p ‚àß set p ‚äÜ P}"
  using assms 
proof (induction "card P" arbitrary: P)
  case 0
  then have "P = {}"
    by force
  then show ?case 
    using 0
    by simp
next
  case (Suc x)
  {
    text ‚Äπ Proof the finiteness of the union by proving both sets of the union are finite. The 
      singleton set `{[]}` is trivially finite. ‚Ä∫
    {
      {
        fix e
        assume P: "e ‚àà P" 
        have "
          {e # p0 | p0. distinct p0 ‚àß set p0 ‚äÜ P - {e}} 
          = (Œªp. e # p) ` { p. distinct p ‚àß set p ‚äÜ P - {e}}" 
          by blast
        moreover {
          let ?P'="P - {e}"
          from Suc.prems 
          have "finite ?P'"
            by blast
          text ‚Äπ The finiteness can now be shown using the induction hypothesis. However `e` might
            already be contained in `?P`, so we have to split cases first. ‚Ä∫
          have "finite ((Œªp. e # p) ` {p. distinct p ‚àß set p ‚äÜ ?P'})" 
          proof (cases "e ‚àà P")
            case True
            then have "x = card ?P'" using Suc.prems Suc(2) 
              by fastforce
            moreover from Suc.prems 
            have "finite ?P'" 
              by blast
            ultimately show ?thesis 
              using Suc(1) 
              by blast
          next
            case False
            then have "?P' = P" 
              by simp
            then have "finite {p. distinct p ‚àß set p ‚äÜ ?P'}"
              using False P by linarith 
            then show ?thesis
              using finite_imageI
              by blast
          qed
        }
        ultimately have "finite {e # p0 | p0. distinct p0 ‚àß set p0 ‚äÜ (P - {e})}"
          by argo
      }
      then have "finite (‚ãÉ ((Œªe. {e # p0 | p0. distinct p0 ‚àß set p0 ‚äÜ (P - {e})}) ` P))"
        using Suc.prems
        by blast
    }
    then have 
      "finite ({[]} ‚à™ (‚ãÉ ((Œªe. {e # p0 | p0. distinct p0 ‚àß set p0 ‚äÜ (P - {e})}) ` P)))" 
      using finite_Un
      by blast    
  }
  then show ?case 
    using FINITE_ALL_DISTINCT_LISTS_i[OF Suc.prems]
    by force
qed

lemma subset_inter_diff_empty: 
  assumes "s ‚äÜ t" 
  shows "(s ‚à© (u - t) = {})" 
  using assms
  by auto

end

Theory TopologicalProps

theory TopologicalProps
  imports Main FactoredSystem ActionSeqProcess SetUtils
begin 


section "Topological Properties"
subsection "Basic Definitions and Properties"

definition PLS_charles where
  "PLS_charles s as PROB ‚â° {length as' | as'. 
    (as' ‚àà valid_plans PROB) ‚àß (exec_plan s as' = exec_plan s as)}"


definition MPLS_charles where
  "MPLS_charles PROB ‚â° {Inf (PLS_charles (fst p) (snd p) PROB) | p. 
    ((fst p) ‚àà valid_states PROB) 
    ‚àß ((snd p) ‚àà valid_plans PROB)
  }"


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE name shortened to 'problem\_plan\_bound\_charles'.‚Ä∫
definition problem_plan_bound_charles where
  "problem_plan_bound_charles PROB ‚â° Sup (MPLS_charles PROB)"


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE name shortened to 'PLS\_state'.‚Ä∫  
definition PLS_state_1 where
  "PLS_state_1 s as ‚â° length ` {as'. (exec_plan s as' = exec_plan s as)}"


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE name shortened to 'MPLS\_stage\_1'.‚Ä∫
definition MPLS_stage_1 where
  "MPLS_stage_1 PROB ‚â° 
    (Œª (s, as). Inf (PLS_state_1 s as)) 
    ` {(s, as). (s ‚àà valid_states PROB) ‚àß (as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)}
  "


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE name shortened to 'problem\_plan\_bound\_stage\_1'.‚Ä∫
definition problem_plan_bound_stage_1 where
  "problem_plan_bound_stage_1 PROB ‚â° Sup (MPLS_stage_1 PROB)"
for PROB :: "'a problem"


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE name shortened.‚Ä∫
definition PLS where
  "PLS s as ‚â° length ` {as'. (exec_plan s as' = exec_plan s as) ‚àß (subseq as' as)}"


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE proof finite PLS for use in 'proof in\_MPLS\_leq\_2\_pow\_n\_i'‚Ä∫ 
lemma finite_PLS: "finite (PLS s as)"
proof -
  let ?S = "{as'. (exec_plan s as' = exec_plan s as) ‚àß (subseq as' as)}"
  let ?S1 = "length ` {as'. (exec_plan s as' = exec_plan s as) }" 
  let ?S2 = "length ` {as'. (subseq as' as)}"
  let ?n = "length as + 1"
  have "finite ?S2"
    using bounded_nat_set_is_finite[where n = ?n and N = ?S2]
    by fastforce
  moreover have "length ` ?S ‚äÜ (?S1 ‚à© ?S2)"
    by blast
  ultimately have "finite (length ` ?S)"
    using infinite_super 
    by auto 
  then show ?thesis 
    unfolding PLS_def 
    by blast
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE name shortened.‚Ä∫
definition MPLS where
  "MPLS PROB ‚â°
    (Œª (s, as). Inf (PLS s as)) 
    ` {(s, as). (s ‚àà valid_states PROB) ‚àß (as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)}
  "


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE name shortened.‚Ä∫
definition problem_plan_bound where
  "problem_plan_bound PROB ‚â° Sup (MPLS PROB)"


lemma expanded_problem_plan_bound_thm_1: 
  fixes PROB
  shows " 
    (problem_plan_bound PROB) = Sup (
      (Œª(s,as). Inf (PLS s as)) `
      {(s, as). (s ‚àà (valid_states PROB)) ‚àß (as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)}
    )  
  "
  unfolding problem_plan_bound_def MPLS_def 
  by blast

lemma expanded_problem_plan_bound_thm: 
  fixes PROB :: "(('a, 'b) fmap √ó ('a, 'b) fmap) set"
  shows "
    problem_plan_bound PROB = Sup ({Inf (PLS s as) | s as. 
      (s ‚àà valid_states PROB) 
      ‚àß (as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)
    })
  "
proof -
  {
    have "(
        {Inf (PLS s as) | s as. (s ‚àà valid_states PROB) ‚àß (as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)}
      ) = ((Œª(s, as). Inf (PLS s as)) ` {(s, as).
        (s ‚àà valid_states PROB) 
        ‚àß (as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)
      })
    "
      by fast
    also have "‚Ä¶ = 
      (Œª(s, as). Inf (PLS s as)) ` 
      ({s. fmdom' s = prob_dom PROB} √ó {as. set as ‚äÜ PROB})
    "
      unfolding valid_states_def valid_plans_def
      by simp
    finally have "
      Sup ({Inf (PLS s as) | s as. (s ‚àà valid_states PROB) ‚àß (as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)})
      = Sup (
        (Œª(s, as). Inf (PLS s as)) ` 
        ({s. fmdom' s = prob_dom PROB} √ó {as. set as ‚äÜ PROB})
      )
    "
      by argo
  }
  moreover have "
    problem_plan_bound PROB 
    = 
      Sup ((Œª(s, as). Inf (PLS s as)) ` 
      ({s. fmdom' s = prob_dom PROB} √ó {as. set as ‚äÜ PROB}))
    " 
    unfolding problem_plan_bound_def MPLS_def valid_states_def valid_plans_def
    by fastforce
  ultimately show "
    problem_plan_bound PROB 
    = Sup ({Inf (PLS s as) | s as. 
      (s ‚àà valid_states PROB) 
      ‚àß (as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)
    })
  "
    by argo 
qed


subsection "Recurrence Diameter" 

text ‚Äπ The recurrence diameter---defined as the longest simple path in the digraph modelling the
state space---provides a loose upper bound on the system diameter. [Abdulaziz et al., Definition 9, 
p.15] ‚Ä∫

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE name shortened.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE 'fun' because of multiple defining equations, pattern matches.‚Ä∫
fun valid_path where
  "valid_path Pi [] = True"
| "valid_path Pi [s] = (s ‚àà valid_states Pi)"
| "valid_path Pi (s1 # s2 # rest) = (
  (s1 ‚àà valid_states Pi) 
  ‚àß (‚àÉa. (a ‚àà Pi) ‚àß (exec_plan s1 [a] = s2))
  ‚àß (valid_path Pi (s2 # rest))
)"


lemma valid_path_ITP2015: "
  (valid_path Pi [] ‚ü∑ True)
  ‚àß (valid_path Pi [s] ‚ü∑ (s ‚àà valid_states Pi))
  ‚àß (valid_path Pi (s1 # s2 # rest) ‚ü∑
      (s1 ‚àà valid_states Pi) 
      ‚àß (‚àÉa. 
        (a ‚àà Pi)
        ‚àß (exec_plan s1 [a] = s2)
      ) 
      ‚àß (valid_path Pi (s2 # rest))
  )
"
  using valid_states_def
  by simp


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE name shortened.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE second declaration skipped (declared twice in source).‚Ä∫
definition RD where
  "RD Pi ‚â° (Sup {length p - 1 | p. valid_path Pi p ‚àß distinct p})"
for Pi :: "'a problem"


lemma in_PLS_leq_2_pow_n: 
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem" and s :: "'a state" and as
  assumes "finite PROB" "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)" "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)" 
  shows "(‚àÉx. 
    (x ‚àà PLS s as) 
    ‚àß (x ‚â§ (2 ^ card (prob_dom PROB)) - 1)
  )"
proof -
  obtain as' where 1:
    "exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as'" "subseq as' as" "length as' ‚â§ 2 ^ card (prob_dom PROB) - 1" 
    using assms main_lemma 
    by blast
  let ?x="length as'"
  have "?x ‚àà PLS s as" 
    unfolding PLS_def
    using 1
    by simp
  moreover have "?x ‚â§ 2 ^ card (prob_dom PROB) - 1"
    using 1(3)
    by blast
  ultimately show "(‚àÉx. 
    (x ‚àà PLS s as) 
    ‚àß (x ‚â§ (2 ^ card (prob_dom PROB)) - 1)
  )" 
    unfolding PLS_def
    by blast
qed


lemma in_MPLS_leq_2_pow_n: 
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem" and x
  assumes "finite PROB" "(x ‚àà MPLS PROB)"
  shows "(x ‚â§ 2 ^ card (prob_dom PROB) - 1)" 
proof -
  let ?mpls = "MPLS PROB"
    ‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE obtain p = (s, as) where 'x = Inf (PLS s as)' from premise.‚Ä∫
  have "?mpls = 
    (Œª (s, as). Inf (PLS s as)) ` 
    {(s, as).  (s ‚àà valid_states PROB) ‚àß (as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)}
  "
    using MPLS_def 
    by blast
  then obtain s :: "('a, bool) fmap" and as :: "(('a, bool) fmap √ó ('a, bool) fmap) list" 
    where obtain_s_as: "x ‚àà 
      ((Œª (s, as). Inf (PLS s as)) ` 
      {(s, as). (s ‚àà valid_states PROB) ‚àß (as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)})
    "
    using assms(2) 
    by blast
  then have 
    "x ‚àà {Inf (PLS (fst p) (snd p)) | p. (fst p ‚àà valid_states PROB) ‚àß (snd p ‚àà valid_plans PROB)}" 
    using assms(1) obtain_s_as 
    by auto
  then have 
    "‚àÉ p. x = Inf (PLS (fst p) (snd p)) ‚àß (fst p ‚àà valid_states PROB) ‚àß (snd p ‚àà valid_plans PROB)" 
    by blast
  then obtain p :: "('a, bool) fmap √ó (('a, bool) fmap √ó ('a, bool) fmap) list" where obtain_p:
    "x = Inf (PLS (fst p) (snd p))" "(fst p ‚àà valid_states PROB)" "(snd p ‚àà valid_plans PROB)" 
    by blast 
  then have "fst p ‚àà valid_states PROB" "snd p ‚àà valid_plans PROB"
    using obtain_p 
    by blast+    
  then obtain x' :: nat where obtain_x':
    "x' ‚àà PLS (fst p) (snd p) ‚àß x' ‚â§ 2 ^ card (prob_dom PROB) - 1" 
    using assms(1) in_PLS_leq_2_pow_n[where s = "fst p" and as = "snd p"]
    by blast
  then have 1: "x' ‚â§ 2 ^ card (prob_dom PROB) - 1" "x' ‚àà PLS (fst p) (snd p)" 
    "x = Inf (PLS (fst p) (snd p))" "finite (PLS (fst p) (snd p))"
    using obtain_x' obtain_p finite_PLS 
    by blast+
  moreover have "x ‚â§ x'" 
    using 1(2, 4) obtain_p(1) cInf_le_finite
    by blast
  ultimately show "(x ‚â§ 2 ^ card (prob_dom PROB) - 1)"
    by linarith
qed


lemma FINITE_MPLS: 
  assumes "finite (Pi :: 'a problem)"
  shows "finite (MPLS Pi)"
proof -
  have "‚àÄx ‚àà MPLS Pi. x ‚â§ 2 ^ card (prob_dom Pi) - 1"
    using assms in_MPLS_leq_2_pow_n
    by blast
  then show "finite (MPLS Pi)" 
    using mems_le_finite[of "MPLS Pi" "2 ^ card (prob_dom Pi) - 1"]
    by blast
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE 'fun' because of multiple defining equations.‚Ä∫
fun statelist' where
  "statelist' s [] = [s]"
| "statelist' s (a # as) = (s # statelist' (state_succ s a) as)"


lemma LENGTH_statelist': 
  fixes as s
  shows "length (statelist' s as) = (length as + 1)"
  by (induction as arbitrary: s) auto


lemma valid_path_statelist': 
  fixes as and s :: "('a, 'b) fmap"
  assumes "(as ‚àà valid_plans Pi)" "(s ‚àà valid_states Pi)"
  shows "(valid_path Pi (statelist' s as))"
  using assms 
proof (induction as arbitrary: s Pi)
  case cons: (Cons a as)
  then have 1: "a ‚àà Pi" "as ‚àà valid_plans Pi"
    using valid_plan_valid_head valid_plan_valid_tail 
    by metis+
  then show ?case     
  proof (cases as)
    case Nil
    {
      have "state_succ s a ‚àà valid_states Pi"
        using 1 cons.prems(2) valid_action_valid_succ
        by blast
      then have "valid_path Pi [state_succ s a]"
        using 1 cons.prems(2) cons.IH
        by force
      moreover have "(‚àÉaa. aa ‚àà Pi ‚àß exec_plan s [aa] = state_succ s a)"
        using 1(1) 
        by fastforce
      ultimately have "valid_path Pi (statelist' s [a])" 
        using cons.prems(2)
        by simp
    }
    then show ?thesis 
      using Nil
      by blast
  next
    case (Cons b list)
    {
      have "s ‚àà valid_states Pi" 
        using cons.prems(2)
        by simp
          ‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO this step is inefficient (~5s).‚Ä∫
      then have 
        "valid_path Pi (state_succ s a # statelist' (state_succ (state_succ s a) b) list)"
        using 1 cons.IH cons.prems(2) Cons lemma_1_i
        by fastforce
      moreover have 
        "(‚àÉaa b. (aa, b) ‚àà Pi ‚àß state_succ s (aa, b) = state_succ s a)"
        using 1(1) surjective_pairing
        by metis
      ultimately have "valid_path Pi (statelist' s (a # b # list))" 
        using cons.prems(2)
        by auto
    }
    then show ?thesis 
      using Cons
      by blast
  qed
qed simp


‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO explicit proof.‚Ä∫
lemma statelist'_exec_plan: 
  fixes a s p
  assumes "(statelist' s as = p)"
  shows "(exec_plan s as = last p)"
  using assms 
  apply(induction as arbitrary: s p)
   apply(auto)
  apply(cases "as")
  by 
    (metis LENGTH_statelist' One_nat_def add_Suc_right list.size(3) nat.simps(3))
    (metis (no_types) LENGTH_statelist' One_nat_def add_Suc_right list.size(3) nat.simps(3))


lemma statelist'_EQ_NIL: "statelist' s as ‚â† []"
  by (cases as) auto


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
lemma statelist'_TAKE_i:
  assumes "Suc m ‚â§ length (a # as)"
  shows "m ‚â§ length as"
  using assms 
  by (induction as arbitrary: a m) auto

lemma statelist'_TAKE: 
  fixes as s p
  assumes "(statelist' s as = p)"
  shows "(‚àÄn. n ‚â§ length as ‚ü∂ (exec_plan s (take n as)) = (p ! n))" 
  using assms
proof (induction as arbitrary: s p)
  case Nil
  {
    fix n
    assume P1: "n ‚â§ length []"
    then have "exec_plan s (take n []) = s" 
      by simp
    moreover have "p ! 0 = s" 
      using Nil.prems 
      by force
    ultimately have "exec_plan s (take n []) = p ! n" 
      using P1
      by simp
  }
  then show ?case by blast
next
  case (Cons a as)
  {
    fix n
    assume P2: "n ‚â§ length (a # as)"
    then have "exec_plan s (take n (a # as)) = p ! n" 
      using Cons.prems 
    proof (cases "n = 0")
      case False
      then obtain m where a: "n = Suc m"
        using not0_implies_Suc
        by presburger
      moreover have b: "statelist' s (a # as) ! n = statelist' (state_succ s a) as ! m"
        using a nth_Cons_Suc
        by simp
      moreover have c: "exec_plan s (take n (a # as)) = exec_plan (state_succ s a) (take m as)"
        using a
        by force
      moreover have "m ‚â§ length as" 
        using a P2 statelist'_TAKE_i
        by simp
      moreover have 
        "exec_plan (state_succ s a) (take m as) = statelist' (state_succ s a) as ! m"
        using calculation(2, 3, 4) Cons.IH
        by blast
      ultimately show ?thesis 
        using Cons.prems
        by argo
    qed fastforce
  }
  then show ?case by blast
qed


lemma MPLS_nempty: 
  fixes PROB :: "(('a, 'b) fmap √ó ('a, 'b) fmap) set" 
  assumes "finite PROB"
  shows "MPLS PROB ‚â† {}"
proof -
  let ?S="{(s, as). s ‚àà valid_states PROB ‚àß as ‚àà valid_plans PROB}"
    ‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE type of 's' had to be fixed for 'valid\_states\_nempty'.‚Ä∫
  obtain s :: "('a, 'b) fmap"  where "s ‚àà valid_states PROB"
    using assms valid_states_nempty
    by blast
  moreover have "[] ‚àà valid_plans PROB"
    using empty_plan_is_valid
    by auto
  ultimately have "(s, []) ‚àà ?S" 
    by blast
  then show ?thesis 
    unfolding MPLS_def
    by blast
qed


theorem bound_main_lemma: 
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem" 
  assumes "finite PROB"
  shows "(problem_plan_bound PROB ‚â§ (2 ^ (card (prob_dom PROB))) - 1)"
proof -
  have "MPLS PROB ‚â† {}"
    using assms MPLS_nempty
    by auto
  moreover have "(‚àÄx. x ‚àà MPLS PROB ‚ü∂ x ‚â§ 2 ^ card (prob_dom PROB) - 1)"
    using assms in_MPLS_leq_2_pow_n
    by blast
  ultimately show ?thesis
    unfolding problem_plan_bound_def
    using cSup_least 
    by blast
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE types in premise had to be fixed to be able to match `valid\_as\_valid\_exec`.‚Ä∫
lemma bound_child_parent_card_state_set_cons: 
  fixes P f
  assumes "(‚àÄ(PROB :: 'a problem) as (s :: 'a state). 
    (P PROB) 
    ‚àß (as ‚àà valid_plans PROB) 
    ‚àß (s ‚àà valid_states PROB) 
    ‚ü∂ (‚àÉas'. 
      (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as') 
      ‚àß (subseq as' as) 
      ‚àß (length as' < f PROB)
    )
  )"
  shows "(‚àÄPROB s as. 
    (P PROB)
    ‚àß (as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)
    ‚àß (s ‚àà (valid_states PROB))
    ‚ü∂ (‚àÉx. 
      (x ‚àà PLS s as) 
      ‚àß (x < f PROB)
    )
  )"
proof -
  {
    fix PROB :: "'a problem" and as and s :: "'a state"
    assume P1: "(P PROB)" 
      "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
      "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)" 
      "(‚àÉas'. 
        (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as') 
        ‚àß (subseq as' as) 
        ‚àß (length as' < f PROB)
      )"
    have "(exec_plan s as ‚àà valid_states PROB)"
      using assms P1 valid_as_valid_exec
      by blast
    then have "(P PROB)
      ‚àß (as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)
      ‚àß (s ‚àà (valid_states PROB))
      ‚ü∂ (‚àÉx. 
        (x ‚àà PLS s as) 
        ‚àß (x < f PROB)
      )
    "
      unfolding PLS_def 
      using P1 
      by force
  }
  then show "(‚àÄPROB s as. 
    (P PROB)
    ‚àß (as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)
    ‚àß (s ‚àà (valid_states PROB))
    ‚ü∂ (‚àÉx. 
      (x ‚àà PLS s as) 
      ‚àß (x < f PROB)
    )
  )"
    using assms
    by simp
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE types of premise had to be fixed to be able to use lemma `bound\_child\_parent\_card\_state\_set\_cons`.‚Ä∫
lemma bound_on_all_plans_bounds_MPLS: 
  fixes P f
  assumes "(‚àÄ(PROB :: 'a problem) as (s :: 'a state).
    (P PROB) 
    ‚àß (s ‚àà valid_states PROB) 
    ‚àß (as ‚àà valid_plans PROB) 
    ‚ü∂ (‚àÉas'. 
      (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as') 
      ‚àß (subseq as' as) 
      ‚àß (length as' < f PROB)
    )
  )"
  shows "(‚àÄPROB x. P PROB
    ‚ü∂ (x ‚àà MPLS(PROB)) 
    ‚ü∂ (x < f PROB)
  )"
proof -
  {
    fix PROB :: "'a problem" and as and s :: "'a state"
    assume "(P PROB)"
      "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)"
      "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
      "(‚àÉas'. 
        (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as') 
        ‚àß (subseq as' as) 
        ‚àß (length as' < f PROB)
      )"
    then have "(‚àÉx. x ‚àà PLS s as ‚àß x < f PROB)"
      using assms(1) bound_child_parent_card_state_set_cons[where P = P and f = f]
      by presburger
  }
  note 1 = this
  {
    fix PROB x
    assume P1: "P PROB" "x ‚àà MPLS PROB"
      ‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO refactor 'x\_in\_MPLS\_if' and use here.‚Ä∫
    then obtain s as where a:
      "x = Inf (PLS s as)" "s ‚àà valid_states PROB" "as ‚àà valid_plans PROB"
      unfolding MPLS_def
      by auto
    moreover have "(‚àÉas'. 
      (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as') 
      ‚àß (subseq as' as) 
      ‚àß (length as' < f PROB)
    )"
      using P1(1) assms calculation(2, 3) 
      by blast
    ultimately obtain x' where "x' ‚àà PLS s as" "x' < f PROB"
      using P1 1
      by blast
    then have "x < f PROB"
      using a(1) mem_lt_imp_MIN_lt
      by fastforce
  }
  then show ?thesis
    by blast
qed


lemma bound_child_parent_card_state_set_cons_finite: 
  fixes P f
  assumes "(‚àÄPROB as s.
    P PROB ‚àß finite PROB ‚àß as ‚àà (valid_plans PROB) ‚àß s ‚àà (valid_states PROB) 
    ‚ü∂ (‚àÉas'. 
      (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as') 
      ‚àß subseq as' as 
      ‚àß length as' < f(PROB)
    )
  )"
  shows "(‚àÄPROB s as. 
    P PROB ‚àß finite PROB ‚àß as ‚àà (valid_plans PROB) ‚àß (s ‚àà (valid_states PROB))
    ‚ü∂ (‚àÉx. (x ‚àà PLS s as) ‚àß x < f PROB)
  )"
proof -
  {
    fix PROB s as
    assume "P PROB" "finite PROB" "as ‚àà (valid_plans PROB)" "s ‚àà (valid_states PROB)"
      " (‚àÉas'. 
        (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as') 
        ‚àß subseq as' as 
        ‚àß length as' < f PROB
      )"
      (* NOTE[1]
        moreover have "exec_plan s as ‚àà valid_states PROB" 
          using calculation valid_as_valid_exec by blast
    *)
    then obtain as' where 
      "(exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as')" "subseq as' as" "length as' < f PROB"
      by blast
    moreover have "length as' ‚àà PLS s as" 
      unfolding PLS_def
      using calculation
      by fastforce
    ultimately have "(‚àÉx. (x ‚àà PLS s as) ‚àß x < f PROB)"
      by blast
  }
  then show "(‚àÄPROB s as. 
    P PROB  
    ‚àß finite PROB
    ‚àß as ‚àà (valid_plans PROB)
    ‚àß (s ‚àà (valid_states PROB))
    ‚ü∂ (‚àÉx. (x ‚àà PLS s as) ‚àß x < f PROB)
  )" 
    using assms
    by auto
qed


lemma bound_on_all_plans_bounds_MPLS_finite: 
  fixes P f
  assumes "(‚àÄPROB as s. 
    P PROB ‚àß finite PROB ‚àß s ‚àà (valid_states PROB) ‚àß as ‚àà (valid_plans PROB) 
    ‚ü∂ (‚àÉas'. 
      (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as') 
      ‚àß subseq as' as 
      ‚àß length as' < f(PROB)
    )
  )"
  shows "(‚àÄPROB x. 
    P PROB ‚àß finite PROB 
    ‚ü∂ (x ‚àà MPLS PROB)
    ‚ü∂ x < f PROB
  )"
proof -
  {
    fix PROB x
    assume P1: "P PROB" "finite PROB" "x ‚àà MPLS PROB"
      ‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO refactor 'x\_in\_MPLS\_if' and use here.‚Ä∫
    then obtain s as where a:
      "x = Inf (PLS s as)" "s ‚àà valid_states PROB" "as ‚àà valid_plans PROB"
      unfolding MPLS_def
      by auto
    moreover have "(‚àÉas'. 
      (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as') 
      ‚àß (subseq as' as) 
      ‚àß (length as' < f PROB)
    )"
      using P1(1, 2) assms calculation(2, 3)
      by blast
    moreover obtain x' where "x' ‚àà PLS s as" "x' < f PROB"
      using PLS_def calculation(4)
      by fastforce 
    then have "x < f PROB" 
      using a(1) mem_lt_imp_MIN_lt 
      by fastforce
  }
  then show ?thesis
    using assms
    by blast
qed


lemma bound_on_all_plans_bounds_problem_plan_bound: 
  fixes P f
  assumes "(‚àÄPROB as s. 
    (P PROB) 
    ‚àß finite PROB
    ‚àß (s ‚àà valid_states PROB) 
    ‚àß (as ‚àà valid_plans PROB) 
    ‚ü∂ (‚àÉas'. 
      (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as')
      ‚àß (subseq as' as)
      ‚àß (length as' < f PROB)
    )
  )"
  shows "(‚àÄPROB. 
    (P PROB) 
    ‚àß finite PROB
    ‚ü∂ (problem_plan_bound PROB < f PROB)
  )"
proof -
  have 1: "‚àÄPROB x. 
    P PROB 
    ‚àß finite PROB 
    ‚ü∂ x ‚àà MPLS PROB   
    ‚ü∂ x < f PROB
  "
    using assms bound_on_all_plans_bounds_MPLS_finite
    by blast
  {
    fix PROB x
    assume "P PROB ‚àß finite PROB 
      ‚ü∂ x ‚àà MPLS PROB   
      ‚ü∂ x < f PROB
    "
    then have "‚àÄPROB.
      P PROB ‚àß finite PROB 
      ‚ü∂ problem_plan_bound PROB < f PROB
    " 
      unfolding problem_plan_bound_def
      using 1 bound_child_parent_not_eq_last_diff_paths 1 MPLS_nempty
      by metis
    then have "‚àÄPROB.
      P PROB ‚àß finite PROB 
      ‚ü∂ problem_plan_bound PROB < f PROB
    " 
      using MPLS_nempty
      by blast 

  }
  then show "(‚àÄPROB. 
    (P PROB) 
    ‚àß finite PROB
    ‚ü∂ (problem_plan_bound PROB < f PROB)
  )"
    using 1
    by blast
qed


lemma bound_child_parent_card_state_set_cons_thesis: 
  assumes "finite PROB" "(‚àÄas s. 
    as ‚àà (valid_plans PROB) 
    ‚àß s ‚àà (valid_states PROB) 
    ‚ü∂ (‚àÉas'. 
      (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as')
      ‚àß subseq as' as 
      ‚àß length as' < k
    ) 
  )" "as ‚àà (valid_plans PROB)" "(s ‚àà (valid_states PROB))" 
  shows "(‚àÉx. (x ‚àà PLS s as) ‚àß x < k)"
  unfolding PLS_def 
  using assms
  by fastforce


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO refactor/move up.‚Ä∫
lemma x_in_MPLS_if: 
  fixes x PROB 
  assumes "x ‚àà MPLS PROB"  
  shows "‚àÉs as. s ‚àà valid_states PROB ‚àß as ‚àà valid_plans PROB ‚àß x = Inf (PLS s as)" 
  using assms
  unfolding MPLS_def
  by fast

lemma bound_on_all_plans_bounds_MPLS_thesis: 
  assumes "finite PROB" "(‚àÄas s. 
    (s ‚àà valid_states PROB) 
    ‚àß (as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)
    ‚ü∂ (‚àÉas'. 
      (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as') 
      ‚àß (subseq as' as)
      ‚àß (length as' < k)
    )
  )" "(x ‚àà MPLS PROB)" 
  shows "(x < k)" 
proof -
  obtain s as where 1: "s ‚àà valid_states PROB" "as ‚àà valid_plans PROB" "x = Inf (PLS s as)"
    using assms(3) x_in_MPLS_if 
    by blast
  then obtain x' :: nat where "x' ‚àà PLS s as" "x' < k" 
    using assms(1, 2) bound_child_parent_card_state_set_cons_thesis 
    by blast
  then have "Inf (PLS s as) < k"
    using mem_lt_imp_MIN_lt 
    by blast
  then show "x < k" 
    using 1
    by simp
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
lemma bounded_MPLS_contains_supremum: 
  fixes PROB
  assumes "finite PROB" "(‚àÉk. ‚àÄx ‚àà MPLS PROB. x < k)" 
  shows "Sup (MPLS PROB) ‚àà MPLS PROB" 
proof -
  obtain k where "‚àÄx ‚àà MPLS PROB. x < k" 
    using assms(2)
    by blast
  moreover have "finite (MPLS PROB)"
    using assms(2) finite_nat_set_iff_bounded
    by presburger
  moreover have "MPLS PROB ‚â† {}" 
    using assms(1) MPLS_nempty
    by auto
  ultimately show "Sup (MPLS PROB) ‚àà MPLS PROB"
    unfolding Sup_nat_def
    by simp
qed

lemma bound_on_all_plans_bounds_problem_plan_bound_thesis': 
  assumes "finite PROB" "(‚àÄas s. 
      s ‚àà (valid_states PROB) 
      ‚àß as ‚àà (valid_plans PROB)
      ‚ü∂ (‚àÉas'. 
        (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as') 
        ‚àß subseq as' as 
        ‚àß length as' < k
      )
    )"
  shows "problem_plan_bound PROB < k" 
proof -
  have 1: "‚àÄx ‚àà MPLS PROB. x < k" 
    using assms(1, 2) bound_on_all_plans_bounds_MPLS_thesis 
    by blast
  then have "Sup (MPLS PROB) ‚àà MPLS PROB" 
    using assms(1) bounded_MPLS_contains_supremum 
    by auto
  then have "Sup (MPLS PROB) < k" 
    using 1
    by blast
  then show ?thesis 
    unfolding problem_plan_bound_def
    by simp
qed


lemma bound_on_all_plans_bounds_problem_plan_bound_thesis: 
  assumes "finite PROB" "(‚àÄas s. 
      (s ‚àà valid_states PROB) 
      ‚àß (as ‚àà valid_plans PROB) 
      ‚ü∂ (‚àÉas'. 
        (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as') 
        ‚àß (subseq as' as)
        ‚àß (length as' ‚â§ k)
      )
    )"
  shows "(problem_plan_bound PROB ‚â§ k)" 
proof -
  have 1: "‚àÄx‚ààMPLS PROB. x < k + 1" 
    using assms(1, 2) bound_on_all_plans_bounds_MPLS_thesis[where k = "k + 1"] Suc_eq_plus1 
      less_Suc_eq_le
    by metis
  then have "Sup (MPLS PROB) ‚àà MPLS PROB" 
    using assms(1) bounded_MPLS_contains_supremum 
    by fast
  then show "(problem_plan_bound PROB ‚â§ k)"
    unfolding problem_plan_bound_def 
    using 1
    by fastforce
qed


lemma  bound_on_all_plans_bounds_problem_plan_bound_: 
  fixes P f PROB
  assumes "(‚àÄPROB' as s. 
      finite PROB ‚àß (P PROB') ‚àß (s ‚àà valid_states PROB') ‚àß (as ‚àà valid_plans PROB') 
      ‚ü∂ (‚àÉas'. 
        (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as') 
        ‚àß (subseq as' as)
        ‚àß (length as' < f PROB')
      )
    )" "(P PROB)" "finite PROB" 
  shows "(problem_plan_bound PROB < f PROB)"
  unfolding problem_plan_bound_def MPLS_def
  using assms bound_on_all_plans_bounds_problem_plan_bound_thesis' expanded_problem_plan_bound_thm_1
  by metis


lemma S_VALID_AS_VALID_IMP_MIN_IN_PLS: 
  fixes PROB s as
  assumes "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)" "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)" 
  shows "(Inf (PLS s as) ‚àà (MPLS PROB))" 
  unfolding MPLS_def
  using assms
  by fast


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE type of `s` had to be fixed (type mismatch in goal).‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE premises rewritten to implications for proof set up.‚Ä∫
lemma problem_plan_bound_ge_min_pls: 
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem" and s :: "'a state" and as k
  assumes "finite PROB" "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)" "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)" 
    "(problem_plan_bound PROB ‚â§ k)"
  shows "(Inf (PLS s as) ‚â§ problem_plan_bound PROB)"
proof -
  have "Inf (PLS s as) ‚àà MPLS PROB" 
    using assms(2, 3) S_VALID_AS_VALID_IMP_MIN_IN_PLS 
    by blast
  moreover have "finite (MPLS PROB)" 
    using assms(1) FINITE_MPLS 
    by blast
  ultimately have "Inf (PLS s as) ‚â§ Sup (MPLS PROB)"
    using le_cSup_finite
    by blast 
  then show ?thesis 
    unfolding problem_plan_bound_def
    by simp
qed


lemma  PLS_NEMPTY: 
  fixes s as 
  shows "PLS s as ‚â† {}"
  unfolding PLS_def
  by blast


lemma  PLS_nempty_and_has_min: 
  fixes s as 
  shows "(‚àÉx. (x ‚àà PLS s as) ‚àß (x = Inf (PLS s as)))"
proof -
  have "PLS s as ‚â† {}" 
    using PLS_NEMPTY 
    by blast
  then have "Inf (PLS s as) ‚àà PLS s as"
    unfolding Inf_nat_def
    using LeastI_ex Max_in finite_PLS
    by metis 
  then show ?thesis 
    by blast
qed


lemma  PLS_works: 
  fixes x s as
  assumes "(x ‚àà PLS s as)" 
  shows"(‚àÉas'. 
      (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as')
      ‚àß (length as' = x) 
      ‚àß (subseq as' as)
    )"
  using assms
  unfolding PLS_def
  by (smt imageE mem_Collect_eq)


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE type of `s` had to be fixed (type mismatch in goal).‚Ä∫
lemma problem_plan_bound_works: 
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem" and as and s :: "'a state"
  assumes "finite PROB" "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)" "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)" 
  shows "(‚àÉas'. 
      (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as') 
      ‚àß (subseq as' as)
      ‚àß (length as' ‚â§ problem_plan_bound PROB)
    )"
proof -
  have "problem_plan_bound PROB ‚â§ 2 ^ card (prob_dom PROB) - 1"
    using assms(1) bound_main_lemma 
    by blast
  then have 1: "Inf (PLS s as) ‚â§ problem_plan_bound PROB"
    using 
      assms(1, 2, 3)
      problem_plan_bound_ge_min_pls
    by blast
  then have "‚àÉx. x ‚àà PLS s as ‚àß x = Inf (PLS s as)" 
    using PLS_nempty_and_has_min
    by blast 
  then have "Inf (PLS s as) ‚àà (PLS s as)"
    by blast 
  then obtain as' where 2:
    "exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as'" "length as' = Inf (PLS s as)" "subseq as' as"
    using PLS_works
    by blast
  then have "length as' ‚â§ problem_plan_bound PROB" 
    using 1
    by argo
  then show "(‚àÉas'. 
    (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as') 
    ‚àß (subseq as' as)
    ‚àß (length as' ‚â§ problem_plan_bound PROB)
  )"  
    using 2(1) 2(3)
    by blast
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE name shortened.‚Ä∫
definition MPLS_s where
  "MPLS_s PROB s ‚â° (Œª (s, as). Inf (PLS s as)) ` {(s, as) | as. as ‚àà valid_plans PROB}"


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE type of `PROB` had to be fixed (type mismatch in goal).‚Ä∫
lemma bound_main_lemma_s_3: 
  fixes PROB :: "(('a, 'b) fmap √ó ('a, 'b) fmap) set" and s
  shows "MPLS_s PROB s ‚â† {}"
proof -
  ‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO @{term "(s, []) ‚àà {}"} could be refactored (this is used in 'MPLS\_nempty' too).‚Ä∫
  have "[] ‚àà valid_plans PROB" 
    using empty_plan_is_valid 
    by blast
  then have "(s, []) ‚àà {(s, as). as ‚àà valid_plans PROB}" 
    by simp
  then show "MPLS_s PROB s ‚â† {}"
    unfolding MPLS_s_def
    by blast
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE name shortened.‚Ä∫
definition problem_plan_bound_s where
  "problem_plan_bound_s PROB s = Sup (MPLS_s PROB s)"


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE removed typing from assumption due to matching problems in later proofs.‚Ä∫
lemma  bound_on_all_plans_bounds_PLS_s: 
  fixes P f 
  assumes "(‚àÄPROB as s.  
    finite PROB ‚àß (P PROB) ‚àß (as ‚àà valid_plans PROB) ‚àß (s ‚àà valid_states PROB) 
    ‚ü∂ (‚àÉas'. 
      (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as')
      ‚àß (subseq as' as)
      ‚àß (length as' < f PROB s)
    )
  )"
  shows "(‚àÄPROB s as. 
    finite PROB ‚àß (P PROB) ‚àß (as ‚àà valid_plans PROB) ‚àß (s ‚àà valid_states PROB)
    ‚ü∂ (‚àÉx. 
      (x ‚àà PLS s as) 
      ‚àß (x < f PROB s)
    )
  )"

  using assms 
  unfolding PLS_def
  by fastforce


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
lemma bound_on_all_plans_bounds_MPLS_s_i:
  fixes PROB s x
  assumes "s ‚àà valid_states PROB" "x ‚àà MPLS_s PROB s" 
  shows "‚àÉas. x = Inf (PLS s as) ‚àß as ‚àà valid_plans PROB" 
proof -
  let ?S="{(s, as) | as. as ‚àà valid_plans PROB}"
  obtain x' where 1: 
    "x' ‚àà ?S"
    "x = (Œª (s, as). Inf (PLS s as)) x'"
    using assms 
    unfolding MPLS_s_def
    by blast
  let ?as="snd x'"
  let ?s="fst x'"
  have "?as ‚àà valid_plans PROB"
    using 1(1) 
    by auto
  moreover have "?s = s"
    using 1(1)
    by fastforce
  moreover have "x = Inf (PLS ?s ?as)"
    using 1(2)
    by (simp add: case_prod_unfold)
  ultimately show ?thesis 
    by blast
qed
