lemma bound_on_all_plans_bounds_MPLS_s: 
  fixes P f
  assumes "(‚àÄPROB as s.
    finite PROB ‚àß (P PROB) ‚àß (as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)  ‚àß (s ‚àà valid_states PROB)
    ‚ü∂ (‚àÉas'. 
      (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as') 
      ‚àß (subseq as' as)
      ‚àß (length as' < f PROB s)
    )
  )"
  shows "(‚àÄPROB x s. 
    finite PROB ‚àß (P PROB) ‚àß (s ‚àà valid_states PROB) ‚ü∂ (x ‚àà MPLS_s PROB s) 
     ‚ü∂ (x < f PROB s)
  )"
  using assms
  unfolding MPLS_def

proof -
  have 1: "‚àÄPROB s as.
     finite PROB ‚àß P PROB ‚àß as ‚àà valid_plans PROB ‚àß s ‚àà valid_states PROB ‚ü∂
     (‚àÉx. x ‚àà PLS s as ‚àß x < f PROB s)"
    using bound_on_all_plans_bounds_PLS_s[OF assms] .
  {
    fix PROB x and s :: "('a, 'b) fmap"
    assume P1: "finite PROB" "(P PROB)" "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)" 
    {
      assume "(x ‚àà MPLS_s PROB s)"
      then obtain as where i: "x = Inf (PLS s as)" "as ‚àà valid_plans PROB"
        using P1 bound_on_all_plans_bounds_MPLS_s_i
        by blast
      then obtain x' where "x' ‚àà PLS s as" "x' < f PROB s"
        using P1 i 1
        by blast
      then have "x < f PROB s"
        using mem_lt_imp_MIN_lt i(1) 
        by blast 
    }
    then have "(x ‚àà MPLS_s PROB s) ‚ü∂ (x < f PROB s)" 
      by blast
  }
  then show ?thesis
    by blast
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
lemma Sup_MPLS_s_lt_if: 
  fixes PROB s k
  assumes "(‚àÄx‚ààMPLS_s PROB s. x < k)"
  shows "Sup (MPLS_s PROB s) < k"
proof -
  have "MPLS_s PROB s ‚â† {}" 
    using bound_main_lemma_s_3
    by fast
  then have "Sup (MPLS_s PROB s) ‚àà MPLS_s PROB s"
    using assms Sup_nat_def bounded_nat_set_is_finite
    by force
  then show "Sup (MPLS_s PROB s) < k"
    using assms
    by blast
qed

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE type of `P` had to be fixed (type mismatch in goal).‚Ä∫
lemma bound_child_parent_lemma_s_2: 
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem" and P :: "'a problem ‚áí bool" and s f
  assumes "(‚àÄ(PROB :: 'a problem) as s. 
    finite PROB ‚àß (P PROB) ‚àß (s ‚àà valid_states PROB) ‚àß (as ‚àà valid_plans PROB) 
    ‚ü∂ (‚àÉas'. 
      (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as') 
      ‚àß (subseq as' as)
      ‚àß (length as' < f PROB s)
    )
  )"
  shows "(
    finite PROB ‚àß (P PROB) ‚àß (s ‚àà valid_states PROB)
    ‚ü∂ problem_plan_bound_s PROB s < f PROB s
  )"
proof -
  ‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE manual instantiation is required (automation fails otherwise).‚Ä∫
  have "‚àÄ(PROB :: 'a problem) x s. 
    finite PROB ‚àß P PROB ‚àß s ‚àà valid_states PROB 
    ‚ü∂ x ‚àà MPLS_s PROB s 
    ‚ü∂ x < f PROB s
  "
    using assms bound_on_all_plans_bounds_MPLS_s[of P f]
    by simp
  then show
    "finite PROB ‚àß (P PROB) ‚àß (s ‚àà valid_states PROB) ‚ü∂ (problem_plan_bound_s PROB s < f PROB s)"
    unfolding problem_plan_bound_s_def 
    using Sup_MPLS_s_lt_if problem_plan_bound_s_def
    by metis
qed


theorem bound_main_lemma_reachability_s: 
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem" and s
  assumes "finite PROB" "s ‚àà valid_states PROB" 
  shows "(problem_plan_bound_s PROB s < card (reachable_s PROB s))"
proof -
  ‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE derive premise for MP of 'bound\_child\_parent\_lemma\_s\_2'.‚Ä∫
  ‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE type of `s` had to be fixed (warning in assumption declaration).‚Ä∫
  {
    fix PROB :: "'a problem" and s :: "'a state" and as
    assume P1: "finite PROB" "s ‚àà valid_states PROB" "as ‚àà valid_plans PROB"
    then obtain as' where a: "exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as'" "subseq as' as" 
      "length as' ‚â§ card (reachable_s PROB s) - 1"
      using P1 main_lemma_reachability_s
      by blast
    then have "length as' < card (reachable_s PROB s)"
      using P1(1, 2) card_reachable_s_non_zero
      by fastforce
    then have "(‚àÉas'. 
      exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as' ‚àß subseq as' as ‚àß length as' < card (reachable_s PROB s))
    "
      using a 
      by blast
  }
  then have "
    finite PROB ‚àß True ‚àß s ‚àà valid_states PROB 
    ‚ü∂ problem_plan_bound_s PROB s < card (reachable_s PROB s)
  "
    using bound_child_parent_lemma_s_2[where PROB = PROB and P = "Œª_. True" and s = s
        and f = "ŒªPROB s. card (reachable_s PROB s)"]
    by blast
  then show ?thesis 
    using assms(1, 2)
    by blast
qed


lemma  problem_plan_bound_s_LESS_EQ_problem_plan_bound_thm: 
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem" and s :: "'a state"
  assumes "finite PROB" "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)"
  shows "(problem_plan_bound_s PROB s < problem_plan_bound PROB + 1)"
proof - 
  {
    fix PROB :: "'a problem" and s :: "'a state" and as
    assume "finite PROB" "s ‚àà valid_states PROB" "as ‚àà valid_plans PROB" 
    then obtain as' where a: "exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as'" "subseq as' as" 
      "length as' ‚â§ problem_plan_bound PROB"
      using problem_plan_bound_works
      by blast
    then have "length as' < problem_plan_bound PROB + 1"
      by linarith
    then have "‚àÉas'. 
      exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as' ‚àß subseq as' as ‚àß length as' ‚â§ problem_plan_bound PROB + 1
    "
      using a 
      by fastforce
  }
    ‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO unsure why a proof is needed at all here.‚Ä∫
  then have "‚àÄ(PROB :: 'a problem) as s.
   finite PROB ‚àß True ‚àß s ‚àà valid_states PROB ‚àß as ‚àà valid_plans PROB 
   ‚ü∂ (‚àÉas'. 
    exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as' ‚àß subseq as' as ‚àß length as' < problem_plan_bound PROB + 1)
  "
    by (metis Suc_eq_plus1 problem_plan_bound_works le_imp_less_Suc)
  then show "(problem_plan_bound_s PROB s < problem_plan_bound PROB + 1)" 
    using assms bound_child_parent_lemma_s_2[where PROB = PROB and s = s and P = "Œª_. True" 
        and f = "ŒªPROB s. problem_plan_bound PROB + 1"]
    by fast
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE lemma `bound\_main\_lemma\_s\_1` skipped (this is being equivalently redeclared later).‚Ä∫


lemma AS_VALID_MPLS_VALID: 
  fixes PROB as 
  assumes "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)" 
  shows "(Inf (PLS s as) ‚àà MPLS_s PROB s)"
  using assms
  unfolding MPLS_s_def
  by fast


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE moved up because it's used in the following lemma.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE type of `s` had to be fixed for 'in\_PLS\_leq\_2\_pow\_n'.‚Ä∫
lemma bound_main_lemma_s_1: 
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem" and s :: "'a state" and x
  assumes "finite PROB" "s ‚àà (valid_states PROB)" "x ‚àà MPLS_s PROB s"
  shows "(x ‚â§ (2 ^ card (prob_dom PROB)) - 1)"
proof -
  obtain as :: "(('a, bool) fmap √ó ('a, bool) fmap) list" where "as ‚àà valid_plans PROB"
    using empty_plan_is_valid 
    by blast
  then obtain x where 1: "x ‚àà PLS s as" "x ‚â§ 2 ^ card (prob_dom PROB) - 1"
    using assms in_PLS_leq_2_pow_n
    by blast
  then have "Inf (PLS s as) ‚â§ 2 ^ card (prob_dom PROB) - 1" 
    using mem_le_imp_MIN_le[where s = "PLS s as" and k = "2 ^ card (prob_dom PROB) - 1"]
    by blast
  then have "x ‚â§ 2 ^ card (prob_dom PROB) - 1" 
    using assms(3) 1
    by blast
      ‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO unsure why a proof is needed here (typing problem?).‚Ä∫
  then show ?thesis
    using assms(1, 2, 3) S_VALID_AS_VALID_IMP_MIN_IN_PLS bound_on_all_plans_bounds_MPLS_s_i 
      in_MPLS_leq_2_pow_n
    by metis
qed


lemma problem_plan_bound_s_ge_min_pls: 
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem" and as k s
  assumes "finite PROB" "s ‚àà (valid_states PROB)" "as ‚àà (valid_plans PROB)" 
    "problem_plan_bound_s PROB s ‚â§ k"
  shows "(Inf (PLS s as) ‚â§ problem_plan_bound_s PROB s)"
proof -
  have "‚àÄx‚ààMPLS_s PROB s. x ‚â§ 2 ^ card (prob_dom PROB) - 1"
    using assms(1, 2) bound_main_lemma_s_1 by blast
  then have 1: "finite (MPLS_s PROB s)"
    using mems_le_finite[where s = "MPLS_s PROB s" and k = "2 ^ card (prob_dom PROB) - 1"]
    by blast
  then have "MPLS_s PROB s ‚â† {}" 
    using bound_main_lemma_s_3 
    by fast
  then have "Inf (PLS s as) ‚àà MPLS_s PROB s" 
    using assms AS_VALID_MPLS_VALID 
    by blast 
  then show "(Inf (PLS s as) ‚â§ problem_plan_bound_s PROB s)"
    unfolding problem_plan_bound_s_def 
    using 1 le_cSup_finite 
    by blast
qed


theorem bound_main_lemma_s:
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem" and s
  assumes "finite PROB" "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)"
  shows "(problem_plan_bound_s PROB s ‚â§ 2 ^ (card (prob_dom PROB)) - 1)"
proof -
  have 1: "‚àÄx‚ààMPLS_s PROB s. x ‚â§ 2 ^ card (prob_dom PROB) - 1"
    using assms bound_main_lemma_s_1
    by metis 
  then have "MPLS_s PROB s ‚â† {}" 
    using bound_main_lemma_s_3 
    by fast
  then have "Sup (MPLS_s PROB s) ‚â§ 2 ^ card (prob_dom PROB) - 1"
    using 1 bound_main_lemma_2[where s = "MPLS_s PROB s" and k = "2 ^ card (prob_dom PROB) - 1"]
    by blast
  then show "problem_plan_bound_s PROB s ‚â§ 2 ^ card (prob_dom PROB) - 1"
    unfolding problem_plan_bound_s_def
    by blast
qed


lemma problem_plan_bound_s_works:
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem" and as s
  assumes "finite PROB" "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)" "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)"
  shows "(‚àÉas'. 
    (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as') 
    ‚àß (subseq as' as) 
    ‚àß (length as' ‚â§ problem_plan_bound_s PROB s)
  )"
proof -
  have "problem_plan_bound_s PROB s ‚â§ 2 ^ card (prob_dom PROB) - 1"
    using assms(1, 3) bound_main_lemma_s 
    by blast
  then have 1: "Inf (PLS s as) ‚â§ problem_plan_bound_s PROB s"
    using assms problem_plan_bound_s_ge_min_pls[of PROB s as " 2 ^ card (prob_dom PROB) - 1"]
    by blast
  then obtain x where obtain_x: "x ‚àà PLS s as ‚àß x = Inf (PLS s as)"
    using PLS_nempty_and_has_min
    by blast
  then have "‚àÉas'. exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as' ‚àß length as' = Inf (PLS s as) ‚àß subseq as' as"
    using PLS_works[where s = s and as = as and x = "Inf (PLS s as)"]
      obtain_x 
    by fastforce
  then show "(‚àÉas'. 
    (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as') ‚àß (subseq as' as) 
    ‚àß (length as' ‚â§ problem_plan_bound_s PROB s)
  )" 
    using 1
    by metis
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE skipped second declaration (declared twice in source).‚Ä∫
lemma PLS_def_ITP2015: 
  fixes s as
  shows "PLS s as = {length as' | as'. (exec_plan s as' = exec_plan s as) ‚àß (subseq as' as)}"
  using PLS_def 
  by blast


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE Set comprehension had to be rewritten to image (there is no pattern matching in the part 
left of the pipe symbol).‚Ä∫
lemma expanded_problem_plan_bound_charles_thm: 
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem" 
  shows " 
    problem_plan_bound_charles PROB 
    = Sup (
      {
        Inf (PLS_charles (fst p) (snd p) PROB) 
        | p. (fst p ‚àà valid_states PROB) ‚àß (snd p ‚àà valid_plans PROB)})
  "
  unfolding problem_plan_bound_charles_def MPLS_charles_def
  by blast


lemma bound_main_lemma_charles_3:
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem"
  assumes "finite PROB"
  shows "MPLS_charles PROB ‚â† {}"
proof -
  have 1: "[] ‚àà valid_plans PROB" 
    using empty_plan_is_valid
    by auto
  then obtain s :: "'a state" where obtain_s: "s ‚àà valid_states PROB"
    using assms valid_states_nempty
    by auto
  then  have "Inf (PLS_charles s [] PROB) ‚àà MPLS_charles PROB" 
    unfolding MPLS_charles_def
    using 1
    by auto
  then show "MPLS_charles PROB ‚â† {}"
    by blast
qed


lemma in_PLS_charles_leq_2_pow_n: 
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem" and s as
  assumes "finite PROB" "s ‚àà valid_states PROB" "as ‚àà valid_plans PROB"
  shows "(‚àÉx. 
    (x ‚àà PLS_charles s as PROB) 
    ‚àß (x ‚â§ 2 ^ card (prob_dom PROB) - 1))
  "
proof -
  obtain as' where 1:
    "exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as'" "subseq as' as" "length as' ‚â§ 2 ^ card (prob_dom PROB) - 1" 
    using assms main_lemma
    by blast
  then have "as' ‚àà valid_plans PROB"
    using assms(3) sublist_valid_plan 
    by blast 
  then have "length as' ‚àà PLS_charles s as PROB"
    unfolding PLS_charles_def
    using 1
    by auto
  then show ?thesis 
    using 1(3)
    by fast
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE this lemma retrieves `s`, `as` for a given @{term "x ‚àà MPLS_charles PROB"} and characterizes it as
the minimum of 'PLS\_charles s as PROB'.‚Ä∫
lemma x_in_MPLS_charles_then: 
  fixes PROB s as
  assumes "x ‚àà MPLS_charles PROB"
  shows "‚àÉs as. 
    s ‚àà valid_states PROB ‚àß as ‚àà valid_plans PROB ‚àß x = Inf (PLS_charles s as PROB)
  "
proof -
  have "‚àÉp ‚àà {p. (fst p) ‚àà valid_states PROB ‚àß (snd p) ‚àà valid_plans PROB}. x = Inf (PLS_charles (fst p) (snd p) PROB)"
    using MPLS_charles_def assms 
    by fast
  then obtain p where 1:
    "p ‚àà {p. (fst p) ‚àà valid_states PROB ‚àß (snd p) ‚àà valid_plans PROB}" 
    "x = Inf (PLS_charles (fst p) (snd p) PROB)"
    by blast
  then have "fst p ‚àà valid_states PROB" "snd p ‚àà valid_plans PROB" 
    by blast+
  then show ?thesis 
    using 1 
    by fast
qed

lemma in_MPLS_charles_leq_2_pow_n:
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem" and x
  assumes "finite PROB" "x ‚àà MPLS_charles PROB"
  shows "x ‚â§ 2 ^ card (prob_dom PROB) - 1"
proof -
  obtain s as where 1:
    "s ‚àà valid_states PROB" "as ‚àà valid_plans PROB" "x = Inf (PLS_charles s as PROB)"
    using assms(2) x_in_MPLS_charles_then
    by blast
  then obtain x' where 2: "x' ‚àà PLS_charles s as PROB""x' ‚â§ 2 ^ card (prob_dom PROB) - 1"
    using assms(1) in_PLS_charles_leq_2_pow_n 
    by blast
  then have "x ‚â§ x'" 
    using 1(3) mem_le_imp_MIN_le
    by blast
  then show ?thesis 
    using 1 2
    by linarith
qed


lemma bound_main_lemma_charles:
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem"
  assumes "finite PROB"
  shows "problem_plan_bound_charles PROB ‚â§ 2 ^ (card (prob_dom PROB)) - 1"
proof -
  have 1: "‚àÄx‚ààMPLS_charles PROB. x ‚â§ 2 ^ (card (prob_dom PROB)) - 1"
    using assms in_MPLS_charles_leq_2_pow_n
    by blast
  then have "MPLS_charles PROB ‚â† {}"
    using assms bound_main_lemma_charles_3
    by blast
  then have "Sup (MPLS_charles PROB) ‚â§ 2 ^ (card (prob_dom PROB)) - 1"
    using 1 bound_main_lemma_2 
    by meson
  then show ?thesis 
    using problem_plan_bound_charles_def
    by metis
qed


lemma bound_on_all_plans_bounds_PLS_charles:
  fixes P and f
  assumes "‚àÄ(PROB :: 'a problem) as s.
    (P PROB) ‚àß finite PROB ‚àß (as ‚àà valid_plans PROB) ‚àß (s ‚àà valid_states PROB) 
    ‚ü∂ (‚àÉas'. 
      (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as') ‚àß (subseq as' as)‚àß (length as' < f PROB))
  "
  shows "(‚àÄPROB s as. 
    (P PROB) ‚àß finite PROB ‚àß (as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)  ‚àß (s ‚àà valid_states PROB)
    ‚ü∂ (‚àÉx. 
      (x ‚àà PLS_charles s as PROB) 
      ‚àß (x < f PROB)))
  "
proof -
  {
    ‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE type for 's' had to be fixed (type mismatch in first proof step.‚Ä∫
    fix PROB :: "'a problem" and as and s :: "'a state"
    assume P: 
      "P PROB" "finite PROB" "as ‚àà valid_plans PROB" "s ‚àà valid_states PROB"
      "(‚àÉas'. 
        (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as') 
        ‚àß (subseq as' as)
        ‚àß (length as' < f PROB)
      )"
    then obtain as' where 1:
      "(exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as')" "(subseq as' as)" "(length as' < f PROB)"
      using P(5) 
      by blast
    then have 2: "as' ‚àà valid_plans PROB"
      using P(3) sublist_valid_plan 
      by blast 
    let ?x = "length as'"
    have "?x ‚àà PLS_charles s as PROB"
      unfolding PLS_charles_def
      using 1 2
      by auto
    then have "‚àÉx. x ‚àà PLS_charles s as PROB ‚àß x < f PROB"
      using 1 2 
      by blast
  }
  then show ?thesis 
    using assms 
    by auto
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma (refactored from `bound\_on\_all\_plans\_bounds\_MPLS\_charles`).‚Ä∫
lemma bound_on_all_plans_bounds_MPLS_charles_i:
  assumes "‚àÄ(PROB :: 'a problem) s as.
    (P PROB) ‚àß finite PROB ‚àß (as ‚àà valid_plans PROB) ‚àß (s ‚àà valid_states PROB)
    ‚ü∂ (‚àÉas'. 
      (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as') ‚àß (subseq as' as) ‚àß (length as' < f PROB))
  "
  shows "‚àÄ(PROB :: 'a problem) s as.
    P PROB ‚àß finite PROB ‚àß as ‚àà valid_plans PROB ‚àß s ‚àà valid_states PROB
    ‚ü∂ Inf {n. n ‚àà PLS_charles s as PROB} < f PROB
  "
proof -
  {
    fix PROB :: "'a problem" and s as
    have "P PROB ‚àß finite PROB ‚àß as ‚àà valid_plans PROB ‚àß s ‚àà valid_states PROB
     ‚ü∂ (‚àÉx. x ‚àà PLS_charles s as PROB ‚àß x < f PROB)
    "
      using assms bound_on_all_plans_bounds_PLS_charles[of P f]
      by blast
    then have "
      P PROB ‚àß finite PROB ‚àß as ‚àà valid_plans PROB ‚àß s ‚àà valid_states PROB
      ‚ü∂ Inf {n. n ‚àà PLS_charles s as PROB} < f PROB
    "
      using mem_lt_imp_MIN_lt CollectI
      by metis
  }
  then show ?thesis
    by blast
qed

lemma bound_on_all_plans_bounds_MPLS_charles:
  fixes P f
  assumes "(‚àÄ(PROB :: 'a problem) as s. 
    (P PROB) ‚àß finite PROB ‚àß (s ‚àà valid_states PROB) ‚àß (as ‚àà valid_plans PROB) 
    ‚ü∂ (‚àÉas'. 
      (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as') 
      ‚àß (subseq as' as)
      ‚àß (length as' < f PROB)
    )
  )"
  shows "(‚àÄPROB x. 
    (P PROB) ‚àß finite PROB
    ‚ü∂ (x ‚àà MPLS_charles PROB) 
    ‚ü∂ (x < f PROB)
  )"
proof -
  have 1: "‚àÄ(PROB :: 'a problem) s as. 
    P PROB ‚àß finite PROB ‚àß as ‚àà valid_plans PROB ‚àß s ‚àà valid_states PROB
    ‚ü∂ Inf {n. n ‚àà PLS_charles s as PROB} < f PROB
  " 
    using assms bound_on_all_plans_bounds_MPLS_charles_i
    by blast
  moreover
  {
    fix PROB :: "'a problem" and x
    assume P1: "(P PROB)" "finite PROB" "x ‚àà MPLS_charles PROB" 
    then obtain s as where a:
      "as ‚àà valid_plans PROB" "s ‚àà valid_states PROB" "x = Inf (PLS_charles s as PROB)"
      using x_in_MPLS_charles_then 
      by blast
    then have "Inf {n. n ‚àà PLS_charles s as PROB} < f PROB"
      using 1 P1
      by blast
    then have "x < f PROB" 
      using a
      by simp
  }
  ultimately show ?thesis
    by blast
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma (refactored from 'bound\_on\_all\_plans\_bounds\_problem\_plan\_bound\_charles').‚Ä∫
lemma bound_on_all_plans_bounds_problem_plan_bound_charles_i: 
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem"
  assumes "finite PROB" "‚àÄx ‚àà MPLS_charles PROB. x < k"
  shows "Sup (MPLS_charles PROB) ‚àà MPLS_charles PROB"
proof -
  have 1: "MPLS_charles PROB ‚â† {}" 
    using assms(1) bound_main_lemma_charles_3 
    by auto
  then have "finite (MPLS_charles PROB)"
    using assms(2) finite_nat_set_iff_bounded
    by blast
  then show ?thesis 
    unfolding Sup_nat_def
    using 1
    by simp
qed

lemma bound_on_all_plans_bounds_problem_plan_bound_charles: 
  fixes P f
  assumes "(‚àÄ(PROB :: 'a problem) as s. 
    (P PROB) ‚àß finite PROB ‚àß (s ‚àà valid_states PROB) ‚àß (as ‚àà valid_plans PROB) 
    ‚ü∂ (‚àÉas'. 
      (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as') 
      ‚àß (subseq as' as)
      ‚àß (length as' < f PROB)))
  "
  shows "(‚àÄPROB. 
    (P PROB) ‚àß finite PROB ‚ü∂ (problem_plan_bound_charles PROB < f PROB))
  "
proof -
  have 1: "‚àÄPROB x. P PROB ‚àß finite PROB ‚ü∂ x ‚àà MPLS_charles PROB ‚ü∂ x < f PROB"
    using assms bound_on_all_plans_bounds_MPLS_charles
    by blast
  moreover
  {
    fix PROB
    assume P: "P PROB" "finite PROB" 
    moreover have 2: "‚àÄx. x ‚àà MPLS_charles PROB ‚ü∂ x < f PROB" 
      using 1 P 
      by blast
    moreover
    {
      fix x
      assume P1: "x ‚àà MPLS_charles PROB" 
      moreover have "x < f PROB"
        using P(1, 2) P1 1
        by presburger
      moreover have "MPLS_charles PROB ‚â† {}" 
        using P1
        by blast
      moreover have "Sup (MPLS_charles PROB) < f PROB"
        using calculation(3) 2 bound_child_parent_not_eq_last_diff_paths[of "MPLS_charles PROB" "f PROB"] 
        by blast
      ultimately have "(problem_plan_bound_charles PROB < f PROB)"
        unfolding problem_plan_bound_charles_def 
        by blast
    }
    moreover have "Sup (MPLS_charles PROB) ‚àà MPLS_charles PROB" 
      using P(2) 2 bound_on_all_plans_bounds_problem_plan_bound_charles_i
      by blast
    ultimately have "problem_plan_bound_charles PROB < f PROB"
      unfolding problem_plan_bound_charles_def 
      by blast
  }
  ultimately show ?thesis
    by blast
qed

subsection "The Relation between Diameter, Sublist Diameter and Recurrence Diameter Bounds."

text ‚Äπ The goal of this subsection is to verify the relation between diameter, sublist diameter
and recurrence diameter bounds given by HOL4 Theorem 1, i.e.

  @{term "ùñΩ(Œ¥) ‚â§ ùóÖ(Œ¥) ‚àß ùóÖ(Œ¥) ‚â§ ùóãùñΩ(Œ¥)"}

where @{term "ùñΩ(Œ¥)"}, @{term "ùóÖ(Œ¥)"} and @{term "ùóãùñΩ(Œ¥)"} denote the diameter, sublist diameter and recurrence diameter bounds.
[Abdualaziz et al., p.20]

The relevant lemmas are `sublistD\_bounds\_D` and `RD\_bounds\_sublistD` which culminate in 
theorem `sublistD\_bounds\_D\_and\_RD\_bounds\_sublistD`. ‚Ä∫

lemma sublistD_bounds_D:  
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem"
  assumes "finite PROB"
  shows "problem_plan_bound_charles PROB ‚â§ problem_plan_bound PROB"
proof -
  ‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE obtain the premise needed for MP of 'bound\_on\_all\_plans\_bounds\_problem\_plan\_bound\_charles'.‚Ä∫
  {
    fix PROB :: "'a problem" and s :: "'a state" and as
    assume P: "finite PROB" "s ‚àà valid_states PROB" "as ‚àà valid_plans PROB" 
    then have "‚àÉas'. 
      exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as' ‚àß subseq as' as ‚àß length as' ‚â§ problem_plan_bound PROB
    " 
      using problem_plan_bound_works
      by blast
    then have "‚àÉas'. 
      exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as' ‚àß subseq as' as ‚àß length as' < problem_plan_bound PROB + 1
    " 
      by force
  }
  then have "problem_plan_bound_charles PROB < problem_plan_bound PROB + 1"
    using assms bound_on_all_plans_bounds_problem_plan_bound_charles[where f = "ŒªPROB. problem_plan_bound PROB + 1"
        and P = "Œª_. True"]
    by blast
  then show ?thesis
    by simp
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma (this was adapted from pred\_setScript.sml:4887 with exlusion of the premise for 
the empty set since `Max {}` is undefined in Isabelle/HOL.)‚Ä∫
lemma MAX_SET_ELIM':
  fixes P Q
  assumes "finite P" "P ‚â† {}" "(‚àÄx. (‚àÄy. y ‚àà P ‚ü∂ y ‚â§ x) ‚àß x ‚àà P ‚ü∂ R x)"
  shows "R (Max P)" 
  using assms
  by force

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE adapted from pred\_setScript.sml:4895 (premise `finite P` was added).‚Ä∫
lemma MIN_SET_ELIM':
  fixes P Q
  assumes "finite P" "P ‚â† {}" "‚àÄx. (‚àÄy. y ‚àà P ‚ü∂ x ‚â§ y) ‚àß x ‚àà P ‚ü∂ Q x"
  shows "Q (Min P)"
proof -
  let ?x="Min P" 
  have "Min P ‚àà P" 
    using Min_in[OF assms(1) assms(2)]
    by simp
  moreover {
    fix y
    assume P: "y ‚àà P"
    then have "?x ‚â§ y"
      using Min.coboundedI[OF assms(1)]
      by blast
    then have "Q ?x" using P assms
      by auto
  }
  ultimately show ?thesis
    by blast
qed

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma (refactored from `RD\_bounds\_sublistD`).‚Ä∫
lemma RD_bounds_sublistD_i_a:
  fixes Pi :: "'a problem" 
  assumes "finite Pi"
  shows "finite {length p - 1 |p. valid_path Pi p ‚àß distinct p}" 
proof -
  {
    let ?ss="{length p - 1 |p. valid_path Pi p ‚àß distinct p}"
    let ?ss'="{p. valid_path Pi p ‚àß distinct p}"
    have 1: "?ss = (Œªx. length x - 1) ` ?ss'"
      by blast
    {
      ‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE type of `valid\_states Pi` had to be asserted to match `FINITE\_valid\_states`.‚Ä∫
      let ?S="{p. distinct p ‚àß set p ‚äÜ (valid_states Pi :: 'a state set)}"
      {
        from assms have "finite (valid_states Pi :: 'a state set)" 
          using FINITE_valid_states[of Pi]
          by simp
        then have "finite ?S"
          using FINITE_ALL_DISTINCT_LISTS
          by blast
      }
      moreover {
        {
          fix x
          assume "x ‚àà ?ss'"
          then have "x ‚àà ?S" 
          proof (induction x)
            case (Cons a x)
            then have a: "valid_path Pi (a # x)" "distinct (a # x)"
              by blast+
            moreover {
              fix x' 
              assume P: "x' ‚àà set (a # x)" 
              then have "x' ‚àà valid_states Pi" 
              proof (cases "x")
                case Nil
                from a(1) Nil 
                have "a ‚àà valid_states Pi"
                  by simp
                moreover from P Nil 
                have "x' = a" 
                  by force
                ultimately show ?thesis
                  by simp
              next
                case (Cons a' list)
                {
                  {
                    from Cons.prems have "valid_path Pi (a # x)"
                      by simp
                    then have "a ‚àà valid_states Pi" "valid_path Pi (a' # list)"
                      using Cons 
                      by fastforce+
                  }
                  note a = this
                  moreover {
                    from Cons.prems have "distinct (a # x)"
                      by blast
                    then have "distinct (a' # list)" 
                      using Cons
                      by simp
                  }
                  ultimately 
                  have "(a' # list) ‚àà ?ss'" 
                    by blast
                  then have "(a' # list) ‚àà ?S" 
                    using Cons Cons.IH 
                    by argo
                }
                then show ?thesis
                  using P a(1) local.Cons set_ConsD
                  by fastforce
              qed
            }
            ultimately show ?case
              by blast
          qed simp
        }
        then have "?ss' ‚äÜ ?S"
          by blast
      }
      ultimately have "finite ?ss'"
        using rev_finite_subset 
        by auto
    }
    note 2 = this
    from 1 2 have "finite ?ss" 
      using finite_imageI
      by auto
  }
  then show ?thesis
    by blast
qed

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma (refactored from `RD\_bounds\_sublistD`).‚Ä∫
lemma RD_bounds_sublistD_i_b:
  fixes Pi :: "'a problem" 
  shows "{length p - 1 |p. valid_path Pi p ‚àß distinct p} ‚â† {}"
proof -
  let ?Q="{length p - 1 |p. valid_path Pi p ‚àß distinct p}"
  let ?Q'="{p. valid_path Pi p ‚àß distinct p}"
  {
    have "valid_path Pi []"
      by simp
    moreover have "distinct []"
      by simp
    ultimately have "[] ‚àà ?Q'"
      by simp
  }
  note 1 = this
  have "?Q = (Œªp. length p - 1) ` ?Q'" 
    by blast
  then have "length [] - 1 ‚àà ?Q"
    using 1
    by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) image_iff list.size(3))
  then show ?thesis
    by blast
qed

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma (refactored from `RD\_bounds\_sublistD`).‚Ä∫
lemma RD_bounds_sublistD_i_c:
  fixes Pi :: "'a problem" and as :: "(('a, bool) fmap √ó ('a, bool) fmap) list" and x 
    and s :: "('a, bool) fmap" 
  assumes "s ‚àà valid_states Pi" "as ‚àà valid_plans Pi" 
    "(‚àÄy. y ‚àà {length p - 1 |p. valid_path Pi p ‚àß distinct p} ‚ü∂ y ‚â§ x)" 
    "x ‚àà {length p - 1 |p. valid_path Pi p ‚àß distinct p}"
  shows "Min (PLS s as) ‚â§ Max {length p - 1 |p. valid_path Pi p ‚àß distinct p}" 
proof -
  let ?P="(PLS s as)"
  let ?Q="{length p - 1 |p. valid_path Pi p ‚àß distinct p}"
  from assms(4) obtain p where 1:
    "x = length p - 1" "valid_path Pi p" "distinct p"
    by blast
  {
    fix p'
    assume "valid_path Pi p'" "distinct p'" 
    then obtain y where "y ‚àà ?Q" "y = length p' - 1" 
      by blast
        ‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE we cannot infer @{term "length p' - 1 ‚â§ length p - 1"} since `length p' = 0` might be true.‚Ä∫
    then have a: "length p' - 1 ‚â§ length p - 1" 
      using assms(3) 1(1) 
      by meson
  }
  note 2 = this
  {
    from finite_PLS PLS_NEMPTY
    have "finite (PLS s as)" "PLS s as ‚â† {}"
      by blast+
    moreover {
      fix n
      assume P: "(‚àÄy. y ‚àà PLS s as ‚ü∂ n ‚â§ y)" "n ‚àà PLS s as"
      from P(2) obtain as' where i: 
        "n = length as'" "exec_plan s as' = exec_plan s as" "subseq as' as"
        unfolding PLS_def
        by blast
      let ?p'="statelist' s as'"
      {
        have "length as' = length ?p' - 1" 
          by (simp add: LENGTH_statelist')        
            ‚Äï ‚ÄπMARKER (topologicalPropsScript.sml:195)‚Ä∫
        have "1 + (length p - 1) = length p - 1 + 1" 
          by presburger
            ‚Äï ‚ÄπMARKER (topologicalPropsScript.sml:200)‚Ä∫
        {
          from assms(2) i(3) sublist_valid_plan
          have "as' ‚àà valid_plans Pi" 
            by blast
          then have "valid_path Pi ?p'"
            using assms(1) valid_path_statelist'
            by auto
        }
        moreover {
          {
            assume C: "¬¨distinct ?p'"
              ‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE renamed variable `drop` to `drop'` to avoid shadowing of the function by the 
            same name in Isabelle/HOL.‚Ä∫
            then obtain rs pfx drop' tail where C_1: "?p' = pfx @ [rs] @ drop' @ [rs] @ tail" 
              using not_distinct_decomp[OF C]
              by fast
            let ?pfxn="length pfx"
            have C_2: "?p' ! ?pfxn = rs"
              by (simp add: C_1) 
            from LENGTH_statelist'
            have C_3: "length as' + 1 = length ?p'" 
              by metis
            then have "?pfxn ‚â§ length as'"
              using C_1
              by fastforce
            then have C_4: "exec_plan s (take ?pfxn as') = rs" 
              using C_2 statelist'_TAKE
              by blast
            let ?prsd = "length (pfx @ [rs] @ drop')"
            let ?ap1 = "take ?pfxn as'" 
              ‚Äï ‚ÄπMARKER (topologicalPropsScript.sml:215)‚Ä∫
            from C_1 
            have C_5: "?p' ! ?prsd = rs"
              by (metis append_Cons length_append nth_append_length nth_append_length_plus)
            from C_1 C_3 
            have C_6: "?prsd ‚â§ length as'" 
              by simp
            then have C_7: "exec_plan s (take ?prsd as') = rs" 
              using C_5 statelist'_TAKE
              by auto
            let ?ap2="take ?prsd as'"
            let ?asfx="drop ?prsd as'" 
            have C_8: "as' = ?ap2 @ ?asfx"
              by force
            then have "exec_plan s as' = exec_plan (exec_plan s ?ap2) ?asfx"
              using exec_plan_Append
              by metis
            then have C_9: "exec_plan s as' = exec_plan s (?ap1 @ ?asfx)"
              using C_4 C_7 exec_plan_Append
              by metis
            from C_6 
            have C_10: "(length ?ap1 = ?pfxn) ‚àß (length ?ap2 = ?prsd)" 
              by fastforce
            then have C_11: "length (?ap1 @ ?asfx) < length (?ap2 @ ?asfx)"
              by auto
            {         
              from C_10 
              have "?pfxn + length ?asfx = length (?ap1 @ ?asfx)"   
                by simp
              from C_9 i(2)
              have C_12: "exec_plan s (?ap1 @ ?asfx) = exec_plan s as" 
                by argo
              {
                {
                  {
                    have "prefix ?ap1 ?ap2"
                      by (metis (no_types) length_append prefix_def take_add) 
                    then have "subseq ?ap1 ?ap2"
                      using isPREFIX_sublist
                      by blast
                  }
                  moreover have "sublist ?asfx ?asfx"
                    using sublist_refl
                    by blast
                  ultimately have "subseq (?ap1 @ ?asfx) as'"
                    using C_8 subseq_append
                    by metis
                }
                moreover from i(3)
                have "subseq as' as"
                  by simp
                ultimately have "subseq (?ap1 @ ?asfx) as"
                  using sublist_trans
                  by blast
              }
              then have "length (?ap1 @ ?asfx) ‚àà PLS s as"
                unfolding PLS_def 
                using C_12 
                by blast
            }
            then have False 
              using P(1) i(1) C_10
              by auto
          }
          hence "distinct ?p'" 
            by auto
        }
        ultimately have "length ?p' - 1 ‚â§ length p - 1" 
          using 2 
          by blast
      }
      note ii = this
      {
        from i(1) have "n + 1 = length ?p'"
          using LENGTH_statelist'[symmetric]
          by blast
        also have "‚Ä¶ ‚â§ 1 + (length p - 1)"
          using ii
          by linarith
        finally have "n ‚â§ length p - 1" 
          by fastforce
      }
      then have "n ‚â§ length p - 1"
        by blast
    }
    ultimately have "Min ?P ‚â§ length p - 1" 
      using MIN_SET_ELIM'[where P="?P" and Q="Œªx. x ‚â§ length p - 1"]
      by blast
  }
  note 3 = this
  {
    have "length p - 1 ‚â§ Max {length p - 1 |p. valid_path Pi p ‚àß distinct p}" 
      using assms(3, 4) 1(1)
      by (smt Max.coboundedI bdd_aboveI bdd_above_nat)
    moreover 
    have "Min (PLS s as) ‚â§ length p - 1"
      using 3
      by blast
    ultimately 
    have "Min (PLS s as) ‚â§ Max {length p - 1 |p. valid_path Pi p ‚àß distinct p}"
      by linarith
  }
  then show ?thesis
    by blast
qed

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma (refactored from `RD\_bounds\_sublistD`).‚Ä∫
lemma RD_bounds_sublistD_i:
  fixes Pi :: "'a problem" and x
  assumes "finite Pi" "(‚àÄy. y ‚àà MPLS Pi ‚ü∂ y ‚â§ x)" "x ‚àà MPLS Pi" 
  shows "x ‚â§ Max {length p - 1 |p. valid_path Pi p ‚àß distinct p}" 
proof -
  {
    let ?P="MPLS Pi"
    let ?Q="{length p - 1 |p. valid_path Pi p ‚àß distinct p}"
    from assms(3) 
    obtain s as where 1:
      "s ‚àà valid_states Pi" "as ‚àà valid_plans Pi" "x = Inf (PLS s as)"
      unfolding MPLS_def
      by fast
    have "x ‚â§ Max ?Q" proof -
      text ‚Äπ Show that `x` is not only the infimum but also the minimum of `PLS s as`.‚Ä∫
      {
        have "finite (PLS s as)" 
          using finite_PLS 
          by auto
        moreover 
        have "PLS s as ‚â† {}" 
          using PLS_NEMPTY
          by auto
        ultimately 
        have a: "Inf (PLS s as) = Min (PLS s as)" 
          using cInf_eq_Min[of "PLS s as"]
          by blast
        from 1(3) a have "x = Min (PLS s as)"
          by blast
      }
      note a = this
      {
        let ?limit="Min (PLS s as)"
        from assms(1) 
        have a: "finite ?Q" 
          using RD_bounds_sublistD_i_a
          by blast
        have b: "?Q ‚â† {}"
          using RD_bounds_sublistD_i_b 
          by fast
        from 1(1, 2) 
        have c: "‚àÄx. (‚àÄy. y ‚àà ?Q ‚ü∂ y ‚â§ x) ‚àß x ‚àà ?Q ‚ü∂ ?limit ‚â§ Max ?Q" 
          using RD_bounds_sublistD_i_c
          by blast
        have "?limit ‚â§ Max ?Q" 
          using MAX_SET_ELIM'[where P="?Q" and R="Œªx. ?limit ‚â§ Max ?Q", OF a b c]
          by blast
      }
      note b = this
      from a b show "x ‚â§ Max ?Q"
        by blast
    qed
  }
  then show ?thesis
    using assms
    unfolding MPLS_def
    by blast
qed

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE type of `Pi` had to be fixed for use of `FINITE\_valid\_states`.‚Ä∫
lemma RD_bounds_sublistD: 
  fixes Pi :: "'a problem"
  assumes "finite Pi"
  shows "problem_plan_bound Pi ‚â§ RD Pi"
proof -
  let ?P="MPLS Pi"
  let ?Q="{length p - 1 |p. valid_path Pi p ‚àß distinct p}"
  {
    from assms 
    have 1: "finite ?P" 
      using FINITE_MPLS
      by blast
    from assms 
    have 2: "?P ‚â† {}"
      using MPLS_nempty
      by blast
    from assms 
    have 3: "‚àÄx. (‚àÄy. y ‚àà ?P ‚ü∂ y ‚â§ x) ‚àß x ‚àà ?P ‚ü∂ x ‚â§ Max ?Q"
      using RD_bounds_sublistD_i 
      by blast
    have "Max ?P ‚â§ Max ?Q"
      using MAX_SET_ELIM'[OF 1 2 3]
      by blast
  }
  then show ?thesis 
    unfolding problem_plan_bound_def RD_def Sup_nat_def
    using RD_bounds_sublistD_i_b by auto 
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE type for `PROB` had to be fixed in order to be able to match `sublistD\_bounds\_D`.‚Ä∫
theorem sublistD_bounds_D_and_RD_bounds_sublistD: 
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem"
  assumes "finite PROB"
  shows "
    problem_plan_bound_charles PROB ‚â§ problem_plan_bound PROB 
    ‚àß problem_plan_bound PROB ‚â§ RD PROB
  "
  using assms sublistD_bounds_D RD_bounds_sublistD 
  by auto


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE type of `PROB` had to be fixed for MP of lemmas.‚Ä∫
lemma empty_problem_bound: 
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem"
  assumes "(prob_dom PROB = {})"
  shows "(problem_plan_bound PROB = 0)"
proof -
  {
    fix PROB' and as :: "(('a, 'b) fmap √ó ('a, 'b) fmap) list" and s :: "('a, 'b) fmap"
    assume 
      "finite PROB" "prob_dom PROB' = {}" "s ‚àà valid_states PROB'" "as ‚àà valid_plans PROB'"
    then have "exec_plan s [] = exec_plan s as"
      using empty_prob_dom_imp_empty_plan_always_good
      by blast
    then have "(‚àÉas'. exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as' ‚àß subseq as' as ‚àß length as' < 1)"
      by force
  }
  then show ?thesis 
    using bound_on_all_plans_bounds_problem_plan_bound_[where P="ŒªP. prob_dom P = {}" and f="ŒªP. 1", of PROB]
    using assms empty_prob_dom_finite 
    by blast 
qed


lemma problem_plan_bound_works':
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem" and as s
  assumes "finite PROB" "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)" "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
  shows "(‚àÉas'. 
    (exec_plan s as' = exec_plan s as) 
    ‚àß (subseq as' as)
    ‚àß (length as' ‚â§ problem_plan_bound PROB) 
    ‚àß (sat_precond_as s as')
  )"
proof -
  obtain as' where 1:
    "exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as'" "subseq as' as" "length as' ‚â§ problem_plan_bound PROB"
    using assms problem_plan_bound_works 
    by blast
      ‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE this step seems to be handled implicitely in original proof.‚Ä∫
  moreover have "rem_condless_act s [] as' ‚àà valid_plans PROB"
    using assms(3) 1(2) rem_condless_valid_10 sublist_valid_plan
    by blast
  moreover have "subseq (rem_condless_act s [] as') as'" 
    using rem_condless_valid_8 
    by blast
  moreover have "length (rem_condless_act s [] as') ‚â§ length as'" 
    using rem_condless_valid_3
    by blast
  moreover have "sat_precond_as s (rem_condless_act s [] as')"
    using rem_condless_valid_2
    by blast
  moreover have "exec_plan s as' = exec_plan s (rem_condless_act s [] as')"
    using rem_condless_valid_1
    by blast
  ultimately show ?thesis
    by fastforce
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO remove? Can be solved directly with 'TopologicalProps.bound\_on\_all\_plans\_bounds\_problem\_plan\_bound\_thesis'.‚Ä∫
lemma problem_plan_bound_UBound: 
  assumes "(‚àÄas s.
    (s ‚àà valid_states PROB) 
    ‚àß (as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)
    ‚ü∂ (‚àÉas'.
      (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as') 
      ‚àß subseq as' as 
      ‚àß (length as' < f PROB)
    )
  )" "finite PROB"
  shows "(problem_plan_bound PROB < f PROB)"
proof -
  let ?P = "ŒªPr. PROB = Pr"
  have "?P PROB" by simp
  then show ?thesis
    using assms bound_on_all_plans_bounds_problem_plan_bound_[where P = ?P] 
    by force
qed 

subsection "Traversal Diameter"


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE name shortened.‚Ä∫
definition traversed_states where
  "traversed_states s as ‚â° set (state_list s as)" 


lemma finite_traversed_states: "finite (traversed_states s as)"
  unfolding traversed_states_def
  by simp


lemma traversed_states_nempty: "traversed_states s as ‚â† {}"
  unfolding traversed_states_def 
  by (induction as) auto


lemma traversed_states_geq_1: 
  fixes s
  shows "1 ‚â§ card (traversed_states s as)"
proof -
  have "card (traversed_states s as) ‚â† 0"
    using traversed_states_nempty finite_traversed_states card_0_eq
    by blast
  then show "1 ‚â§ card (traversed_states s as)"
    by linarith 
qed


lemma init_is_traversed: "s ‚àà traversed_states s as"
  unfolding traversed_states_def
  by (induction as) auto


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE name shortened.‚Ä∫
definition td where
  "td PROB ‚â° Sup {
    (card (traversed_states (fst p) (snd p))) - 1 
    | p. (fst p ‚àà valid_states PROB) ‚àß (snd p ‚àà valid_plans PROB)}
  "


lemma traversed_states_rem_condless_act: "‚ãÄs. 
  traversed_states s (rem_condless_act s [] as) = traversed_states s as
"
  apply(induction as)
  apply(auto simp add: traversed_states_def rem_condless_act_cons)
  subgoal by (simp add: state_succ_pair)
  subgoal using init_is_traversed traversed_states_def by blast
  subgoal by (simp add: state_succ_pair) 
  done

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
lemma td_UBound_i: 
  fixes PROB :: "(('a, 'b) fmap √ó ('a, 'b) fmap) set"
  assumes "finite PROB" 
  shows "
  {
    (card (traversed_states (fst p) (snd p))) - 1 
    | p. (fst p ‚àà valid_states PROB) ‚àß (snd p ‚àà valid_plans PROB)}
  ‚â† {}
  "
proof -
  let ?S="{p. (fst p ‚àà valid_states PROB) ‚àß (snd p ‚àà valid_plans PROB)}"
  obtain s :: "'a state" where "s ‚àà valid_states PROB" 
    using assms valid_states_nempty
    by blast
  moreover have "[] ‚àà valid_plans PROB"
    using empty_plan_is_valid
    by auto
  ultimately have "?S ‚â† {}"
    using assms valid_states_nempty 
    by auto  
  then show ?thesis
    by blast 
qed

lemma td_UBound: 
  fixes PROB :: "(('a, 'b) fmap √ó ('a, 'b) fmap) set" 
  assumes "finite PROB" "(‚àÄs as. 
    (sat_precond_as s as) ‚àß (s ‚àà valid_states PROB) ‚àß (as ‚àà valid_plans PROB) 
    ‚ü∂ (card (traversed_states s as) ‚â§ k)
  )"
  shows "(td PROB ‚â§ k - 1)"
proof -
  let ?S="{
    (card (traversed_states (fst p) (snd p))) - 1 
    | p. (fst p ‚àà valid_states PROB) ‚àß (snd p ‚àà valid_plans PROB)}
  "
  {
    fix x
    assume "x ‚àà ?S"
    then obtain p where 1:
      "x = card (traversed_states (fst p) (snd p)) - 1" "fst p ‚àà valid_states PROB" 
      "snd p ‚àà valid_plans PROB"
      by blast
    let ?s="fst p"
    let ?as="snd p" 
    {
      let ?as'="(rem_condless_act ?s [] ?as)"
      have 2: "traversed_states ?s ?as = traversed_states ?s ?as'"
        using traversed_states_rem_condless_act
        by blast
      moreover have "sat_precond_as ?s ?as'"
        using rem_condless_valid_2
        by blast
      moreover have "?as' ‚àà valid_plans PROB"
        using 1(3) rem_condless_valid_10
        by blast
      ultimately have "card (traversed_states ?s ?as') ‚â§ k"
        using assms(2) 1(2)
        by blast 
      then have "card (traversed_states ?s ?as) ‚â§ k"
        using 2
        by argo
    }
    then have "x ‚â§ k - 1" 
      using 1
      by linarith
  }
  moreover have "?S ‚â† {}"
    using assms td_UBound_i
    by fast
  ultimately show ?thesis
    unfolding td_def
    using td_UBound_i bound_main_lemma_2[of ?S "k - 1"]
    by presburger
qed


end

Theory SystemAbstraction

theory SystemAbstraction
  imports
    Main
    "HOL-Library.Sublist"
    "HOL-Library.Finite_Map"
    FactoredSystem
    FactoredSystemLib
    ActionSeqProcess
    Dependency
    TopologicalProps
    FmapUtils
    ListUtils

begin


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE  hide 'Map.map\_add' because of conflicting notation with 'FactoredSystemLib.map\_add\_ltr'.‚Ä∫
hide_const (open) Map.map_add
no_notation Map.map_add (infixl "++" 100)


section "System Abstraction"

text ‚Äπ Projection of an object (state, action, sequence of action or factored representation)
to a variable set `vs` restricts the domain of the object or its components---in case of composite
objects---to `vs`. [Abdulaziz et al., p.12]

This section presents the relevant definitions (`action\_proj`, `as\_proj`, `prob\_proj` and `ss\_proj`)
as well as their characterization. ‚Ä∫


subsection "Projection of Actions, Sequences of Actions and Factored Representations."


definition action_proj where
  "action_proj a vs ‚â° (fmrestrict_set vs (fst a), fmrestrict_set vs (snd a))"


lemma action_proj_pair: "action_proj (p, e) vs = (fmrestrict_set vs p, fmrestrict_set vs e)"
  unfolding action_proj_def
  by simp


definition prob_proj where
  "prob_proj PROB vs ‚â° (Œªa. action_proj a vs) ` PROB"


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE  using 'fun' due to multiple defining equations.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE  name shortened.‚Ä∫
fun as_proj where
  "as_proj [] _ = []"
| "as_proj (a # as) vs = (if fmdom' (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) ‚â† {}
    then action_proj a vs # as_proj as vs
    else as_proj as vs
  )"


‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO the lemma might be superfluous (follows directly from 'as\_proj.simps').‚Ä∫
lemma as_proj_pair:
  "as_proj ((p, e) # as) vs = (if (fmdom' (fmrestrict_set vs e) ‚â† {})
    then action_proj (p, e) vs # as_proj as vs
    else as_proj as vs
  )"
  "as_proj [] vs = []"
  by (simp)+


lemma proj_state_succ:
  fixes s a vs
  assumes "(fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s)"
  shows  "(state_succ (fmrestrict_set vs s) (action_proj a vs) = fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s a))"
proof -
  have "
    fmrestrict_set vs (if fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s then snd a ++ s else s)
    = fmrestrict_set vs (snd a ++ s)
  "
    using assms
    by simp
  moreover
  {
    assume "fst (action_proj a vs) ‚äÜ‚á©f fmrestrict_set vs s"
    then have "
      (state_succ (fmrestrict_set vs s) (action_proj a vs)
       = fmrestrict_set vs (snd a ++ s))
    "
      unfolding state_succ_def action_proj_def fmap_add_ltr_def
      by force
  }
  moreover {
    assume "¬¨(fst (action_proj a vs) ‚äÜ‚á©f fmrestrict_set vs s)"
    then have "
      (state_succ (fmrestrict_set vs s) (action_proj a vs)
       = fmrestrict_set vs (snd a ++ s))
    "
      unfolding state_succ_def  action_proj_def
      using assms fmsubset_restrict_set_mono
      by auto
  }
  ultimately show ?thesis
    unfolding state_succ_def
    by argo
qed


lemma graph_plan_lemma_1:
  fixes s vs as
  assumes "sat_precond_as s as"
  shows "(exec_plan (fmrestrict_set vs s) (as_proj as vs) = (fmrestrict_set vs (exec_plan s as)))"
  using assms
proof (induction as arbitrary: s vs)
  case (Cons a as)
  then show ?case
  proof (cases "fmdom' (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) ‚â† {}")
    case True
    then have
      "state_succ (fmrestrict_set vs s) (action_proj a vs) = fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s a)"
      using Cons.prems proj_state_succ
      by fastforce
    then show ?thesis
      unfolding exec_plan.simps sat_precond_as.simps as_proj.simps
      using Cons.IH Cons.prems True
      by simp
  next
    case False
    then have "(fmdom' (snd a) ‚à© vs = {})"
      using False fmdom'_restrict_set_precise[of vs "snd a"]
      by argo
    then have "fmrestrict_set vs s = fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s a)"
      using disj_imp_eq_proj_exec
      by blast
    then show ?thesis
      unfolding exec_plan.simps sat_precond_as.simps as_proj.simps
      using Cons.IH Cons.prems False
      by simp
  qed
qed simp


‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO the proofs are inefficient (detailed proofs?).‚Ä∫
lemma  proj_action_dom_eq_inter:
  shows "
    action_dom (fst (action_proj a vs)) (snd (action_proj a vs))
    = (action_dom (fst a) (snd a) ‚à© vs)
  "
unfolding action_dom_def action_proj_def
by (auto simp: fmdom'_restrict_set_precise)


lemma graph_plan_neq_mems_state_set_neq_len:
  shows "prob_dom (prob_proj PROB vs) = (prob_dom PROB ‚à© vs)"
proof -
  have "
      prob_dom (prob_proj PROB vs)
      = (
        ‚ãÉ(s1, s2)‚àà(Œªa. (fmrestrict_set vs (fst a), fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)))
        `  PROB. action_dom s1 s2
      )
    "
    unfolding prob_dom_def prob_proj_def action_proj_def
    by blast
  moreover
  {
    have "
    (prob_dom PROB ‚à© vs)
    = (‚ãÉa‚ààPROB. action_dom (fst a) (snd a)  ‚à© vs)
  "
      unfolding prob_dom_def prob_proj_def
      using SUP_cong
      by auto
    also have "‚Ä¶ = (‚ãÉa‚ààPROB. action_dom (fst (action_proj a vs)) (snd (action_proj a vs)))"
      using proj_action_dom_eq_inter[symmetric]
      by fast
    finally have "
      (prob_dom PROB ‚à© vs)
      = (‚ãÉa‚ààPROB. fmdom' (fmrestrict_set vs (fst a)) ‚à™ fmdom' (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)))
    "
      unfolding action_dom_def action_proj_def
      by simp
  }
  ultimately show ?thesis
    by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) SUP_cong UN_simps(10) action_dom_def case_prod_beta' prod.sel(1)
        snd_conv)
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO more detailed proof.‚Ä∫
lemma graph_plan_not_eq_last_diff_paths:
  fixes PROB vs
  assumes "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)"
  shows "((fmrestrict_set vs s) ‚àà valid_states (prob_proj PROB vs))"

  unfolding valid_states_def
  using graph_plan_neq_mems_state_set_neq_len
  by (metis (mono_tags, lifting)
      assms fmdom'.rep_eq fmlookup_fmrestrict_set_dom inf_commute mem_Collect_eq valid_states_def)


lemma dom_eff_subset_imp_dom_succ_eq_proj:
  fixes h s vs
  assumes "(fmdom' (snd h) ‚äÜ fmdom' s)"
  shows "(fmdom' (state_succ s (action_proj h vs)) = fmdom' (state_succ s h))"
proof (cases "fst (fmrestrict_set vs (fst h), fmrestrict_set vs (snd h)) ‚äÜ‚á©f s")
  case true: True
  then show ?thesis
  proof (cases "fst h ‚äÜ‚á©f s")
    case True
    then show ?thesis
      unfolding state_succ_def action_proj_def
      using true True
      by simp (smt assms fmap_add_ltr_def fmdom'.rep_eq fmdom'_add fmlookup_fmrestrict_set_dom
          inf.absorb_iff2 inf.left_commute sup.absorb_iff1)
  next
    case False
    then show ?thesis
      unfolding state_succ_def action_proj_def
      using true False
      by simp (metis (no_types) assms dual_order.trans fmap_add_ltr_def fmdom'.rep_eq fmdom'_add
          fmlookup_fmrestrict_set_dom inf_le2 sup.absorb_iff1)
  qed
next
  case False
  then have "fmdom' s = fmdom' (if fst h ‚äÜ‚á©f s then snd h ++ s else s)"
    using sat_precond_as_proj_4
    by auto
  then show ?thesis
    unfolding state_succ_def action_proj_def
    using False
    by presburger
qed


lemma drest_proj_succ_eq_drest_succ:
  fixes h s vs
  assumes "fst h ‚äÜ‚á©f s" "(fmdom' (snd h) ‚äÜ fmdom' s)"
  shows "(fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s (action_proj h vs)) = fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s h))"
proof -
  {
    have 1: "fmrestrict_set vs (fst h) ‚äÜ‚á©f s"
      using assms(1) submap_imp_state_succ_submap_a
      by (simp add: sat_precond_as_proj_4)
    then have "
      fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s (action_proj h vs))
      = fmrestrict_set vs (fmrestrict_set vs (snd h) ++ s)
    "
      unfolding state_succ_def action_proj_def
      by simp
    also have "‚Ä¶ = fmrestrict_set vs s ++‚á©f fmrestrict_set vs (fmrestrict_set vs (snd h))"
      unfolding fmap_add_ltr_def
      by simp
        ‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO
      refactor the step 'fmrestrict\_set ?X (fmrestrict\_set ?X ?f) = fmrestrict\_set ?X ?f' into
      own lemma in 'FmapUtils.thy'.‚Ä∫
    also have "‚Ä¶ = fmrestrict_set vs s ++‚á©f fmrestrict_set vs (snd h)"
      using fmfilter_alt_defs(4) fmfilter_cong fmlookup_filter fmrestrict_set_dom option.simps(3)
      by metis
    finally have "
      fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s (action_proj h vs))
      = fmrestrict_set vs (snd h ++ s)
    "
      unfolding fmap_add_ltr_def
      by simp
  }
  moreover have "fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s h) = fmrestrict_set vs ((snd h) ++ s)"
    unfolding state_succ_def
    using assms(1)
    by simp
  ultimately show ?thesis
    by simp
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO remove? This is equivalent to 'proj\_state\_succ'.‚Ä∫
lemma drest_succ_proj_eq_drest_succ:
  fixes s vs as
  assumes "(fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s)"
  shows "(state_succ (fmrestrict_set vs s) (action_proj a vs) = fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s a))"
  using assms proj_state_succ
  by blast


lemma exec_drest_cons_proj_eq_succ:
  fixes as PROB vs a
  assumes "fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s"
  shows "(
    exec_plan (fmrestrict_set vs s) (action_proj a vs # as)
    = exec_plan (fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s a)) as
  )"
proof -
  have "exec_plan (state_succ (fmrestrict_set vs s) (action_proj a vs)) as =
  exec_plan (fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s a)) as"
    using assms drest_succ_proj_eq_drest_succ
    by metis
  then show ?thesis
    unfolding prob_proj_def
    by simp
qed


lemma exec_drest:
  fixes as a vs
  assumes "(fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s)"
  shows "(
    exec_plan (fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s a)) as
    = exec_plan (fmrestrict_set vs s) (action_proj a vs # as)
  )"
  using assms proj_state_succ
  by fastforce


lemma not_empty_eff_in_as_proj:
  fixes as a vs
  assumes "fmdom' (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) ‚â† {}"
  shows "(as_proj (a # as) vs = (action_proj a vs # as_proj as vs))"
  unfolding action_proj_def as_proj.simps
  using assms
  by argo

lemma empty_eff_not_in_as_proj:
  fixes as a vs
  assumes "(fmdom' (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) = {})"
  shows "(as_proj (a # as) vs = as_proj as vs)"
  unfolding action_proj_def
  using assms
  by simp


lemma empty_eff_drest_no_eff:
  fixes s and a and vs
  assumes "(fmdom' (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) = {})"
  shows "(fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s (action_proj a vs)) = fmrestrict_set vs s)"
proof -
  have "fmdom' (snd (action_proj a vs)) = {}"
    unfolding action_proj_def
    using assms
    by simp
  then have "state_succ s (action_proj a vs) = s"
    using empty_eff_exec_eq
    by fast
  then show ?thesis
    by simp
qed


lemma sat_precond_exec_as_proj_eq_proj_exec:
  fixes as vs s
  assumes "(sat_precond_as s as)"
  shows "(exec_plan (fmrestrict_set vs s) (as_proj as vs) = fmrestrict_set vs (exec_plan s as))"
  using assms
proof (induction as)
  case (Cons a as)
  then show ?case
    using Cons.prems graph_plan_lemma_1
    by blast
qed auto


lemma action_proj_in_prob_proj:
  assumes "(a ‚àà PROB)"
  shows "(action_proj a vs ‚àà prob_proj PROB vs)"
  unfolding action_proj_def prob_proj_def
  using assms
  by simp


lemma valid_as_valid_as_proj:
  fixes PROB vs
  assumes "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
  shows "(as_proj as vs ‚àà valid_plans (prob_proj PROB vs))"
  using assms
proof (induction "as" arbitrary: PROB vs)
  case (Cons a as)
  then show ?case
    using assms Cons
  proof(cases "fmdom' (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) ‚â† {}")
    case True
    then have 1: "as_proj (a # as) vs = action_proj a vs # as_proj as vs"
      using True
      by simp
    then have "as ‚àà valid_plans PROB"
      using Cons.prems valid_plan_valid_tail
      by fast
    then  have "as_proj as vs ‚àà valid_plans (prob_proj PROB vs)"
      using Cons.IH 1
      by simp
    then have "action_proj a vs # as_proj as vs ‚àà valid_plans (prob_proj PROB vs)"
      using Cons.prems action_proj_in_prob_proj valid_head_and_tail_valid_plan valid_plan_valid_head
      by metis
    then show ?thesis
      using 1
      by argo
  next
    case False
    then have "as_proj (a # as) vs = as_proj as vs"
      using False
      by auto
    then have "as_proj (a # as) vs ‚àà valid_plans (prob_proj PROB vs)"
      using assms Cons valid_plan_valid_tail
      by metis
    then show ?thesis
      using assms Cons.IH(1)
      by blast
  qed
qed (simp add: valid_plans_def)


lemma finite_imp_finite_prob_proj:
  fixes PROB
  assumes "finite PROB"
  shows "(finite (prob_proj PROB vs))"
  unfolding prob_proj_def
  using assms
  by simp


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE Base 2 in 5th assumption had to be explicitely fixed to 'nat' type to be able to use the
linearity lemma for powers of natural numbers.‚Ä∫
lemma
  fixes PROB vs as and s :: "'a state"
  assumes "finite PROB" "s ‚àà valid_states PROB" "as ‚àà (valid_plans PROB)" "finite vs"
    "length (as_proj as vs) > ((2 :: nat) ^ card vs) - 1" "sat_precond_as s as"
  shows "(‚àÉas1 as2 as3.
    (as1 @ as2 @ as3 = as_proj as vs)
    ‚àß (exec_plan (fmrestrict_set vs s) (as1 @ as2) = exec_plan (fmrestrict_set vs s) as1)
    ‚àß (as2 ‚â† [])
  )"
proof -
  {
    have "card (fmdom' (fmrestrict_set vs s)) ‚â§ card vs"
      using assms(4) graph_plan_card_state_set
      by fast
    then have "(2 :: nat) ^ (card (fmdom' (fmrestrict_set vs s))) - 1 ‚â§ 2 ^ (card vs) - 1"
      using power_increasing diff_le_mono
      by force
    also have "... < length (as_proj as vs)"
      using assms(5)
      by blast
    finally have "2 ^ card (fmdom' (fmrestrict_set vs s)) - 1 < length (as_proj as vs)"
      by blast
  }
  note 1 = this
  moreover have "fmrestrict_set vs s ‚àà valid_states (prob_proj PROB vs)"
    using assms(2) graph_plan_not_eq_last_diff_paths
    by blast
  moreover have "as_proj as vs ‚àà valid_plans (prob_proj PROB vs)"
    using assms(3) valid_as_valid_as_proj
    by blast
  moreover have "finite (prob_proj PROB vs)"
    using assms(1) finite_imp_finite_prob_proj
    by blast
  ultimately show ?thesis
    using lemma_2[where PROB="prob_proj PROB vs" and as="as_proj as vs" and s="fmrestrict_set vs s"]
    by blast
qed


lemma as_proj_eq_filter_action_proj:
  fixes as vs
  shows "as_proj as vs = filter (Œªa. fmdom' (snd a) ‚â† {}) (map (Œªa. action_proj a vs) as)"
  by (induction as) (auto simp add: action_proj_def)


lemma append_eq_as_proj:
  fixes as1 as2 as3 p vs
  assumes "(as1 @ as2 @ as3 = as_proj p vs)"
  shows "(‚àÉp_1 p_2 p_3.
    (p_1 @ p_2 @ p_3 = p)
    ‚àß (as2 = as_proj p_2 vs)
    ‚àß (as1 = as_proj p_1 vs)
  )"
  using assms append_eq_as_proj_1 as_proj_eq_filter_action_proj
  by (metis (no_types, lifting))


lemma succ_drest_eq_drest_succ:
  fixes a s vs
  shows "
    state_succ (fmrestrict_set vs s) (action_proj a vs)
    = fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s (action_proj a vs))
  "
proof -
  let ?lhs = "state_succ (fmrestrict_set vs s) (action_proj a vs)"
  let ?rhs = "fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s (action_proj a vs))"
    ‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE Show lhs and rhs equality by splitting on the cases introduced by the if-then branching
    of 'state\_succ'.‚Ä∫
  {
    assume P1: "fst (fmrestrict_set vs (fst a), fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) ‚äÜ‚á©f fmrestrict_set vs s"
    then have a: "fst (fmrestrict_set vs (fst a), fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) ‚äÜ‚á©f s"
      using drest_smap_drest_smap_drest
      by auto
    then have "?lhs = fmrestrict_set vs (snd a) ++ fmrestrict_set vs s"
      unfolding state_succ_def action_proj_def
      using P1
      by simp
    moreover {
      have rhs: "?rhs = fmrestrict_set vs (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a) ++ s)"
        unfolding state_succ_def action_proj_def
        using a
        by auto
      also have "‚Ä¶ = (fmrestrict_set vs (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) ++ fmrestrict_set vs s)"
        unfolding fmap_add_ltr_def
        by simp
      finally have "?rhs = (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a) ++ fmrestrict_set vs s)"
        unfolding fmfilter_alt_defs(4)
        by fastforce
    }
    ultimately have "?lhs = ?rhs"
      by argo
  }
  moreover {
    assume P2: "¬¨(fst (fmrestrict_set vs (fst a), fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) ‚äÜ‚á©f fmrestrict_set vs s)"
    then have a: "¬¨(fst (fmrestrict_set vs (fst a), fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) ‚äÜ‚á©f s)"
      using drest_smap_drest_smap_drest
      by auto
    then have "?lhs = fmrestrict_set vs s"
      unfolding state_succ_def action_proj_def
      using P2
      by argo
    moreover have "?rhs = fmrestrict_set vs s"
      unfolding state_succ_def action_proj_def
      using a
      by presburger
    ultimately have "?lhs = ?rhs"
      by simp
  }
  ultimately show "?lhs = ?rhs"
    by blast
qed


lemma proj_exec_proj_eq_exec_proj:
  fixes s as vs
  shows "
    fmrestrict_set vs (exec_plan (fmrestrict_set vs s) (as_proj as vs))
    = exec_plan (fmrestrict_set vs s) (as_proj as vs)
  "
proof (induction as arbitrary: s vs)
  case (Cons a as)
  then show ?case
    by (simp add: succ_drest_eq_drest_succ)
qed (simp add: fmfilter_alt_defs(4))


lemma proj_exec_proj_eq_exec_proj':
  fixes s as vs
  shows "
    fmrestrict_set vs (exec_plan (fmrestrict_set vs s) (as_proj as vs))
     = fmrestrict_set vs (exec_plan s (as_proj as vs))
  "
proof (induction as arbitrary: s vs)
  case (Cons a as)
  then show ?case
    by (simp add: succ_drest_eq_drest_succ)
qed (simp add: fmfilter_alt_defs(4))


lemma graph_plan_lemma_9:
  fixes s as vs
  shows "
    fmrestrict_set vs (exec_plan s (as_proj as vs))
    = exec_plan (fmrestrict_set vs s) (as_proj as vs)
  "
  by (metis proj_exec_proj_eq_exec_proj' proj_exec_proj_eq_exec_proj)


lemma act_dom_proj_eff_subset_act_dom_eff:
  fixes a vs
  shows "fmdom' (snd (action_proj a vs)) ‚äÜ fmdom' (snd a)"
proof -
  have "snd (action_proj a vs) = fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)"
    unfolding action_proj_def
    by simp
  then have "fmlookup (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) ‚äÜ‚á©m fmlookup (snd a)"
    by (simp add: map_le_def fmdom'_restrict_set_precise)
  then have "dom (fmlookup (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a))) ‚äÜ dom (fmlookup (snd a))"
    using map_le_implies_dom_le
    by blast
  then have "fmdom' (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) ‚äÜ fmdom' (snd a)"
    using fmdom'.rep_eq
    by metis
  then show ?thesis
    unfolding action_proj_def
    by simp
qed


lemma exec_as_proj_valid:
  fixes as s PROB vs
  assumes "s ‚àà valid_states PROB" "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
  shows  "(exec_plan s (as_proj as vs) ‚àà valid_states PROB)"
  using assms
proof (induction as arbitrary: s PROB vs)
  case (Cons a as)
  then have 1: "as ‚àà valid_plans PROB"
    using Cons.prems(2) valid_plan_valid_tail
    by fast
  then have 2: "exec_plan s (as_proj as vs) ‚àà valid_states PROB"
    using Cons.prems(1) Cons.IH(1)
    by blast
      ‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE split on the if-then branch introduced by 'as\_proj'.‚Ä∫
  moreover {
    assume P: "fmdom' (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) ‚â† {}"
    then have "
      exec_plan s (as_proj (a # as) vs)
      = exec_plan (state_succ s (action_proj a vs)) (as_proj as vs)
    "
      by simp
        ‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE split on the if-then branch introduced by 'state\_succ'‚Ä∫
    moreover
    {
      assume "fst (action_proj a vs) ‚äÜ‚á©f s"
      then have 3: "
        exec_plan (state_succ s (action_proj a vs)) (as_proj as vs)
        = exec_plan (snd (action_proj a vs) ++ s) (as_proj as vs)
      "
        unfolding state_succ_def
        using calculation
        by simp
      {
        ‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO Unsure why this proof step is necessary at all, but it should be refactored into a
          dedicated lemma @{term "s ‚àà valid_states PROB ‚üπ fmdom' s = prob_dom PROB"}.‚Ä∫
        {
          have "s ‚àà valid_states PROB"
            using Cons.prems
            by simp
          then have "s ‚àà {s'. fmdom' s' = prob_dom PROB}"
            unfolding valid_states_def
            by simp
          then obtain s' where "s' = s" "fmdom' s' = prob_dom PROB"
            by auto
          then have "fmdom' s = prob_dom PROB"
            by simp
        }
          ‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO Refactor this step ('also ...' for subset chain; replace fact
        `fmdom' s = prob\_dom PROB` in last step with MP step from lemma refactored above.‚Ä∫
        moreover {
          have "(snd (action_proj a vs) ++ s) = (s ++‚á©f fmrestrict_set vs (snd a))"
            unfolding action_proj_def fmap_add_ltr_def
            by simp
          then have a: "a ‚àà PROB"
            using Cons.prems(2) valid_plan_valid_head
            by fast
          then have "action_dom (fst a) (snd a) ‚äÜ prob_dom PROB"
            using exec_as_proj_valid_2
            by blast
          then have "fmdom' (snd a) ‚äÜ action_dom (fst a) (snd a)"
            unfolding action_dom_def
            by simp
          then have "fmdom' (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) ‚äÜ fmdom' (snd a)"
            using action_proj_def act_dom_proj_eff_subset_act_dom_eff snd_conv
            by metis
          then have "fmdom' (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) ‚äÜ prob_dom PROB"
            using FDOM_eff_subset_prob_dom_pair a
            by blast
          then have "fmdom' (s ++‚á©f fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) = fmdom' s"
            by (simp add: calculation sup.absorb_iff1)
        }
        ultimately have "(snd (action_proj a vs) ++ s) ‚àà valid_states PROB"
          unfolding action_proj_def fmap_add_ltr_def valid_states_def
          by simp
      }
      then have "exec_plan s (as_proj (a # as) vs) ‚àà valid_states PROB"
        using 1 3 calculation(1) Cons.IH[where s = "snd (action_proj a vs) ++ s"]
        by presburger
    }
    moreover {
      assume "¬¨(fst (action_proj a vs) ‚äÜ‚á©f s)"
      then have "
        exec_plan (state_succ s (action_proj a vs)) (as_proj as vs)
        = exec_plan s (as_proj as vs)
      "
        unfolding state_succ_def
        by simp
      then have "exec_plan s (as_proj (a # as) vs) ‚àà valid_states PROB"
        using 2
        by force
    }
    ultimately have "exec_plan s (as_proj (a # as) vs) ‚àà valid_states PROB"
      by blast
  }
  moreover
  {
    assume "fmdom' (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) = {}"
    then have "
      exec_plan s (as_proj (a # as) vs) =
      exec_plan s (as_proj as vs)
    "
      by simp
    then have "exec_plan s (as_proj (a # as) vs) ‚àà valid_states PROB"
      using 2
      by argo
  }
  ultimately show ?case
    by blast
qed simp


lemma drest_exec_as_proj_eq_drest_exec:
  fixes s as vs
  assumes "sat_precond_as s as"
  shows "(fmrestrict_set vs (exec_plan s (as_proj as vs)) = fmrestrict_set vs (exec_plan s as))"
proof -
  have 1: "
    (fmrestrict_set vs (exec_plan s (as_proj as vs))
    = exec_plan (fmrestrict_set vs s) (as_proj as vs))
  "
    using graph_plan_lemma_9 by auto
  then obtain s' where 2: "exec_plan (fmrestrict_set vs s) (as_proj as vs) = fmrestrict_set vs s'"
    using 1
    by metis
  then have "fmrestrict_set vs s' = fmrestrict_set vs (exec_plan s as)"
    using assms sat_precond_exec_as_proj_eq_proj_exec
    by metis
  then show
    "fmrestrict_set vs (exec_plan s (as_proj as vs)) = fmrestrict_set vs (exec_plan s as)"
    using 1 2
    by argo
qed


lemma action_proj_idempot:
  fixes a vs
  shows "action_proj (action_proj a vs) vs = (action_proj a vs)"
  unfolding action_proj_def
  by (simp add: fmfilter_alt_defs(4))


lemma  action_proj_idempot':
  fixes a vs
  assumes "(action_dom (fst a) (snd a) ‚äÜ vs)"
  shows "(action_proj a vs = a)"
  using assms
proof -
  have 1: "action_proj a vs = (fmrestrict_set vs (fst a), fmrestrict_set vs (snd a))"
    by (simp add: action_proj_def)
  then have 2: "(fmdom' (fst a) ‚à™ fmdom' (snd a)) ‚äÜ vs"
    unfolding action_dom_def
    using assms
    by (auto simp add: action_dom_def)
      ‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE Show that both components of 'a' remain unchanged.‚Ä∫
  {
    then have "fmdom' (fst a) ‚äÜ vs"
      by blast
    then have "fmrestrict_set vs (fst a) = (fst a)"
      using exec_drest_5
      by auto
  }
  moreover {
    have "fmdom' (snd a) ‚äÜ vs"
      using 2
      by auto
    then have "fmrestrict_set vs (snd a) = (snd a)"
      using exec_drest_5
      by blast
  }
  ultimately show ?thesis
    using 1
    by simp
qed


lemma action_proj_idempot'':
  fixes P vs
  assumes "prob_dom P ‚äÜ vs"
  shows "prob_proj P vs = P"
  using assms
proof -
  ‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO refactor.‚Ä∫
  {
    fix a
    assume "a ‚àà P"
    then have "action_dom (fst a) (snd a) ‚äÜ vs"
      using assms exec_as_proj_valid_2
      by fast
    then have "action_proj a vs = a"
      using action_proj_idempot'
      by fast
  }
  then have "prob_proj P vs = P"
    unfolding prob_proj_def
    by force
  then show ?thesis
    unfolding prob_proj_def
    by simp
qed


lemma sat_precond_as_proj:
  fixes as s s' vs
  assumes "(sat_precond_as s as)" "(fmrestrict_set vs s = fmrestrict_set vs s')"
  shows "(sat_precond_as s' (as_proj as vs))"
  using assms
proof (induction as arbitrary: s s' vs)
  case (Cons a as)
  then have 1:
    "fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s" "sat_precond_as (state_succ s a) as"
    using Cons.prems(1)
    by simp+
  then have 2: "fmrestrict_set vs (fst a) ‚äÜ‚á©f s"
    using assms(1) sat_precond_as_proj_4
    by blast
  moreover
  {
    assume "fmdom' (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) ‚â† {}"
    then have "
      sat_precond_as s' (as_proj (a # as) vs)
      = (
        fst (action_proj a vs) ‚äÜ‚á©f s'
        ‚àß sat_precond_as (state_succ s' (action_proj a vs)) (as_proj as vs)
      )
    "
      using calculation
      by simp
    moreover
    {
      have "fst (action_proj a vs) ‚äÜ‚á©f s' = (fmrestrict_set vs (fst a) ‚äÜ‚á©f s')"
        unfolding action_proj_def
        by simp
      moreover have "(fmrestrict_set vs (fst a) ‚äÜ‚á©f s) = (fmrestrict_set vs (fst a) ‚äÜ‚á©f s')"
        using Cons.prems(2) sat_precond_as_proj_1
        by blast
      ultimately have "fst (action_proj a vs) ‚äÜ‚á©f s'"
        using 2
        by blast
    }
      ‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO detailled proof for this sledgehammered step.‚Ä∫
    moreover have "sat_precond_as (state_succ s' (action_proj a vs)) (as_proj as vs)"
      using 1 Cons.IH Cons.prems(2) drest_succ_proj_eq_drest_succ succ_drest_eq_drest_succ
      by metis
    ultimately have "(sat_precond_as s' (as_proj (a # as) vs))"
      by blast
  }
  moreover
  {
    assume P1: "¬¨(fmdom' (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) ‚â† {})"
    then have "sat_precond_as s' (as_proj (a # as) vs)"
    proof (cases "as_proj (a # as) vs")
      case Cons2: (Cons a' list)
        ‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO unfold the sledgehammered metis steps.‚Ä∫
      then have a: "
          sat_precond_as s' (as_proj (a # as) vs)
          = (fst a' ‚äÜ‚á©f s') ‚àß sat_precond_as (state_succ s' a') list
        "
        using P1 Cons.IH Cons.prems(1, 2) Cons2
        by (metis sat_precond_as_proj_3 empty_eff_not_in_as_proj sat_precond_as.simps(2))
      then have b: "fst a' ‚äÜ‚á©f s'"
        unfolding sat_precond_as.simps(2)
        using P1 Cons.IH Cons.prems(1, 2) sat_precond_as_proj_3 empty_eff_not_in_as_proj
        by (metis sat_precond_as.simps(2))
      then have "sat_precond_as (state_succ s' a') list"
        using a
        by blast
      then show ?thesis
        using a b
        by blast
    qed fastforce
  }
  ultimately show ?case
    by blast
qed simp


lemma sat_precond_drest_as_proj:
  fixes as s s' vs
  assumes "(sat_precond_as s as)" "(fmrestrict_set vs s = fmrestrict_set vs s')"
  shows "(sat_precond_as (fmrestrict_set vs s') (as_proj as vs))"
  using assms
proof (induction as arbitrary: s s' vs)
  case (Cons a as)
  then have 1: "fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s" "sat_precond_as (state_succ s a) as"
    using Cons.prems
    by auto+
  then have "fmrestrict_set vs (fst a) ‚äÜ‚á©f fmrestrict_set vs s"
    using fmsubset_restrict_set_mono
    by blast
  then have "fst (action_proj a vs) ‚äÜ‚á©f fmrestrict_set vs s'"
    unfolding action_proj_def
    using Cons.prems(2) sat_precond_as_proj_1
    by simp
  then have "fmrestrict_set vs (snd a) = fmrestrict_set vs (snd (action_proj a vs))"
    unfolding action_proj_def
    by (simp add: fmfilter_alt_defs(4))
  then have "fst (action_proj a vs) ‚äÜ‚á©f s"
    unfolding action_proj_def
    using 1(1) fst_conv sat_precond_as_proj_4
    by auto
      ‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO unfold these sledgehammered steps.‚Ä∫
  then have "
    fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s a)
    = fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ (fmrestrict_set vs s') (action_proj a vs))
  "
    using 1(1) Cons.prems(2)
    by (metis fmfilter_alt_defs(4) fmfilter_true fmlookup_restrict_set
        drest_succ_proj_eq_drest_succ option.simps(3))
  then show ?case
    using Cons.prems(1, 2)
    by (metis fmfilter_alt_defs(4) fmfilter_true fmlookup_restrict_set sat_precond_as_proj
        option.simps(3))
qed simp


lemma as_proj_eq_as:
  assumes "(no_effectless_act as)" "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)" "(prob_dom PROB ‚äÜ vs)"
  shows "(as_proj as vs = as)"
  using assms
proof (induction as arbitrary: PROB vs)
  case (Cons a as)
    ‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE We only need to look at the first branch of 'as\_proj'.‚Ä∫
    ‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO step should be refactored and proven explicitely because it's so pivotal.‚Ä∫
  then have "fmdom' (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) ‚â† {}"
    unfolding fmdom'_restrict_set_precise
    by (metis
        FDOM_eff_subset_prob_dom_pair dual_order.trans inf.orderE
        no_effectless_act.simps(2) valid_plan_valid_head)
      ‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE Proof 'action\_proj a vs = a' for the first branch of 'as\_proj'.‚Ä∫
  moreover {
    assume "fmdom' (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) ‚â† {}"
      ‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE show 'action\_proj a vs = a'.‚Ä∫
    moreover {
      have "as_proj (a # as) vs = action_proj a vs # as_proj as vs"
        using calculation
        by force
      then have "a ‚àà PROB"
        using Cons.prems(2) valid_plan_valid_head
        by fast
      then have "action_dom (fst a) (snd a) ‚äÜ prob_dom PROB"
        using exec_as_proj_valid_2
        by fast
      then have "action_dom (fst a) (snd a) ‚äÜ vs"
        using Cons.prems(3)
        by fast
      then have "action_proj a vs = a"
        using action_proj_idempot'
        by fast
    }
      ‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE show that 'as\_proj as vs = as'.‚Ä∫
    moreover {
      have 1: "no_effectless_act as"
        using Cons.prems(1)
        by simp
      then have "as ‚àà valid_plans PROB"
        using Cons.prems(2) valid_plan_valid_tail
        by fast
      then have "as_proj as vs = as"
        using Cons.prems(3) Cons.IH 1
        by blast
    }
    ultimately have "as_proj (a # as) vs = a # as"
      by simp
  }
  ultimately show ?case
    by fast
qed simp


lemma exec_rem_effless_as_proj_eq_exec_as_proj:
  fixes s
  shows "exec_plan s (as_proj (rem_effectless_act as) vs) = exec_plan s (as_proj as vs)"
proof (induction as arbitrary: s vs)
  case (Cons a as)
    ‚Äï ‚ÄπSplit cases on the branching introduced by `remove\_effectless\_act` and `as\_proj`.‚Ä∫
  then show ?case
  proof (cases "fmdom' (snd a) ‚â† {}")
    case true1: True
    then show ?thesis
    proof (cases "fmdom' (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) ‚â† {}")
      case False
      then show ?thesis by (simp add: Cons true1)
    qed (simp add: Cons true1)
  next
    case False
    then show ?thesis
    proof (cases "fmdom' (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) ‚â† {}")
      case true2: True
      then have 1: "fmdom' (snd a) ‚à© vs = {}"
        using False Int_empty_left
        by force
          ‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE This step shows that the case for @{term "fmdom' (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) ‚â† {}"} is
            impossible.‚Ä∫
          ‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO could be refactored into a (simp) lemma (`as\_proj\_eq\_as` also uses this?).‚Ä∫
      then have "fmdom' (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) = {}"
        by (simp add: fmdom'_restrict_set_precise)
      then show ?thesis
        using true2
        by blast
    qed (simp add: Cons)
  qed
qed simp


lemma exec_as_proj_eq_exec_as:
  fixes PROB as vs s
  assumes "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)" "(prob_dom PROB ‚äÜ vs)"
  shows "(exec_plan s (as_proj as vs) = exec_plan s as)"
  using assms as_proj_eq_as exec_rem_effless_as_proj_eq_exec_as_proj rem_effectless_works_1 rem_effectless_works_6
    rem_effectless_works_9 sublist_valid_plan
  by metis


lemma dom_prob_proj: "prob_dom (prob_proj PROB vs) ‚äÜ vs"
  using graph_plan_neq_mems_state_set_neq_len
  by fast


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO refactor into `FmapUtils.thy`.‚Ä∫
lemma subset_proj_absorb_1_a:
  fixes f vs1 vs2
  assumes "(vs1 ‚äÜ vs2)"
  shows "fmrestrict_set vs1 (fmrestrict_set vs2 f) = fmrestrict_set vs1 f"
  using assms
proof -
  {
    fix v
    have "fmlookup (fmrestrict_set vs1 (fmrestrict_set vs2 f)) v = fmlookup (fmrestrict_set vs1 f) v"
      using assms
    proof (cases "v ‚àà vs1")
      case False
      then show ?thesis
      proof (cases "v ‚àà vs2")
        case False
        then have "v ‚àâ vs1"
          using False assms
          by blast
        then have
          "fmlookup (fmrestrict_set vs1 (fmrestrict_set vs2 f)) v = None"
          "fmlookup (fmrestrict_set vs1 f) v = None"
          by simp+
        then show ?thesis
          by argo
      qed simp
    qed auto
  }
  then show ?thesis
    using fmap_ext
    by blast
qed

lemma subset_proj_absorb_1:
  assumes "(vs1 ‚äÜ vs2)"
  shows "(action_proj (action_proj a vs2) vs1 = action_proj a vs1)"
  using assms
proof -
  have
    "fmrestrict_set vs1 (fmrestrict_set vs2 (fst a)) = fmrestrict_set vs1 (fst a)"
    "fmrestrict_set vs1 (fmrestrict_set vs2 (snd a)) = fmrestrict_set vs1 (snd a)"
    using assms subset_proj_absorb_1_a
    by blast+
  then show ?thesis
    unfolding action_proj_def
    by simp
qed


lemma subset_proj_absorb:
  fixes PROB vs1 vs2
  assumes "vs1 ‚äÜ vs2"
  shows "prob_proj (prob_proj PROB vs2) vs1 = prob_proj PROB vs1"
proof -
  {
    have "
      prob_proj (prob_proj PROB vs2) vs1
      = ((Œªa. action_proj a vs1) ‚àò (Œªa. action_proj a vs2)) ` PROB
    "
      unfolding prob_proj_def
      by fastforce
    also have "‚Ä¶ = (Œªa. action_proj (action_proj a vs2) vs1) ` PROB"
      by fastforce
    also have "‚Ä¶ = (Œªa. action_proj a vs1) ` PROB"
      using assms subset_proj_absorb_1
      by metis
    also have "‚Ä¶ = prob_proj PROB vs1"
      unfolding prob_proj_def
      by simp
    finally have "prob_proj (prob_proj PROB vs2) vs1 = prob_proj PROB vs1"
      by simp
  }
  then show ?thesis
    by simp
qed


lemma union_proj_absorb:
  fixes PROB vs vs'
  shows "prob_proj (prob_proj PROB (vs ‚à™ vs')) vs = prob_proj PROB vs"
  by (simp add: subset_proj_absorb)


lemma NOT_VS_IN_DOM_PROJ_PRE_EFF:
  fixes ROB vs v a
  assumes "¬¨(v ‚àà vs)" "(a ‚àà PROB)"
  shows "(
    ((v ‚àà fmdom' (fst a)) ‚ü∂ (v ‚àà fmdom' (fst (action_proj a (prob_dom PROB - vs)))))
    ‚àß ((v ‚àà fmdom' (snd a)) ‚ü∂ (v ‚àà fmdom' (snd (action_proj a (prob_dom PROB - vs)))))
  )"
  unfolding action_proj_def
  using assms
  by (simp add: IN_FDOM_DRESTRICT_DIFF FDOM_pre_subset_prob_dom_pair
      FDOM_eff_subset_prob_dom_pair)


lemma IN_DISJ_DEP_IMP_DEP_DIFF:
  fixes PROB vs vs' v v'
  assumes "(v ‚àà vs')" "(v' ‚àà vs')" "(disjnt vs vs')"
  shows "(dep PROB v v' ‚ü∂ dep (prob_proj PROB (prob_dom PROB - vs)) v v')"
  using assms
proof (cases "v = v'")
  case False
  {
    assume P: "dep PROB v v'"
    then obtain a where a:
      "(v ‚àà fmdom' (fst a) ‚àß v' ‚àà fmdom' (snd a) ‚à® v ‚àà fmdom' (snd a) ‚àß v' ‚àà fmdom' (snd a))"
      "a ‚àà PROB"
      unfolding dep_def
      using False
      by blast
    {
      have "v ‚àâ vs"
        using assms(1, 3)
        unfolding disjnt_def
        by blast
      then have "(v ‚àà fmdom' (fst a) ‚ü∂ v ‚àà fmdom' (fst (action_proj a (prob_dom PROB - vs))))"
        "(v ‚àà fmdom' (snd a) ‚ü∂ v ‚àà fmdom' (snd (action_proj a (prob_dom PROB - vs))))"
        using a NOT_VS_IN_DOM_PROJ_PRE_EFF
        by metis+
    }
    note b = this
    then consider (i) "v ‚àà fmdom' (fst a) ‚àß v' ‚àà fmdom' (snd a)"
      | (ii) "v ‚àà fmdom' (snd a) ‚àß v' ‚àà fmdom' (snd a)"
      using a
      by blast
    then have "dep (prob_proj PROB (prob_dom PROB - vs)) v v'"
    proof (cases)
      case i
      then show ?thesis
        using assms(2, 3) a(2) b(1)
        by (meson dep_def disjnt_iff action_proj_in_prob_proj NOT_VS_IN_DOM_PROJ_PRE_EFF)
    next
      case ii
      then show ?thesis
        using assms(2, 3) a(2) b(2)
        by (meson dep_def disjnt_iff action_proj_in_prob_proj NOT_VS_IN_DOM_PROJ_PRE_EFF)
    qed
  }
  then show ?thesis
    by blast
qed (auto simp: dep_def prob_proj_def disjnt_def)


lemma  PROB_DOM_PROJ_DIFF:
  fixes P vs
  shows "prob_dom (prob_proj PROB (prob_dom PROB - vs)) = (prob_dom PROB) - vs"
  using graph_plan_neq_mems_state_set_neq_len
  by fastforce


lemma  two_children_parent_mems_le_finite:
  fixes PROB vs
  assumes "(vs ‚äÜ prob_dom PROB)"
  shows "(prob_dom (prob_proj PROB vs) = vs)"
  using assms graph_plan_neq_mems_state_set_neq_len
  by fast


‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO showcase (non-trivial proof).‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO find explicit proof.‚Ä∫
lemma PROJ_DOM_PRE_EFF_SUBSET_DOM:
  fixes a vs
  shows "
    (fmdom' (fst (action_proj a vs)) ‚äÜ fmdom' (fst a))
    ‚àß (fmdom' (snd (action_proj a vs)) ‚äÜ fmdom' (snd a))
  "
  unfolding action_proj_def
  by (auto simp: fmdom'_restrict_set_precise)


lemma NOT_IN_PRE_EFF_NOT_IN_PRE_EFF_PROJ:
  fixes a v vs
  shows "
    (¬¨(v ‚àà fmdom' (fst a)) ‚ü∂ ¬¨(v ‚àà fmdom' (fst (action_proj a vs))))
    ‚àß (¬¨(v ‚àà fmdom' (snd a)) ‚ü∂ ¬¨(v ‚àà fmdom' (snd (action_proj a vs))))
  "
  using PROJ_DOM_PRE_EFF_SUBSET_DOM rev_subsetD
  by metis


lemma dep_proj_dep:
  assumes "dep (prob_proj PROB vs) v v'"
  shows "dep PROB v v'"
  using assms
  unfolding dep_def prob_proj_def action_proj_def image_def
  apply (auto simp: fmdom'_restrict_set_precise)
  by auto


lemma NDEP_PROJ_NDEP:
  fixes PROB vs vs' vs''
  assumes "(¬¨dep_var_set PROB vs vs')"
  shows "(¬¨dep_var_set (prob_proj PROB vs'') vs vs')"
  using assms dep_proj_dep
  unfolding dep_var_set_def
  by metis


lemma SUBSET_PROJ_DOM_DISJ:
  fixes PROB vs vs'
  assumes "(vs ‚äÜ (prob_dom (prob_proj PROB (prob_dom PROB - vs'))))"
  shows "disjnt vs vs'"
  using assms
  by (auto simp add: PROB_DOM_PROJ_DIFF subset_iff disjnt_iff)


‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO showcase (lemma which is solved effortlessly by automation).‚Ä∫
lemma NOT_VS_DEP_IMP_DEP_PROJ:
  fixes PROB vs v v'
  assumes "¬¨(v ‚àà vs)" "¬¨(v' ‚àà vs)" "(dep PROB v v')"
  shows "(dep (prob_proj PROB (prob_dom PROB - vs)) v v')"
  using assms
  by (metis Diff_disjoint Diff_iff disjnt_def insertCI IN_DISJ_DEP_IMP_DEP_DIFF)


lemma DISJ_PROJ_NDEP_IMP_NDEP:
  fixes PROB vs vs' vs''
  assumes
    "(disjnt vs vs'')" "disjnt vs vs'"
    "¬¨(dep_var_set (prob_proj PROB (prob_dom PROB - vs)) vs' vs'')"
  shows "¬¨(dep_var_set PROB vs' vs'')"
proof -
  {
    assume C: "dep_var_set PROB vs' vs''"
    then obtain v1 v2 where "v1 ‚àà vs'" "v2 ‚àà vs''" "disjnt vs' vs''" "dep PROB v1 v2"
      unfolding dep_var_set_def
      by blast
    then have "‚àÉv1 v2.
      v1 ‚àà vs' ‚àß v2 ‚àà vs'' ‚àß disjnt vs' vs'' ‚àß dep (prob_proj PROB (prob_dom PROB - vs)) v1 v2
    "
      using assms(1, 2) IntI disjnt_def empty_iff NOT_VS_DEP_IMP_DEP_PROJ
      by metis
    then have False
      using assms
      unfolding dep_var_set_def
      by blast
  }
  then show ?thesis
    using assms
    unfolding dep_var_set_def
    by argo
qed


lemma PROJ_DOM_IDEMPOT:
  fixes PROB
