  shows "prob_proj PROB (prob_dom PROB) = PROB"
  using action_proj_idempot''
  by blast


lemma prob_proj_idempot:
  fixes vs vs'
  assumes "(vs ‚äÜ vs')"
  shows "(prob_proj PROB vs = prob_proj (prob_proj PROB vs') vs)"
  using assms subset_proj_absorb
  by blast


lemma prob_proj_dom_diff_eq_prob_proj_prob_proj_dom_diff:
  fixes vs vs'
  shows "
    prob_proj PROB (prob_dom PROB - (vs ‚à™ vs'))
    = prob_proj
      (prob_proj PROB (prob_dom PROB - vs))
      (prob_dom (prob_proj PROB (prob_dom PROB - vs)) - vs')
"
  using PROB_DOM_PROJ_DIFF subset_proj_absorb
  by (metis Compl_Diff_eq Diff_subset compl_eq_compl_iff sup_assoc)


lemma PROJ_DEP_IMP_DEP:
  fixes PROB vs v v'
  assumes "dep (prob_proj PROB (prob_dom PROB - vs)) v v'"
  shows "dep PROB v v'"
  using assms
  unfolding dep_def prob_proj_def
proof (cases "v = v'")
  case False
  then show "(‚àÉa.
      a ‚àà PROB
      ‚àß (v ‚àà fmdom' (fst a) ‚àß v' ‚àà fmdom' (snd a) ‚à® v ‚àà fmdom' (snd a) ‚àß v' ‚àà fmdom' (snd a)))
    ‚à® v = v'"
    using assms
    unfolding dep_def prob_proj_def
    by (smt image_iff NOT_IN_PRE_EFF_NOT_IN_PRE_EFF_PROJ)
qed blast


lemma PROJ_NDEP_TC_IMP_NDEP_TC_OR:
  fixes PROB vs v v'
  assumes "¬¨((Œªv1' v2'. dep (prob_proj PROB (prob_dom PROB - vs)) v1' v2')‚áß+‚áß+ v v')"
  shows "(
    (¬¨((Œªv1' v2'. dep PROB v1' v2')‚áß+‚áß+ v v'))
    ‚à® (‚àÉv''.
      v'' ‚àà vs
      ‚àß ((Œªv1' v2'. dep PROB v1' v2')‚áß+‚áß+ v v'')
      ‚àß ((Œªv1' v2'. dep PROB v1' v2')‚áß+‚áß+ v'' v')
    )
  )"
  using assms NOT_VS_DEP_IMP_DEP_PROJ DEP_REFL REFL_TC_CONJ[of
      "Œªv v'. dep PROB v  v'" "Œªv. ¬¨(v ‚àà vs)" "Œªv v'. dep (prob_proj PROB (prob_dom PROB- vs)) v v'"
      v v']
  by fastforce


lemma every_action_proj_eq_as_proj:
  fixes as vs
  shows "list_all (Œª a. action_proj a vs = a) (as_proj as vs)"
  by (induction as) (auto simp add: action_proj_idempot)


lemma empty_eff_not_in_as_proj_2:
  fixes a as vs
  assumes "fmdom' (snd (action_proj a vs)) = {}"
  shows "(as_proj as vs = as_proj (a # as) vs)"
  using assms
  by (auto simp add: action_proj_def)

declare[[smt_timeout=100]]

lemma sublist_as_proj_eq_as:
  fixes as' as vs
  assumes "subseq as' (as_proj as vs)"
  shows "(as_proj as' vs = as')"
  using assms
proof (induction as arbitrary: as' vs)
  case Nil
  moreover have "as' = []"
    using Nil.prems sublist_NIL
    by force
  then show ?case
    by simp
next
  case cons: (Cons a as)
  then show ?case
  proof (cases "as'")
    case (Cons aa list)
    then show ?thesis
    proof (cases "fmdom' (fmrestrict_set vs (snd aa)) ‚â† {}")
      case True
      then have "as_proj as' vs = action_proj aa vs # as_proj list vs"
        using Cons True
        by auto
      then show ?thesis
        by (metis as_proj.simps(2) cons.IH cons.prems action_proj_idempot local.Cons
            subseq_Cons2_iff)
    next
      case False
      then have "as_proj as' vs = as_proj list vs"
        using Cons False
        by simp
      then show ?thesis using cons False
        unfolding Cons
        by (smt action_proj_def action_proj_idempot as_proj.simps(2) prod.inject subseq_Cons2_neq)
    qed
  qed simp
qed


lemma DISJ_EFF_DISJ_PROJ_EFF:
  fixes a s vs
  assumes "fmdom' (snd a) ‚à© s = {}"
  shows "(fmdom' (snd (action_proj a vs)) ‚à© s = {})
"
proof -
  have 1: "snd (action_proj a vs) = fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)"
    unfolding action_proj_def
    by simp
  then have "fmdom' (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) ‚äÜ fmdom' (snd a)"
    using act_dom_proj_eff_subset_act_dom_eff
    by metis
  then show ?thesis
    using assms 1
    by auto
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE showcase (the step using `graph\_plan\_lemma\_5`--- labelled by '[1]'--- is non-trivial proof
due to missing premises and the last six proof steps are redundant).‚Ä∫
lemma state_succ_proj_eq_state_succ:
  fixes a s vs
  assumes "(varset_action a vs)" "(fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s)" "(fmdom' (snd a) ‚äÜ fmdom' s)"
  shows "(state_succ s (action_proj a vs) = state_succ s a)"
proof -
  have 1: "fmdom' (snd a) ‚à© (fmdom' s - vs) = {}"
    using assms(1) vset_disj_eff_diff
    by blast
  then have  2:
    "fmrestrict_set (fmdom' s - vs) s = fmrestrict_set (fmdom' s - vs) (state_succ s a)"
    using disj_imp_eq_proj_exec[where vs = "fmdom' s - vs"]
    by blast
  then have "fmdom' (snd (action_proj a vs)) ‚à© (fmdom' s - vs) = {}"
    using 1 DISJ_EFF_DISJ_PROJ_EFF[where s = "(fmdom' s - vs)"]
    by blast
  then have "
    fmrestrict_set (fmdom' s - vs) s
    = fmrestrict_set (fmdom' s - vs) (state_succ s (action_proj a vs))
  "
    using disj_imp_eq_proj_exec[where a = "(action_proj a vs)" and vs = "fmdom' s - vs"]
    by blast
  then have "fmdom' (snd (action_proj a vs)) ‚à© (fmdom' s - vs) = {}"
    using 1 DISJ_EFF_DISJ_PROJ_EFF[where s = "(fmdom' s - vs)"]
    by blast
  then have "
    fmrestrict_set (fmdom' s - vs) s =
    fmrestrict_set (fmdom' s - vs) (state_succ s (action_proj a vs))
  "
    using disj_imp_eq_proj_exec[of "action_proj a vs" "fmdom' s - vs"]
    by fast
      ‚Äï ‚Äπ[1]‚Ä∫
      ‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO unwrap this step.‚Ä∫
  then show ?thesis
    using 2 FDOM_state_succ graph_plan_lemma_5[where s = "state_succ s (action_proj a vs)"
        and s' = "state_succ s a" and vs = vs] assms(2, 3) dom_eff_subset_imp_dom_succ_eq_proj
      drest_proj_succ_eq_drest_succ
    by metis
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE duplicate declaration of lemma `state\_succ\_proj\_eq\_state\_succ` removed.‚Ä∫


lemma no_effectless_proj:
  fixes vs as
  shows "no_effectless_act (as_proj as vs)"
  by (induction as arbitrary: vs) (auto simp add: action_proj_def)


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE duplicate (this is identical to `valid\_as\_valid\_as\_proj`).‚Ä∫
lemma as_proj_valid_in_prob_proj:
  fixes PROB vs as
  assumes "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
  shows "(as_proj as vs ‚àà valid_plans (prob_proj PROB vs))"
  using assms valid_as_valid_as_proj
  by blast


‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO Unwrap the smt proof.‚Ä∫
lemma prob_proj_comm:
  fixes PROB vs vs'
  shows "prob_proj (prob_proj PROB vs) vs' = prob_proj (prob_proj PROB vs') vs"
  by (smt graph_plan_neq_mems_state_set_neq_len inf_commute inf_le2 PROJ_DOM_IDEMPOT prob_proj_idempot)


‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO Unwrap the metis proof.‚Ä∫
lemma vset_proj_imp_vset:
  fixes vs vs' a
  assumes "(varset_action a vs')" "(varset_action (action_proj a vs') vs)"
  shows "(varset_action a vs)"
  unfolding varset_action_def action_proj_def
  using assms
  by (metis action_proj_def exec_drest_5 snd_conv varset_action_def)


lemma  vset_imp_vset_act_proj_diff:
  fixes PROB vs vs' a
  assumes "(varset_action a vs)"
  shows "(varset_action (action_proj a (prob_dom PROB - vs')) vs)"
proof -
  have 1: "(fmdom' (snd a) ‚äÜ vs)"
    using assms varset_action_def
    by metis
  moreover
  {
    ‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO refactor and put into `Fmap\_Utils`.‚Ä∫
    have "
      fmdom' (snd (
        fmrestrict_set (prob_dom PROB - vs') (fst a)
        , fmrestrict_set (prob_dom PROB - vs') (snd a)
      ))
      = (fmdom' (snd a) ‚à© (prob_dom PROB - vs'))
    "
      by (simp add: Int_def Set.filter_def fmfilter_alt_defs(4))
    also have "‚Ä¶ ‚äÜ fmdom' (snd a)"
      by simp
    finally have "fmdom' (snd (
        fmrestrict_set (prob_dom PROB - vs') (fst a)
        , fmrestrict_set (prob_dom PROB - vs') (snd a)
      ))
      ‚äÜ vs
    "
      using 1 by simp
  }
  ultimately show ?thesis
    unfolding varset_action_def dep_var_set_def dep_def action_proj_def
    by blast
qed


lemma action_proj_disj_diff:
  assumes "(action_dom (fst a) (snd a) ‚äÜ vs1)" "(vs2 ‚à© vs3 = {})"
  shows "(action_proj (action_proj a (vs1 - vs2)) vs3 = action_proj a vs3)"
proof -
  have "‚àÄf fa fb p.
    action_proj (action_proj (action_proj p f) fb) fa = action_proj (action_proj p f) fb
    ‚à® ¬¨ action_dom (fst p::('a, 'b) fmap) (snd p::(_, 'c) fmap) ‚à© (f ‚à© fb) ‚äÜ fa
  "
    by (metis (no_types) action_proj_idempot' proj_action_dom_eq_inter inf_assoc)
  then have "‚àÄf fa p.
    action_proj (action_proj (p::('a, 'b) fmap √ó (_, 'c) fmap) f) fa
    = action_proj p (f ‚à© fa)
  "
    by (metis (no_types) inf.cobounded2 inf_commute subset_proj_absorb_1)
  then show ?thesis
    using assms
    by (metis Diff_Int_distrib2 Diff_empty action_proj_idempot')
qed


lemma disj_proj_proj_eq_proj:
  fixes PROB vs vs'
  assumes "(vs ‚à© vs' = {})"
  shows "prob_proj (prob_proj PROB (prob_dom PROB - vs')) vs = prob_proj PROB vs"
proof -
  {
    fix a
    assume P: "a ‚àà PROB"
    moreover have "action_dom (fst a) (snd a) ‚äÜ prob_dom PROB"
      using P exec_as_proj_valid_2
      by blast
    ultimately have "action_proj (action_proj a (prob_dom PROB - vs')) vs = action_proj a vs"
      using assms action_proj_disj_diff[of a "prob_dom PROB" vs' vs]
      by blast
  }
  then show ?thesis
    unfolding prob_proj_def
    by (smt image_cong image_image)
qed


lemma n_replace_proj_le_n_as_2:
  fixes a vs vs'
  assumes "(vs ‚äÜ vs')" "(varset_action a vs')"
  shows "(varset_action (action_proj a vs') vs ‚ü∑ varset_action a vs)"
  unfolding varset_action_def action_proj_def
  using assms
  by (simp add: exec_drest_5 varset_action_def)


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE type of `PROB` had to be fixed for use of `empty\_problem\_bound`.‚Ä∫
lemma empty_problem_proj_bound:
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem"
  shows "problem_plan_bound (prob_proj PROB {}) = 0"
proof -
  ‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO refactor?‚Ä∫
  {
    have "prob_proj {} {} = {}"
      unfolding prob_proj_def action_proj_def
      using image_empty
      by simp
    moreover {
      assume P: "PROB ‚â† {}"
      have "‚àÄa. (fmrestrict_set {} (fst a), fmrestrict_set {} (snd a)) = (fmempty, fmempty)"
        using fmrestrict_set_null
        by simp
      then have "prob_proj PROB {} = {(fmempty, fmempty)}"
        unfolding prob_proj_def action_proj_def
        using P
        by auto
    }
    ultimately consider
      (i) "prob_proj PROB {} = {}"
      | (ii) "prob_proj PROB {} = {(fmempty, fmempty)}"
      by (cases "PROB = {}") force+
    then have "prob_dom (prob_proj PROB {}) = {}"
      unfolding prob_dom_def action_dom_def using fmdom'_empty
      by (cases) force+
  }
  then show ?thesis
    using empty_problem_bound[where PROB="prob_proj PROB {}"]
    by blast
qed


lemma problem_plan_bound_works_proj:
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem" and s as vs
  assumes "finite PROB" "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)" "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)" "(sat_precond_as s as)"
  shows "(‚àÉas'.
    (exec_plan (fmrestrict_set vs s) as' = exec_plan (fmrestrict_set vs s) (as_proj as vs))
    ‚àß (length as' ‚â§ problem_plan_bound (prob_proj PROB vs))
    ‚àß (subseq as' (as_proj as vs))
    ‚àß (sat_precond_as s as')
    ‚àß (no_effectless_act as')
  )"
proof -
  {
    have "exec_plan (fmrestrict_set vs s) (as_proj as vs) = fmrestrict_set vs (exec_plan s as)"
      using assms(4) sat_precond_exec_as_proj_eq_proj_exec
      by blast
    moreover have "fmrestrict_set vs s ‚àà valid_states (prob_proj PROB vs)"
      using assms(2) graph_plan_not_eq_last_diff_paths
      by auto
    moreover have "as_proj as vs ‚àà valid_plans (prob_proj PROB vs)"
      using assms(3) valid_as_valid_as_proj
      by blast
    moreover have "finite (prob_proj PROB vs)"
      unfolding prob_proj_def
      using assms(1)
      by simp
    ultimately have "‚àÉas'.
      exec_plan (fmrestrict_set vs s) (as_proj as vs) = exec_plan (fmrestrict_set vs s) as'
      ‚àß subseq as' (as_proj as vs) ‚àß length as' ‚â§ problem_plan_bound (prob_proj PROB vs)
    "
      using problem_plan_bound_works[of "prob_proj PROB vs"
          "fmrestrict_set vs s" "as_proj as vs"]
      by blast
  }
  then obtain as' where
    "exec_plan (fmrestrict_set vs s) (as_proj as vs) = exec_plan (fmrestrict_set vs s) as'"
    "subseq as' (as_proj as vs) ‚àß length as' ‚â§ problem_plan_bound (prob_proj PROB vs)"
    by fast
  moreover {
    have "
      exec_plan (fmrestrict_set vs s) as
      = exec_plan (fmrestrict_set vs s) (rem_condless_act (fmrestrict_set vs s) [] as)
    "
      using rem_condless_valid_1[of "fmrestrict_set vs s" as]
      by blast
    then have "subseq (rem_condless_act (fmrestrict_set vs s) [] as') as'"
      using rem_condless_valid_8 [of "fmrestrict_set vs s" as']
      by blast
  }
  moreover have "length (rem_condless_act (fmrestrict_set vs s) [] as') ‚â§ length as'"
    using rem_condless_valid_3[of "fmrestrict_set vs s"]
    by fast
  moreover have 4:
    "sat_precond_as (fmrestrict_set vs s) (rem_condless_act (fmrestrict_set vs s) [] as')"
    using rem_condless_valid_2[of "fmrestrict_set vs s" as']
    by blast
  moreover have "
    exec_plan (fmrestrict_set vs s) (rem_condless_act (fmrestrict_set vs s) [] as')
    = exec_plan (fmrestrict_set vs s)
      (rem_effectless_act (rem_condless_act (fmrestrict_set vs s) [] as'))
  "
    using rem_effectless_works_1[of "fmrestrict_set vs s"
        "rem_condless_act (fmrestrict_set vs s) [] as'"]
    by blast
  moreover {
    have "
      subseq (rem_effectless_act (rem_condless_act (fmrestrict_set vs s) [] as))
     (rem_condless_act (fmrestrict_set vs s) [] as)
    "
      using rem_effectless_works_9[of
          "(rem_condless_act (fmrestrict_set vs s) [] (as :: 'a action list))"]
      by blast
    then have "
      length (rem_effectless_act (rem_condless_act (fmrestrict_set vs s) [] as'))
      ‚â§ length (rem_condless_act (fmrestrict_set vs s) [] as')
    "
      using rem_effectless_works_3[of
          "(rem_condless_act (fmrestrict_set vs s) [] (as' :: 'a action list))"]
      by simp
    then have "
      sat_precond_as (fmrestrict_set vs s)
      (rem_effectless_act (rem_condless_act (fmrestrict_set vs s) [] as'))
    "
      using 4 rem_effectless_works_2[of "fmrestrict_set vs s"
          "(rem_condless_act (fmrestrict_set vs s) [] as')"]
      by blast
    then have
      "no_effectless_act (rem_effectless_act (rem_condless_act (fmrestrict_set vs s) [] as'))"
      using rem_effectless_works_6[of "(rem_condless_act (fmrestrict_set vs s) [] (as' ::'a action list))"]
      by simp
  }
  ultimately show ?thesis
    using rem_effectless_works_13 rem_condless_valid_1 order_trans
      no_effectless_proj sat_precond_drest_sat_precond subseq_order.order_trans
    by (metis (no_types, lifting))
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO refactor into `Fmap\_Utils`.‚Ä∫
lemma action_proj_inter_i: "fmrestrict_set V (fmrestrict_set W f) = fmrestrict_set (V ‚à© W) f"
  unfolding fmfilter_alt_defs(4)
  by simp

lemma action_proj_inter: "action_proj (action_proj a vs1) vs2 = action_proj a (vs1 ‚à© vs2)"
proof -
  have
    "fmrestrict_set vs2 (fmrestrict_set vs1 (fst a)) = fmrestrict_set (vs1 ‚à© vs2) (fst a)"
    "fmrestrict_set vs2 (fmrestrict_set vs1 (snd a)) = fmrestrict_set (vs1 ‚à© vs2) (snd a)"
    using inf_commute action_proj_inter_i
    by metis+
  then show ?thesis
    unfolding action_proj_def
    by simp
qed

lemma prob_proj_inter: "prob_proj (prob_proj PROB vs1) vs2 = prob_proj PROB (vs1 ‚à© vs2)"
  unfolding prob_proj_def
  using set_eq_iff image_iff action_proj_inter
  supply[[smt_timeout=100]]
  by (smt image_cong image_image)


subsection "Snapshotting"

text ‚Äπ A snapshot is an abstraction concept of the system in which the assignment of a set of
variables is fixed and actions whose preconditions or effects violate the fixed assignments are
eliminated. [Abdulaziz et al., p.28]

Formally this notion is build on the definition of agreement of states (`agree`), which
states that variables `v`, `v'`in the shared domain of two states must be assigned to the same
value. A snapshot w.r.t to a state `s` is then defined as the set of actions of a problem where the
precondition and the effect agree. [Abdulaziz et al., Definition 16, HOL4 Definition 16, p.28] ‚Ä∫


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE  name shortened.‚Ä∫
definition agree where
  "agree s1 s2 ‚â° (‚àÄv. (v ‚àà fmdom' s1) ‚àß (v ‚àà fmdom' s2) ‚ü∂ (fmlookup s1 v = fmlookup s2 v))"


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
lemma state_succ_fixpoint_if:
  fixes a s PROB
  assumes "a ‚àà PROB" "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)" "fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s" "agree (snd a) s"
  shows "state_succ s a = s"
proof -
  {
    have "fmdom' (snd a) ‚äÜ fmdom' s"
      using assms(1, 2) FDOM_eff_subset_FDOM_valid_states_pair
      by blast
    moreover have "‚àÄx. x ‚àà fmdom' (snd a) ‚ü∂ fmlookup (snd a) x = fmlookup s x"
      using assms(4) calculation(1) agree_def subsetCE
      by metis
    moreover have "s ++‚á©f snd a = s"
      using calculation(2)
      by (metis fmap_ext fmdom'_notD fmdom_notI fmlookup_add)
  }
  then show ?thesis
    using fmap_add_ltr_def state_succ_def
    by metis
qed


lemma agree_state_succ_idempot:
  assumes "(a ‚àà PROB)" "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)" "(agree (snd a) s)"
  shows "(state_succ s a = s)"
proof (cases "fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s")
  case True
  then show ?thesis
    using assms state_succ_fixpoint_if
    by blast
next
  case False
  then show ?thesis
    unfolding state_succ_def fmap_add_ltr_def
    by simp
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO refactor into `Fmap\_Utils`.‚Ä∫
lemma fmdom'_fmrestrict_set:
  fixes X f
  shows "fmdom' (fmrestrict_set X f) = X ‚à© (fmdom' f)"
  unfolding fmdom'_alt_def fmfilter_alt_defs(4)
  by auto

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO refactor into 'Fmap\_Utils'.‚Ä∫
lemma fmdom'_fmrestrict_set_fmadd:
  fixes X f g
  shows "fmdom' (fmrestrict_set X (f ++‚á©f g)) = X ‚à© (fmdom' f ‚à™ fmdom' g)"
proof -
  have "fmrestrict_set X (f ++‚á©f g) = fmrestrict_set X f ++‚á©f fmrestrict_set X g"
    using fmrestrict_set_add_distrib
    by fast
  then show ?thesis
    using fmdom'_fmrestrict_set fmdom'_add
    by metis
qed

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO refactor into 'Fmap\_Utils'.‚Ä∫
lemma fmrestrict_agree:
  fixes X x f g
  assumes "agree (fmrestrict_set X f) (fmrestrict_set X g)" "x ‚àà X ‚à© fmdom' f ‚à© fmdom' g"
  shows "fmlookup (fmrestrict_set X f) x = fmlookup (fmrestrict_set X g) x"
proof -
  {
    fix v
    assume "v ‚àà X ‚à© fmdom' f ‚à© fmdom' g"
    then have "v ‚àà fmdom' (fmrestrict_set X f) ‚àß v ‚àà fmdom' (fmrestrict_set X g)"
      using fmdom'_fmrestrict_set
      by force
    then have "fmlookup (fmrestrict_set X f) v = fmlookup (fmrestrict_set X g) v"
      using assms(1)
      unfolding agree_def
      by blast
  }
  then show ?thesis
    using assms
    by blast
qed

lemma agree_restrict_state_succ_idempot:
  assumes "(a ‚àà PROB)" "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)"
    "(agree (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) (fmrestrict_set vs s))"
  shows "(fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s a) = fmrestrict_set vs s)"
proof (cases "fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s")
  case True
  then have "state_succ s a = s ++‚á©f snd a"
    unfolding state_succ_def fmap_add_ltr_def
    by simp
  {
    fix v
    have "fmlookup (fmrestrict_set vs (s ++‚á©f snd a)) v = fmlookup (fmrestrict_set vs s) v"
    proof (cases "v ‚àà fmdom' (snd a)")
      case True
      then have 1: "fmdom' (fmrestrict_set vs (s ++‚á©f snd a)) = vs ‚à© (fmdom' s ‚à™ fmdom' (snd a))"
        unfolding fmap_add_ltr_def
        using fmdom'_fmrestrict_set_fmadd
        by metis
      then have 2: "fmdom' (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) = vs ‚à© fmdom' (snd a)"
        using fmdom'_fmrestrict_set
        by metis
      then show ?thesis
        using 1 2
      proof (cases "v ‚àà vs")
        case true: True
        then show ?thesis
        proof (cases "v ‚àà (fmdom' s ‚à© fmdom' (snd a))")
          case True
          then have "v ‚àà vs ‚à© fmdom' s ‚à© fmdom' (snd a)"
            using true
            by blast
          then have "fmlookup (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) v = fmlookup (fmrestrict_set vs s) v"
            using assms(3) fmrestrict_agree
            by fast
          then show ?thesis
            by fastforce
        next
          case False
          then have "fmdom' (snd a) ‚äÜ fmdom' s"
            using assms(1, 2) FDOM_eff_subset_FDOM_valid_states_pair
            by metis
          then have "v ‚àâ fmdom' (snd a)"
            using true False
            by blast
          then show ?thesis
            by fastforce
        qed
      qed auto
    qed fastforce
  }
  then show ?thesis
    unfolding state_succ_def fmap_add_ltr_def
    using fmap_ext
    by metis
next
  case False
  then show ?thesis
    unfolding state_succ_def
    by simp
qed


lemma agree_exec_idempot:
  assumes "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)" "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)"
    "(‚àÄa. ListMem a as ‚ü∂ agree (snd a) s)"
  shows "(exec_plan s as = s)"
  using assms
proof (induction as arbitrary: PROB s)
  case (Cons a as)
  then have 1: "a ‚àà PROB"
    using Cons.prems(1) valid_plan_valid_head
    by fast
  then have 2: "as ‚àà valid_plans PROB"
    using Cons.prems(1) valid_plan_valid_tail
    by fast
  then have 3: "‚àÄa. ListMem a as ‚ü∂ agree (snd a) s"
    using Cons.prems(3) ListMem.simps
    by metis
  then have "ListMem a (a # as)"
    using elem
    by fast
  then have "agree (snd a) s"
    using Cons.prems(3)
    by blast
  then have 4: "state_succ s a = s"
    using Cons.prems(1, 2) 1 agree_state_succ_idempot
    by blast
  then have "exec_plan s as = s"
    using Cons.IH Cons.prems(2) 2 3
    by blast
  then show ?case
    using 4
    by simp
qed simp


lemma agree_restrict_exec_idempot:
  fixes s s'
  assumes "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)" "(s' ‚àà valid_states PROB)" "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)"
    "(‚àÄa. ListMem a as ‚ü∂ agree (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) (fmrestrict_set vs s))"
    "(fmrestrict_set vs s' = fmrestrict_set vs s)"
  shows  "(fmrestrict_set vs (exec_plan s' as) = fmrestrict_set vs s)"
  using assms
proof (induction as arbitrary: PROB s s' vs)
  case (Cons a as)
  have 1: "as ‚àà valid_plans PROB"
    using Cons.prems(1) valid_plan_valid_tail
    by fast
  then have 2: "‚àÄa. ListMem a as ‚ü∂ agree (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) (fmrestrict_set vs s)"
    using Cons.prems(4) ListMem.simps
    by metis
  then have 3: "a ‚àà PROB"
    using Cons.prems(1) valid_plan_valid_head
    by metis
  moreover
  {
    have "ListMem a (a # as)"
      using elem
      by fast
    then have "agree (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) (fmrestrict_set vs s)"
      using Cons.prems(4) calculation(1)
      by blast
    then  have "agree (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) (fmrestrict_set vs s')"
      using Cons.prems(5)
      by simp
  }
  ultimately show ?case
    using assms
  proof (cases "fst a ‚äÜ‚á©f s'")
    case True
    {
      have a: "s' ‚àà valid_states PROB"
        using Cons.prems(2)
        by simp
      moreover have "state_succ s' a ‚àà valid_states PROB"
        using 3 a lemma_1_i
        by blast
      moreover have
        " ‚àÄa. ListMem a as ‚ü∂ agree (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) (fmrestrict_set vs s)"
        using 2
        by blast
      moreover {
        have "ListMem a (a # as)"
          using elem
          by fast
        then have "agree (fmrestrict_set vs (snd a)) (fmrestrict_set vs s)"
          using Cons.prems(4) calculation(1)
          by blast
        then have "fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s' a) = fmrestrict_set vs s"
          using Cons.prems(5) 3 a agree_restrict_state_succ_idempot
          by metis
      }
      ultimately have "fmrestrict_set vs (exec_plan (state_succ s' a) as) = fmrestrict_set vs s"
        using assms(3) 1 Cons.IH[where s'="state_succ s' a"]
        by auto
    }
    then show ?thesis
      by simp
  next case False
    moreover have "exec_plan s' (a # as) = exec_plan s' as"
      using False
      by (simp add: state_succ_def)
    ultimately show ?thesis
      using Cons.IH Cons.prems(2, 3, 5) 1 2
      by presburger
  qed
qed simp


lemma agree_restrict_exec_idempot_pair:
  fixes s s'
  assumes "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)" "(s' ‚àà valid_states PROB)" "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)"
    "(‚àÄp e. ListMem (p, e) as ‚ü∂ agree (fmrestrict_set vs e) (fmrestrict_set vs s))"
    "(fmrestrict_set vs s' = fmrestrict_set vs s)"
  shows "(fmrestrict_set vs (exec_plan s' as) = fmrestrict_set vs s)"
  using assms agree_restrict_exec_idempot
  by fastforce


lemma agree_comm: "agree x x' = agree x' x"
  unfolding agree_def
  by fastforce


lemma restricted_agree_imp_agree:
  assumes "(fmdom' s2 ‚äÜ vs)" "(agree (fmrestrict_set vs s1) s2)"
  shows "(agree s1 s2)"
  using assms contra_subsetD fmlookup_restrict_set Int_iff fmdom'_fmrestrict_set
  unfolding agree_def
  by metis


lemma agree_imp_submap:
  assumes "f1 ‚äÜ‚á©f f2"
  shows "agree f1 f2"
  using assms
  unfolding agree_def
  by (simp add: as_needed_asses_submap_exec_ii)


lemma agree_FUNION:
  assumes "(agree fm fm1)" "(agree fm fm2)"
  shows "(agree fm (fm1 ++ fm2))"
  unfolding agree_def fmap_add_ltr_def
  using assms
  by (metis agree_def fmlookup_add fmlookup_dom'_iff)


lemma agree_fm_list_union:
  fixes fm
  assumes "(‚àÄfm'. ListMem fm' fmList ‚ü∂ agree fm fm')"
  shows "(agree fm (foldr fmap_add_ltr fmList fmempty))"
  using assms proof (induction "fmList" arbitrary: fm)
  case Nil
  then have "foldr fmap_add_ltr [] fmempty = fmempty"
    using Nil
    by simp
  then show ?case
    unfolding agree_def
    by auto
next
  case (Cons a fmList)
  then have "‚àÄfm'. ListMem fm' fmList ‚ü∂ agree fm fm'"
    using Cons.prems insert
    by fast
  then have 1: "agree fm (foldr fmap_add_ltr fmList fmempty)"
    using Cons.IH
    by blast
  then have "agree fm a"
    using Cons.prems elem
    by fast
  then have "agree fm (a ++ foldr fmap_add_ltr fmList fmempty)"
    using 1 agree_FUNION
    by blast
  then show ?case
    by simp
qed


lemma DRESTRICT_EQ_AGREE:
  assumes "(fmdom' s2 ‚äÜ vs2)" "(fmdom' s1 ‚äÜ vs1)"
  shows "((fmrestrict_set vs2 s1 = fmrestrict_set vs1 s2) ‚ü∂ agree s1 s2)"
  using assms fmdom'_restrict_set restricted_agree_imp_agree
  by (metis agree_def)


lemma  SUBMAPS_AGREE: "(s1 ‚äÜ‚á©f s) ‚àß (s2 ‚äÜ‚á©f s) ‚üπ (agree s1 s2)"
  unfolding agree_def
  by (metis as_needed_asses_submap_exec_ii)


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE name shortened.‚Ä∫
definition snapshot where
  "snapshot PROB s = {a | a. a ‚àà PROB ‚àß agree (fst a) s ‚àß agree (snd a) s}"


lemma snapshot_pair: "snapshot PROB s = {(p, e). (p, e) ‚àà PROB ‚àß agree p s ‚àß agree e s}"
  unfolding snapshot_def
  by fastforce

lemma action_agree_valid_in_snapshot:
  assumes "(a ‚àà PROB)" "(agree (fst a) s)" "(agree (snd a) s)"
  shows "(a ‚àà snapshot PROB s)"
  unfolding snapshot_def
  using assms
  by blast

lemma as_mem_agree_valid_in_snapshot:
  assumes "(‚àÄa. ListMem a as ‚ü∂ agree (fst a) s ‚àß agree (snd a) s)" "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
  shows "(as ‚àà valid_plans (snapshot PROB s))"
  using assms
proof (induction as)
  case Nil
  then show ?case
    using empty_plan_is_valid
    by blast
next
  case (Cons a as)
  {
    have "‚àÄa. ListMem a as ‚ü∂ agree (fst a) s ‚àß agree (snd a) s"
      using Cons.prems(1) insert
      by fast
    moreover have "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
      using Cons.prems(2) valid_plan_valid_tail
      by fast
    ultimately have "set as ‚äÜ snapshot PROB s"
      using Cons.IH valid_plans_def
      by fast
  }
  note 1 = this
  {
    have a: "a ‚àà PROB"
      using Cons.prems(2) valid_plan_valid_head
      by metis
    then have "ListMem a (a # as)"
      using elem
      by fast
    then have "agree (fst a) s ‚àß agree (snd a) s"
      using Cons.prems(1)
      by blast
    then have "a ‚àà snapshot PROB s"
      using a snapshot_def
      by auto
  }
  then have "set (a # as) ‚äÜ snapshot PROB s"
    using 1 set_simps(2)
    by simp
  then show ?case using valid_plans_def
    by blast
qed

lemma fmrestrict_agree_monotonous:
  fixes f g X
  assumes "agree f g"
  shows "agree (fmrestrict_set X f) (fmrestrict_set X g)"
proof -
  let ?F="fmdom' (fmrestrict_set X f)"
  let ?G="fmdom' (fmrestrict_set X g)"
  have 1: "?F = X ‚à© fmdom' f" "?G = X ‚à© fmdom' g"
    using fmdom'_fmrestrict_set
    by metis+
  {
    fix v
    assume "v ‚àà ?F" "v ‚àà ?G"
    then have "v ‚àà fmdom' f" "v ‚àà fmdom' g"
      using 1
      by blast+
    then have "fmlookup f v = fmlookup g v"
      using assms
      unfolding agree_def
      by blast
    then have "fmlookup (fmrestrict_set X f) v = fmlookup (fmrestrict_set X g) v"
      unfolding fmlookup_restrict_set
      by argo
  }
  then show ?thesis
    using assms
    unfolding agree_def
    by blast
qed

‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO remove if not used.‚Ä∫
lemma SUBMAP_FUNION_DRESTRICT_i:
  fixes v vsa vsb f g
  assumes "v ‚àà vsa"
  shows "
    fmlookup (fmrestrict_set ((vsa ‚à™ vsb) ‚à© vs) f) v
    = fmlookup (fmrestrict_set (vsa ‚à© vs) f) v
  "
  unfolding fmlookup_restrict_set
  using assms
  by auto


lemma SUBMAP_FUNION_DRESTRICT':
  assumes "(agree fma fmb)" "(vsa ‚äÜ fmdom' fma)" "(vsb ‚äÜ fmdom' fmb)"
    "(fmrestrict_set vsa fm  = fmrestrict_set (vsa ‚à© vs) fma)"
    "(fmrestrict_set vsb fm = fmrestrict_set (vsb ‚à© vs) fmb)"
  shows "(fmrestrict_set (vsa ‚à™ vsb) fm = fmrestrict_set ((vsa ‚à™ vsb) ‚à© vs) (fma ++ fmb))"
proof -
  let ?f="fmrestrict_set (vsa ‚à™ vsb) fm"
  let ?g="fmrestrict_set ((vsa ‚à™ vsb) ‚à© vs) (fma ++ fmb)"
  have 1: "?g = fmrestrict_set ((vsa ‚à™ vsb) ‚à© vs) fmb ++‚á©f fmrestrict_set ((vsa ‚à™ vsb) ‚à© vs) fma"
    unfolding fmap_add_ltr_def fmrestrict_set_add_distrib
    by simp
  have 2: "agree (fmrestrict_set ((vsa ‚à™ vsb) ‚à© vs) fma) (fmrestrict_set ((vsa ‚à™ vsb) ‚à© vs) fmb)"
    using assms(1) fmrestrict_agree_monotonous
    by blast
  have 3:
    "fmdom' (fmrestrict_set ((vsa ‚à™ vsb) ‚à© vs) fma) = ((vsa ‚à™ vsb) ‚à© vs) ‚à© fmdom' fma"
    "fmdom' (fmrestrict_set ((vsa ‚à™ vsb) ‚à© vs) fmb) = ((vsa ‚à™ vsb) ‚à© vs) ‚à© fmdom' fmb"
    using fmdom'_fmrestrict_set
    by metis+
  {
    fix v
    have "fmlookup ?f v = fmlookup ?g v"
    proof (cases "v ‚àà ((vsa ‚à™ vsb) ‚à© vs)")
      case True
        ‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO unwrap smt proof.‚Ä∫
      then show ?thesis
        using assms(1, 2, 3, 4, 5) 1
        by (smt IntD1 SUBMAP_FUNION_DRESTRICT_i UnE agree_def domIff fmdom'.rep_eq fmdom'_alt_def
            fmdom'_fmrestrict_set fmlookup_add fmlookup_restrict_set inf_sup_distrib2 notin_fset
            subset_iff sup_commute)
    next
      case False
      then show ?thesis
      proof -
        have "v ‚àâ vsa ‚à™ vsb ‚à® v ‚àâ vs"
          using False
          by blast
        then have "fmlookup (fmrestrict_set (vsa ‚à™ vsb) fm) v = None"
          using assms(4, 5)
          by (metis Int_iff Un_iff fmlookup_restrict_set)
        then show ?thesis
          using False
          by auto
      qed
    qed
  }
  then show ?thesis
    using 1 fmap_ext
    by blast
qed

lemma UNION_FUNION_DRESTRICT_SUBMAP:
  assumes "(vs1 ‚äÜ fmdom' fma)" "(vs2 ‚äÜ fmdom' fmb)" "(agree fma fmb)"
    "(fmrestrict_set vs1 fma ‚äÜ‚á©f s)" "(fmrestrict_set vs2 fmb ‚äÜ‚á©f s)"
  shows "(fmrestrict_set (vs1 ‚à™ vs2) (fma ++ fmb) ‚äÜ‚á©f s)"
proof -
  {
    let ?f="fmrestrict_set (vs1 ‚à™ vs2) (fma ++ fmb)"
    fix v
    assume P: "v ‚àà fmdom' ?f"
    {
      have "v ‚àà (vs1 ‚à™ vs2) ‚à© (fmdom' fma ‚à™ fmdom' fmb)"
        using P
        unfolding fmap_add_ltr_def fmdom'_fmrestrict_set fmdom'_add
        by force
      then have "v ‚àà vs1 ‚à™ vs2" "v ‚àà fmdom' fma ‚à™ fmdom' fmb"
        by fast+
    }
    note 1 = this
    then have 2: "fmlookup ?f v = fmlookup (fmb ++‚á©f fma) v"
      unfolding fmlookup_restrict_set fmap_add_ltr_def
      by argo
    then consider
      (i) "v ‚àà vs1"
      | (ii) "v ‚àà vs2"
      | (iii) "¬¨v‚àà vs1 ‚àß ¬¨v‚ààvs2"
      by blast
    then have "fmlookup ?f v = fmlookup s v"
    proof (cases)
      case i
      then have "v ‚àà fmdom' fma"
        using assms(1)
        by blast
      then have "fmlookup ?f v = fmlookup fma v"
        unfolding 2 fmlookup_add
        by (simp add: fmdom'_alt_def notin_fset)
      also have "‚Ä¶ = fmlookup (fmrestrict_set vs1 fma) v"
        unfolding fmlookup_restrict_set
        using i
        by simp
      finally show ?thesis
        using assms(4)
        by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) P domIff fmdom'_notI fmsubset.rep_eq map_le_def)
    next
      ‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO unwrap smt proof.‚Ä∫
      case ii
      then show ?thesis
        using assms(2, 3, 5) 2 P
        by (smt SUBMAP_FUNION_DRESTRICT_i agree_def
            fmdom'.rep_eq fmdom'_fmrestrict_set fmdom'_notD fmdom'_notI fmlookup_add
            fmrestrict_set_dom fmsubset.rep_eq inf.orderE map_le_def subset_Un_eq)
    next
      case iii
      then show ?thesis
        using 1
        by blast
    qed
  }
  then show ?thesis
    by (simp add: as_needed_asses_submap_exec_vii)
qed

‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO unwrap sledgehammered metis proof.‚Ä∫
(* TODO duplicate lemma? *)
lemma agree_DRESTRICT:
  assumes "agree s1 s2"
  shows "agree (fmrestrict_set vs s1) (fmrestrict_set vs s2)"
  using assms by (fact fmrestrict_agree_monotonous)

lemma agree_DRESTRICT_2:
  assumes "(fmdom' s1 ‚äÜ vs1)" "(fmdom' s2 ‚äÜ vs2)" "(agree s1 s2)"
  shows "(agree (fmrestrict_set vs2 s1) (fmrestrict_set vs1 s2))"
  using assms
  unfolding agree_def fmdom'_restrict_set_precise
  by auto

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
lemma snapshot_eq_filter:
  shows "snapshot PROB s = Set.filter (Œªa. agree (fst a) s ‚àß agree (snd a) s) PROB"
  unfolding snapshot_def Set.filter_def
  by presburger

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE moved up.‚Ä∫
corollary snapshot_subset:
  shows "snapshot PROB s ‚äÜ PROB"
  unfolding snapshot_def
  using snapshot_eq_filter
  by blast

lemma FINITE_snapshot:
  assumes "finite PROB"
  shows "finite (snapshot PROB s)"
proof -
  have "snapshot PROB s ‚äÜ PROB"
    using snapshot_subset
    by blast
  then show ?thesis
    using assms finite_subset[of "snapshot PROB s" PROB]
    by blast
qed

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE moved up (declared above the previous lemma).
lemma snapshot\_subset‚Ä∫

‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO unwrap metis proof.‚Ä∫
lemma dom_proj_snapshot:
  "prob_dom (prob_proj PROB (prob_dom (snapshot PROB s))) = prob_dom (snapshot PROB s)"
  by (metis snapshot_subset two_children_parent_mems_le_finite prob_subset_dom_subset)

lemma valid_states_snapshot:
  "valid_states (prob_proj PROB (prob_dom (snapshot PROB s))) = valid_states (snapshot PROB s)"
  by (metis dom_proj_snapshot valid_states_def)

lemma valid_proj_neq_succ_restricted_neq_succ:
  assumes "(x' ‚àà prob_proj PROB vs)" "(state_succ s x' ‚â† s)"
  shows "(fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s x') ‚â† fmrestrict_set vs s)"
  unfolding state_succ_def
  using FDOM_eff_subset_prob_dom_pair dom_prob_proj limited_dom_neq_restricted_neq
  using assms(1, 2)
  by (smt dual_order.trans state_succ_def)

lemma proj_successors: "
  ((Œªs. fmrestrict_set vs s) ` (state_successors (prob_proj PROB vs) s))
   ‚äÜ (state_successors (prob_proj PROB vs) (fmrestrict_set vs s))
"
proof -
  let ?A="((Œªs. fmrestrict_set vs s) ` (state_successors (prob_proj PROB vs) s))"
  let ?B="(state_successors (prob_proj PROB vs) (fmrestrict_set vs s))"
  {
    fix x
    assume P: "x ‚àà ?A"
    then obtain x' x'' where a:
      "x'' ‚àà prob_proj PROB vs" "x' = state_succ s x''" "x' ‚â† s" "x = fmrestrict_set vs x'"
      unfolding state_successors_def subset_iff
      by blast
    moreover {
      have "(‚àÉx''.
        x'' ‚àà prob_proj PROB vs ‚àß x = state_succ (fmrestrict_set vs s) x''
        ‚àß x ‚â† fmrestrict_set vs s)"
      proof (cases "fst x'' ‚äÜ‚á©f s")
        case true: True
        then show ?thesis
        proof (cases "fst x'' ‚äÜ‚á©f fmrestrict_set vs s")
          case True
          {
            have "fmdom' (snd x'') ‚äÜ vs"
              using a(1) FDOM_eff_subset_prob_dom_pair dom_prob_proj dual_order.trans
              by metis
            then have "fmrestrict_set vs (snd x'') = snd x''"
              using exec_drest_5
              by fast
          }
          note i = this
          {
            have "x = fmrestrict_set vs (snd x'' ++ s)"
              using a(2, 4) true
              unfolding state_succ_def
              by simp
            then have "x = fmrestrict_set vs (snd x'') ++ fmrestrict_set vs s"
              unfolding fmap_add_ltr_def
              using fmrestrict_set_add_distrib
              by simp
            then have "x = snd x'' ++ fmrestrict_set vs s"
              using i
              by simp
            then have "x = state_succ (fmrestrict_set vs s) x''"
              unfolding state_succ_def
              using True
              by argo
          }
          moreover have  "x ‚â† fmrestrict_set vs s"
            using a valid_proj_neq_succ_restricted_neq_succ
            by fast
          ultimately show ?thesis
            using a(1)
            by blast
        next
          case False
          then show ?thesis
          proof -
            have "x'' ‚àà (Œªp. action_proj p vs) ` PROB"
              using calculation(1) prob_proj_def
              by auto
            then have "action_proj x'' vs = x''"
              using action_proj_idempot
              by blast
            then show ?thesis
              by (metis (no_types) False action_proj_pair fmsubset_restrict_set_mono fstI
                  surjective_pairing true)
          qed
        qed
      next
        case False
        then show ?thesis
        proof (cases "fst x'' ‚äÜ‚á©f fmrestrict_set vs s")
          case True
          then have "fmdom' (snd x'') ‚äÜ vs"
            using FDOM_eff_subset_prob_dom_pair dom_prob_proj
            using a(1) dual_order.trans
            by metis
          then have "fmrestrict_set vs (snd x'') = snd x''"
            using exec_drest_5
            by fast
          then show ?thesis
            unfolding state_succ_def fmap_add_ltr_def
            using False True sublist_as_proj_eq_as_1
            by fast
        next
          case False
          then have "fmdom' (fst x'') ‚äÜ vs"
            using FDOM_pre_subset_prob_dom_pair dom_prob_proj
            using a(1) dual_order.trans
            by metis
          then have "fmrestrict_set vs (fst x'') = fst x''"
            by (simp add: exec_drest_5)
          then show ?thesis
            unfolding state_succ_def fmap_add_ltr_def
            using a False fmsubset_restrict_set_mono
            by (metis state_succ_def)
        qed
      qed
    }
    then obtain x'' where "x'' ‚àà prob_proj PROB vs" "x = state_succ (fmrestrict_set vs s) x''"
      "x ‚â† fmrestrict_set vs s"
      by blast
    then have "x ‚àà ?B" unfolding state_successors_def
      by blast
  }
  then show ?thesis
    by blast
qed

lemma  state_in_successor_proj_in_state_in_successor: "
  (s' ‚àà state_successors (prob_proj PROB vs) s)
  ‚üπ (fmrestrict_set vs s'  ‚àà state_successors (prob_proj PROB vs) (fmrestrict_set vs s))"
  using proj_successors
  by force

lemma proj_FDOM_eff_subset_FDOM_valid_states:
  fixes p e s
  assumes "((p, e) ‚àà prob_proj PROB vs)" "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)"
  shows "(fmdom' e ‚äÜ fmdom' s)"
  using assms
proof -
  {
    obtain p' e' where "(p', e') ‚àà PROB" "(p, e) = action_proj (p', e') vs"
      using assms(1)
      unfolding prob_proj_def
      by fast
    then have "fmdom' e ‚äÜ prob_dom (prob_proj PROB vs)"
      using assms FDOM_eff_subset_prob_dom
      by blast
    also have "‚Ä¶ = prob_dom PROB ‚à© vs"
      using graph_plan_neq_mems_state_set_neq_len
      by fast
    finally have "fmdom' e ‚äÜ prob_dom PROB"
      by simp
  }
  moreover have "fmdom' s = prob_dom PROB"
    using assms(2)
    unfolding valid_states_def
    by simp
  ultimately show ?thesis
    by simp
qed

lemma valid_proj_action_valid_succ:
  assumes "(h ‚àà prob_proj PROB vs)" "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)"
  shows "(state_succ s h ‚àà valid_states PROB)"
proof -
  have "fmdom' (snd h) ‚äÜ fmdom' s"
    using assms proj_FDOM_eff_subset_FDOM_valid_states surjective_pairing
    by metis
  moreover have "fmdom' (state_succ s h) = fmdom' s"
    using calculation(1) FDOM_state_succ
    by metis
  ultimately show ?thesis
    using assms(2) valid_states_def
    by blast
qed

lemma proj_successors_of_valid_are_valid:
  assumes "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)"
  shows "(state_successors (prob_proj PROB vs) s ‚äÜ (valid_states PROB))"
  unfolding state_successors_def
  using assms valid_proj_action_valid_succ
  by blast

subsection "State Space Projection"

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE  name shortened.‚Ä∫
definition ss_proj where
  "ss_proj ss vs ‚â° (Œªs. fmrestrict_set vs s) ` ss"

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO refactor into 'Fmap\_Utils'.‚Ä∫
lemma fmrestrict_set_inter_img:
  fixes A X Y
  shows "fmrestrict_set (X ‚à© Y) ` A = (fmrestrict_set X ‚àò fmrestrict_set Y) ` A"
proof -
  ‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE Proof by mutual inclusion.‚Ä∫
  let ?lhs = "fmrestrict_set (X ‚à© Y) ` A"
  let ?rhs = "(fmrestrict_set X ‚àò fmrestrict_set Y) ` A"
  {
    fix a
    assume "a ‚àà A"
    have "(fmrestrict_set X ‚àò fmrestrict_set Y) a = fmrestrict_set X (fmrestrict_set Y a)"
      by auto
    also have "‚Ä¶ = fmrestrict_set (X ‚à© Y) a"
      using action_proj_inter_i
      by fast
    finally have "(fmrestrict_set X ‚àò fmrestrict_set Y) a = fmrestrict_set (X ‚à© Y) a"
      by auto
  }
  note 1 = this
  {
    fix a
    assume P: "a ‚àà A"
    then have "fmrestrict_set (X ‚à© Y) a ‚àà ?lhs"
      by simp
    moreover have "(fmrestrict_set X ‚àò fmrestrict_set Y) a ‚àà ?rhs"
      using P
      by blast
    ultimately have
      "fmrestrict_set (X ‚à© Y) a ‚àà ?rhs" "(fmrestrict_set X ‚àò fmrestrict_set Y) a ‚àà ?lhs"
      using P 1
      by metis+
  }
  then show ?thesis
    by blast
qed

lemma invariantStateSpace_thm_9:
  fixes ss vs1 vs2
  shows "ss_proj ss (vs1 ‚à© vs2) = ss_proj (ss_proj ss vs2) vs1"
proof -
  {
    have "
      ss_proj ss (vs1 ‚à© vs2)
      = fmrestrict_set (vs1 ‚à© vs2) ` ss
    "
      unfolding ss_proj_def
      by simp
    also have "‚Ä¶ = (fmrestrict_set vs1 ‚àò fmrestrict_set vs2) ` ss"
      using fmrestrict_set_inter_img
      by metis
    finally have "ss_proj ss (vs1 ‚à© vs2) = ss_proj (ss_proj ss vs2) vs1"
      unfolding ss_proj_def
      by force
  }
  then show ?thesis
    by simp
qed

lemma FINITE_ss_proj:
  fixes ss vs
  assumes "finite ss"
  shows "finite (ss_proj ss vs)"
  unfolding ss_proj_def
  using assms
  by simp

lemma nempty_stateSpace_nempty_ss_proj:
  assumes "(ss ‚â† {})"
  shows "(ss_proj ss vs ‚â† {})"
  unfolding ss_proj_def
  using assms
  by simp

lemma invariantStateSpace_thm_5:
  fixes ss vs domain
  assumes "(stateSpace ss domain)"
  shows "(stateSpace (ss_proj ss vs) (domain ‚à© vs))"
  using assms
  unfolding stateSpace_def ss_proj_def
  by (metis (no_types, lifting) fmdom'_fmrestrict_set imageE inf_commute)

lemma dom_subset_ssproj_eq_ss:
  fixes ss domain vs
  assumes "(stateSpace ss domain)" "(domain ‚äÜ vs)"
  shows "(ss_proj ss vs = ss)"
  unfolding ss_proj_def stateSpace_def
  using assms exec_drest_5
  by (metis (mono_tags, lifting) image_cong image_ident stateSpace_def)

‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO refactor duplicate proof steps in case split.‚Ä∫
lemma  neq_vs_neq_ss_proj:
  fixes vs
  assumes "(ss ‚â† {})" "(stateSpace ss vs)" "(vs1 ‚äÜ vs)" "(vs2 ‚äÜ vs)" "(vs1 ‚â† vs2)"
  shows "(ss_proj ss vs1 ‚â† ss_proj ss vs2)"
proof -
  {
    have 1: "‚àÉf. f ‚àà ss"
      using assms(1)
      by blast
    then obtain x where " (x ‚àà vs1 ‚àß x ‚àâ vs2) ‚à® (x ‚àà vs2 ‚àß x ‚àâ vs1)"
      using assms(5)
      by blast
    then consider (i) "x ‚àà vs1 ‚àß x ‚àâ vs2" | (ii) "x ‚àà vs2 ‚àß x ‚àâ vs1"
      by blast
    then have "fmrestrict_set vs1 ` ss ‚â†  fmrestrict_set vs2 ` ss" proof (cases)
      case i
      {
        fix s' t'
        assume "s' ‚àà fmrestrict_set vs1 ` ss" "t' ‚àà fmrestrict_set vs2 ` ss"
        then obtain s t where a:
          "s ‚àà ss" "s' = fmrestrict_set vs1 s" "t ‚àà ss" "t' = fmrestrict_set vs2 t"
          by blast
        then have "fmdom' s = vs"
          using assms(2)
          by (simp add: stateSpace_def)
        then have b: "fmdom' s' = vs1"
          using assms(3) a fmdom'_fmrestrict_set inf.order_iff
          by metis
        then have "fmdom' t = vs"
          using assms(2) a(3)
          by (simp add: stateSpace_def)
        then have "fmdom' t' = vs2"
          using assms(4) a(4) fmdom'_fmrestrict_set inf.order_iff
          by metis
        then have "fmlookup s' x ‚â† None" "fmlookup t' x = None"
          using i b domIff fmdom'_alt_def fmdom.rep_eq
          by metis+
        then have "s' ‚â† t'"
          by blast
      }
      then show ?thesis
        using 1 neq_funs_neq_images
        by blast
    next
      case ii
      {
        fix s' t'
        assume "s' ‚àà fmrestrict_set vs1 ` ss" "t' ‚àà fmrestrict_set vs2 ` ss"
        then obtain s t where c:
          "s ‚àà ss" "s' = fmrestrict_set vs1 s" "t ‚àà ss" "t' = fmrestrict_set vs2 t"
          by blast
        then have "fmdom' s = vs"
          using assms(2)
          by (simp add: stateSpace_def)
        then have d: "fmdom' s' = vs1"
          using assms(3) c(2) fmdom'_fmrestrict_set inf.order_iff
          by metis
        then have  "fmdom' t = vs"
          using assms(2) c(3)
          by (simp add: stateSpace_def)
        then have "fmdom' t' = vs2"
          using assms(4) c(4) fmdom'_fmrestrict_set inf.order_iff
          by metis
        then have "fmlookup s' x = None" "fmlookup t' x ‚â† None"
          using ii d domIff fmdom'_alt_def fmdom.rep_eq
          by metis+
        then have "s' ‚â† t'"
          by blast
      }
      then show ?thesis
        using 1 neq_funs_neq_images
        by blast
    qed
  }
  then show ?thesis
    unfolding ss_proj_def
    by blast
qed

lemma subset_dom_stateSpace_ss_proj:
  fixes vs1 vs2
  assumes "(vs1 ‚äÜ vs2)" "(stateSpace ss vs2)"
  shows "(stateSpace (ss_proj ss vs1) vs1)"
  using assms
  by (metis inf.absorb_iff2 invariantStateSpace_thm_5)

lemma card_proj_leq:
  assumes "finite PROB"
  shows "card (prob_proj PROB vs) ‚â§ card PROB"
  unfolding prob_proj_def
  using assms card_image_le
  by blast

end

Theory Acyclicity

theory Acyclicity
  imports Main
begin


section ‚ÄπAcyclicity‚Ä∫

text ‚Äπ Two of the discussed bounding algorithms ("top-down" and "bottom-up") exploit acyclicity
of the system under projection on sets of state variables closed under mutual variable dependency. 
[Abdulaziz et al., p.11] 

This specific notion of acyclicity is formalised using topologically sorted dependency graphs 
induced by the variable dependency relation. [Abdulaziz et al., p.14]‚Ä∫


subsection "Topological Sorting of Dependency Graphs"

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE name shortened.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE using 'fun' because of multiple defining equations.‚Ä∫ 
fun top_sorted_abs where
  "top_sorted_abs R [] = True"
| "top_sorted_abs R (h # l) = (list_all (Œªx. ¬¨R x h) l ‚àß top_sorted_abs R l)"


lemma top_sorted_abs_mem: 
  assumes "(top_sorted_abs R (h # l))" "(ListMem x l)"
  shows "(¬¨ R x h)"
  using assms
  by (auto simp add: ListMem_iff list.pred_set)


lemma top_sorted_cons: 
  assumes "top_sorted_abs R (h # l)"
  shows "(top_sorted_abs R l)"
  using assms
  by simp


subsection ‚ÄπThe Weightiest Path Function (wlp)‚Ä∫

text ‚Äπ The weightiest path function is a generalization of an algorithm which computes the
longest path in a DAG starting at a given vertex `v`. Its arguments are the relation `R` which
induces the graph, a weighing function `w` assigning weights to vertices, an accumulating functions
`f` and `g` which aggregate vertex weights into a path weight and the weights of different paths
respectively, the considered vertex and the graph represented as a topological sorted list. 
[Abdulaziz et al., p.18] 

Typical weight combining functions have the properties defined by `geq\_arg` and `increasing`. 
[Abdulaziz et al., p.18] ‚Ä∫

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE name shortened.‚Ä∫
fun wlp where
  "wlp R w g f x [] = w x"
| "wlp R w g f x (h # l) = (if R x h
    then g (f (w x) (wlp R w g f h l)) (wlp R w g f x l)
    else wlp R w g f x l
  )"


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE name shortened.‚Ä∫
definition geq_arg where 
  "geq_arg f ‚â° (‚àÄx y. (x ‚â§ f x y) ‚àß (y ‚â§ f x y))"


lemma individual_weight_less_eq_lp: 
  fixes w :: "'a ‚áí nat"
  assumes "geq_arg g"
  shows "(w x ‚â§ wlp R w g f x l)"
  using assms
  unfolding geq_arg_def
proof (induction l arbitrary: R w g f x)
  case (Cons a l)
  then show ?case
    using Cons.IH Cons.prems
  proof (cases "R x a")
    case True
    then show ?thesis 
      using Cons le_trans wlp.simps(2)
      by smt
  next
    case False
    then show ?thesis 
      using Cons
      by simp
  qed
qed simp


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE Types of 'f' and 'g' had to be fixed to be able to use transitivity rule of the less-equal
relation.‚Ä∫
lemma lp_geq_lp_from_successor:
  fixes vtx1 and f g :: "nat ‚áí nat ‚áí nat"
  assumes "geq_arg f" "geq_arg g" "(‚àÄvtx. ListMem vtx G ‚ü∂ ¬¨R vtx vtx)" "R vtx2 vtx1" 
    "ListMem vtx1 G" "top_sorted_abs R G" 
  shows "(f (w vtx2) (wlp R w g f vtx1 G) ‚â§ (wlp R w g f vtx2 G))" 
  using assms
  unfolding geq_arg_def
proof (induction G arbitrary: vtx1 f g R vtx2)
  case Nil
  then show ?case 
    using ListMem_iff
    by fastforce
next
  case (Cons a G)
  show ?case 
  proof (auto)
    assume P1: "R vtx1 a" "R vtx2 a"
    then show "
        f (w vtx2) (g (f (w vtx1) (wlp R w g f a G)) (wlp R w g f vtx1 G))
        ‚â§ g (f (w vtx2) (wlp R w g f a G)) (wlp R w g f vtx2 G)"
      using Cons.prems(3, 5, 6)
      by (metis ListMem_iff set_ConsD top_sorted_abs_mem)
  next 
    assume P2: "R vtx1 a" "¬¨ R vtx2 a" 
    then show "
        f (w vtx2) (g (f (w vtx1) (wlp R w g f a G)) (wlp R w g f vtx1 G)) 
        ‚â§ wlp R w g f vtx2 G"
      using Cons.prems(4, 5, 6)
      by (metis ListMem_iff set_ConsD top_sorted_abs_mem) 
  next 
    assume P3: "¬¨ R vtx1 a" "R vtx2 a" 
    then show "
        f (w vtx2) (wlp R w g f vtx1 G) 
        ‚â§ g (f (w vtx2) (wlp R w g f a G)) (wlp R w g f vtx2 G)"
    proof -
      have f1: "‚àÄn na. n ‚â§ g n na ‚àß na ‚â§ g n na"
        using Cons.prems(2) by blast
      have f2: "vtx1 = a ‚à® vtx1 ‚àà set G"
        by (meson Cons.prems(5) ListMem_iff set_ConsD)
      obtain aa :: "('a ‚áí 'a ‚áí bool) ‚áí 'a" where
        "‚àÄx2. (‚àÉv5. ListMem v5 G ‚àß x2 v5 v5) = (ListMem (aa x2) G ‚àß x2 (aa x2) (aa x2))"
        by moura
      then have "
          ListMem (aa R) G ‚àß R (aa R) (aa R) 
          ‚à® ¬¨ ListMem vtx1 G ‚à® f (w vtx2) (wlp R w g f vtx1 G) ‚â§ wlp R w g f vtx2 G"
        using f1 by (metis (no_types) Cons.IH Cons.prems(1, 4, 6) top_sorted_cons)
      then show ?thesis
        using f2 f1 by (meson Cons.prems(3) ListMem_iff insert le_trans)
    qed
  next 
    assume P4: "¬¨ R vtx1 a" "¬¨ R vtx2 a"
    then show "f (w vtx2) (wlp R w g f vtx1 G) ‚â§ wlp R w g f vtx2 G"
    proof -
      have f1: "top_sorted_abs R G"
        using Cons.prems(6) by fastforce
      have "ListMem vtx1 G"
        by (metis Cons.prems(4) Cons.prems(5) ListMem_iff P4(2) set_ConsD)
      then show ?thesis
        using f1 by (simp add: Cons.IH Cons.prems(1, 2, 3, 4) insert)
    qed 
  qed
qed


definition increasing where
  "increasing f ‚â° (‚àÄe b c d. (e ‚â§ c) ‚àß (b ‚â§ d) ‚ü∂ (f e b ‚â§ f c d))"


lemma weight_fun_leq_imp_lp_leq: "‚ãÄx.
  (increasing f)
  ‚üπ (increasing g)
  ‚üπ (‚àÄy. ListMem y l ‚ü∂ w1 y ‚â§ w2 y) 
  ‚üπ (w1 x ‚â§ w2 x)
  ‚üπ (wlp R w1 g f x l ‚â§ wlp R w2 g f x l)
"
  unfolding increasing_def
  by (induction l) (auto simp add: elem insert)


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE generalizing `f2`, `x1`, `x2` seems to break the prover.‚Ä∫
lemma wlp_congruence_rule: 
  fixes l1 l2 R1 R2 w1 w2 g1 g2 f1 f2 x1 x2 
  assumes "(l1 = l2)" "(‚àÄy. ListMem y l2 ‚ü∂ (R1 x1 y = R2 x2 y))"
    "(‚àÄy. ListMem y l2 ‚ü∂ (R1 y x1 = R2 y x2))" "(w1 x1 = w2 x2)" 
    "(‚àÄy1 y2. (y1 = y2) ‚ü∂ (f1 (w1 x1) y1 = f2 (w2 x2) y2))" 
    "(‚àÄy1 y2 z1 z2. (y1 = y2) ‚àß (z1 = z2) ‚ü∂ ((g1 (f1 (w1 x1) y1) z1) = (g2 (f2 (w2 x2) y2) z2)))"
    "(‚àÄx y. ListMem x l2 ‚àß ListMem y l2 ‚ü∂ (R1 x y = R2 x y))"
    "(‚àÄx. ListMem x l2 ‚ü∂ (w1 x = w2 x))"
    "(‚àÄx y z. ListMem x l2 ‚ü∂ (g1 (f1 (w1 x) y) z = g2 (f2 (w2 x) y) z))"
    "(‚àÄx y. ListMem x l2 ‚ü∂ (f1 (w1 x) y = f2 (w1 x) y))"
  shows "((wlp R1 w1 g1 f1 x1 l1) = (wlp R2 w2 g2 f2 x2 l2))"
  using assms
proof (induction l2 arbitrary: l1 x1 x2)
  case (Cons a l2)
  then have "(wlp R1 w1 g1 f1 x1 l2) = (wlp R2 w2 g2 f2 x2 l2)"
    using Cons
    by (simp add: insert)
  moreover have "(wlp R1 w1 g1 f1 a l2) = (wlp R2 w2 g2 f2 a l2)"
    using Cons
    by (simp add: elem insert)
  ultimately show ?case
    by (simp add: Cons.prems(1,2, 6) elem)
qed auto


lemma wlp_ite_weights: 
  fixes x
  assumes "‚àÄy. ListMem y l1 ‚ü∂ P y" "P x"
  shows "((wlp R (Œªy. if P y then w1 y else w2 y) g f x l1) = (wlp R w1 g f x l1))"
  using assms 

proof (induction l1 arbitrary: R P w1 w2 f g)
  case (Cons a l1)
  let ?w1="(Œªy. if P y then w1 y else w2 y)"
  let ?w2="w1"
  {
    have "‚àÄy. ListMem y l1 ‚ü∂ P y" 
      using Cons.prems(1) insert
      by fast
    then have "((wlp R (Œªy. if P y then w1 y else w2 y) g f x l1) = (wlp R w1 g f x l1))" 
      using Cons.prems(2) Cons.IH
      by blast
  }
  note 1 = this
  { 
    have "(if P x then w1 x else w2 x) = w1 x" 
      "‚àÄy1 y2. y1 = y2 ‚ü∂ f (if P x then w1 x else w2 x) y1 = f (w1 x) y2"
      "‚àÄy1 y2 z1 z2. 
        y1 = y2 ‚àß z1 = z2 
        ‚ü∂ g (f (if P x then w1 x else w2 x) y1) z1 = g (f (w1 x) y2) z2"
      "‚àÄx. ListMem x (a # l1) ‚ü∂ (if P x then w1 x else w2 x) = w1 x"
      "‚àÄx y z. 
        ListMem x (a # l1) 
        ‚ü∂ g (f (if P x then w1 x else w2 x) y) z = g (f (w1 x) y) z"
      "‚àÄx y.
        ListMem x (a # l1) ‚ü∂ f (if P x then w1 x else w2 x) y = f (if P x then w1 x else w2 x) y"
      using Cons.prems(1, 2)
      by simp+
    then have "wlp R (Œªy. if P y then w1 y else w2 y) g f x (a # l1) = wlp R w1 g f x (a # l1)"
      using Cons wlp_congruence_rule[of "a # l1" "a # l1" R x R x "?w1" "?w2" f f g g] 
      by blast
  }
  then show ?case
    by blast
qed auto


lemma map_wlp_ite_weights: "
  (‚àÄx. ListMem x l1 ‚ü∂ P x) 
  ‚üπ (‚àÄx. ListMem x l2 ‚ü∂ P x) 
  ‚üπ (
    map (Œªx. wlp R (Œªy. if P y then w1 y else w2 y) g f x l1) l2 
    = map (Œªx. wlp R w1 g f x l1) l2
  )
"
  apply(induction l2)
   apply(auto)
  subgoal by (simp add: elem wlp_congruence_rule)
  subgoal by (simp add: insert)
  done


lemma wlp_weight_lamda_exp: "‚ãÄx. wlp R w g f x l = wlp R (Œªy. w y) g f x l"
proof -
  fix x
  show "wlp R w g f x l = wlp R (Œªy. w y) g f x l" 
    by(induction l) auto
qed


lemma img_wlp_ite_weights: "
  (‚àÄx. ListMem x l ‚ü∂ P x) 
  ‚üπ (‚àÄx. x ‚àà s ‚ü∂ P x) 
  ‚üπ (
    (Œªx. wlp R (Œªy. if P y then w1 y else w2 y) g f x l) ` s 
    = (Œªx. wlp R w1 g f x l) ` s
  )
"
proof -
  assume P1: "‚àÄx. ListMem x l ‚ü∂ P x"
  assume P2: "‚àÄx. x ‚àà s ‚ü∂ P x"
  show "(
    (Œªx. wlp R (Œªy. if P y then w1 y else w2 y) g f x l) ` s 
    = (Œªx. wlp R w1 g f x l) ` s
  )" 
    by (auto simp add:  P1 P2 image_iff wlp_ite_weights)
qed


end

Theory AcycSspace

theory AcycSspace
  imports
    FactoredSystem
    ActionSeqProcess
    SystemAbstraction
    Acyclicity
    FmapUtils
begin


section "Acyclic State Spaces"


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE name shortened.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE type for `max` had to be fixed to natural number maximum (due to problem with loose
typing).‚Ä∫
value "(state_successors (prob_proj PROB vs))"
definition S
  where "S vs lss PROB s ‚â° wlp
    (Œªx y. y ‚àà (state_successors (prob_proj PROB vs) x))
    (Œªs. problem_plan_bound (snapshot PROB s))
    (max :: nat ‚áí nat ‚áí nat) (Œªx y. x + y + 1) s lss
  "

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE name shortened.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE using `fun` because of multiple defining equations.‚Ä∫
fun vars_change where
  "vars_change [] vs s = []"
| "vars_change (a # as) vs s = (if fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s a) ‚â† fmrestrict_set vs s
    then state_succ s a # vars_change as vs (state_succ s a)
    else vars_change as vs (state_succ s a)
  )"


lemma vars_change_cat:
  fixes s
  shows "
    vars_change (as1 @ as2) vs s
    = (vars_change as1 vs s @ vars_change as2 vs (exec_plan s as1))
  "
  by (induction as1 arbitrary: s as2 vs) auto


lemma empty_change_no_change:
  fixes s
  assumes "(vars_change as vs s = [])"
  shows "(fmrestrict_set vs (exec_plan s as) = fmrestrict_set vs s)"
  using assms
proof (induction as arbitrary: s vs)
  case (Cons a as)
  then show ?case
  proof (cases "fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s a) ‚â† fmrestrict_set vs s")
    case True
      ‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE This case violates the induction premise @{term "vars_change (a # as) vs s = []"} since the
        empty list is impossible.‚Ä∫
    then have "state_succ s a # vars_change as vs (state_succ s a) = []"
      using Cons.prems True
      by simp
    then show "fmrestrict_set vs (exec_plan s (a # as)) = fmrestrict_set vs s"
      by blast
  next
    case False
    then have "vars_change as vs (state_succ s a) = []"
      using Cons.prems False
      by force
    then have
      "fmrestrict_set vs (exec_plan (state_succ s a) as) = fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s a)"
      using Cons.IH[of vs "(state_succ s a)"]
      by blast
    then show "fmrestrict_set vs (exec_plan s (a # as)) = fmrestrict_set vs s"
      using False
      by simp
  qed
qed auto


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE renamed variable `a` to `b` to not conflict with naming for list head in induction step.‚Ä∫
lemma zero_change_imp_all_effects_submap:
  fixes s s'
  assumes "(vars_change as vs s = [])" "(sat_precond_as s as)" "(ListMem b as)"
    "(fmrestrict_set vs s = fmrestrict_set vs s')"
  shows "(fmrestrict_set vs (snd b) ‚äÜ‚á©f fmrestrict_set vs s')"
  using assms
proof (induction as arbitrary: s s' vs b)
  case (Cons a as)
    ‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE Having either @{term "fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s a) ‚â† fmrestrict_set vs s"} or
    @{term "¬¨ListMem b as"} leads to simpler propositions so we split here.‚Ä∫
  then show "(fmrestrict_set vs (snd b) ‚äÜ‚á©f fmrestrict_set vs s')"
    using Cons.prems(1)
  proof (cases "fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s a) = fmrestrict_set vs s ‚àß ListMem b as")
    case True
    let ?s="state_succ s a"
    have "vars_change as vs ?s = []"
      using True Cons.prems(1)
      by auto
    moreover have "sat_precond_as ?s as"
      using Cons.prems(2) sat_precond_as.simps(2)
      by blast
    ultimately show ?thesis
      using True Cons.prems(4) Cons.IH
      by auto
  next
    case False
    then consider
      (i) "fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s a) ‚â† fmrestrict_set vs s"
      | (ii) "¬¨ListMem b as"
      by blast
    then show ?thesis
      using Cons.prems(1)
    proof (cases)
      case ii
      then have "a = b"
        using Cons.prems(3) ListMem_iff set_ConsD
        by metis
          ‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE Mysteriously sledgehammer finds a proof here while the premises of
            `no\_change\_vs\_eff\_submap` cannot be proven individually.‚Ä∫
      then show ?thesis
        using Cons.prems(1, 2, 4) no_change_vs_eff_submap
        by (metis list.distinct(1) sat_precond_as.simps(2) vars_change.simps(2))
    qed simp
  qed
qed (simp add: ListMem_iff)


lemma zero_change_imp_all_preconds_submap:
  fixes s s'
  assumes "(vars_change as vs s = [])" "(sat_precond_as s as)" "(ListMem b as)"
    "(fmrestrict_set vs s = fmrestrict_set vs s')"
  shows "(fmrestrict_set vs (fst b) ‚äÜ‚á©f fmrestrict_set vs s')"
  using assms
proof (induction as arbitrary: vs s s')
  case (Cons a as)
    ‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE Having either @{term "fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s a) ‚â† fmrestrict_set vs s"} or
    @{term "¬¨ListMem b as"} leads to simpler propositions so we split here.‚Ä∫
  then show "(fmrestrict_set vs (fst b) ‚äÜ‚á©f fmrestrict_set vs s')"
    using Cons.prems(1)
  proof (cases "fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s a) = fmrestrict_set vs s ‚àß ListMem b as")
    case True
    let ?s="state_succ s a"
    have "vars_change as vs ?s = []"
      using True Cons.prems(1)
      by auto
    moreover have "sat_precond_as ?s as"
      using Cons.prems(2) sat_precond_as.simps(2)
      by blast
    ultimately show ?thesis
      using True Cons.prems(4) Cons.IH
      by auto
  next
    case False
    then consider
      (i) "fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s a) ‚â† fmrestrict_set vs s"
      | (ii) "¬¨ListMem b as"
      by blast
    then show ?thesis
      using Cons.prems(1)
    proof (cases)
      case ii
      then have "a = b"
        using Cons.prems(3) ListMem_iff set_ConsD
        by metis
      then show ?thesis
        using Cons.prems(2, 4) fmsubset_restrict_set_mono
        by (metis sat_precond_as.simps(2))
    qed simp
  qed
qed (simp add: ListMem_iff)


lemma no_vs_change_valid_in_snapshot:
  assumes "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)" "(sat_precond_as s as)" "(vars_change as vs s = [])"
  shows "(as ‚àà valid_plans (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s)))"
proof -
  {
    fix a
    assume P: "ListMem a as"
    then have "agree (fst a) (fmrestrict_set vs s)"
      by (metis agree_imp_submap assms(2) assms(3) fmdom'_restrict_set
          restricted_agree_imp_agree zero_change_imp_all_preconds_submap)
    moreover have "agree (snd a) (fmrestrict_set vs s)"
      by (metis (no_types) P agree_imp_submap assms(2) assms(3) fmdom'_restrict_set
          restricted_agree_imp_agree zero_change_imp_all_effects_submap)
    ultimately have "agree (fst a) (fmrestrict_set vs s)" "agree (snd a) (fmrestrict_set vs s)"
      by simp+
  }
  then show ?thesis
    using assms(1) as_mem_agree_valid_in_snapshot
    by blast
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE type of `PROB` had to be fixed for `problem\_plan\_bound\_works`.‚Ä∫
lemma no_vs_change_obtain_snapshot_bound_1st_step:
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem"
  assumes "finite PROB" "(vars_change as vs s = [])" "(sat_precond_as s as)"
    "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)" "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
  shows "(‚àÉas'.
    (
      exec_plan (fmrestrict_set (prob_dom (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))) s) as
      = exec_plan (fmrestrict_set (prob_dom (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))) s) as'
    )
    ‚àß (subseq as' as)
    ‚àß (length as' ‚â§ problem_plan_bound (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s)))
  )"
proof -
  let ?s="(fmrestrict_set (prob_dom (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))) s)"
  let ?PROB="(snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))"
  {
    have "finite (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))"
      using assms(1) FINITE_snapshot
      by blast
  }
  moreover {
    have "
      fmrestrict_set (prob_dom (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))) s
      ‚àà valid_states (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))"
      using assms(4) graph_plan_not_eq_last_diff_paths valid_states_snapshot
      by blast
  }
  moreover {
    have "as ‚àà valid_plans (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))"
      using assms(2, 3, 5) no_vs_change_valid_in_snapshot
      by blast
  }
  ultimately show ?thesis
    using problem_plan_bound_works[of ?PROB ?s as]
    by blast
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE type of `PROB` had to be fixed for `no\_vs\_change\_obtain\_snapshot\_bound\_1st\_step`.‚Ä∫
lemma no_vs_change_obtain_snapshot_bound_2nd_step:
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem"
  assumes "finite PROB" "(vars_change as vs s = [])" "(sat_precond_as s as)"
    "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)" "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
  shows "(‚àÉas'.
    (
      exec_plan (fmrestrict_set (prob_dom (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s)))  s) as
      = exec_plan (fmrestrict_set (prob_dom (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))) s) as'
    )
    ‚àß (subseq as' as)
    ‚àß (sat_precond_as s as')
    ‚àß (length as' ‚â§ problem_plan_bound (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s)))
  )"
proof -
  obtain as'' where 1:
    "
      exec_plan (fmrestrict_set (prob_dom (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))) s) as
      = exec_plan (fmrestrict_set (prob_dom (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))) s) as''"
    "subseq as'' as" "length as'' ‚â§ problem_plan_bound (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))"
    using assms no_vs_change_obtain_snapshot_bound_1st_step
    by blast
  let ?s'="(fmrestrict_set (prob_dom (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))) s)"
  let ?as'="rem_condless_act ?s' [] as''"
  have "exec_plan ?s' as = exec_plan ?s' as''"
    using 1(1) rem_condless_valid_1
    by blast
  moreover have "subseq ?as' as"
    using 1(2) rem_condless_valid_8 sublist_trans
    by blast
  moreover have "sat_precond_as s ?as'"
    using sat_precond_drest_sat_precond rem_condless_valid_2
    by fast
  moreover have "(length ?as' ‚â§ problem_plan_bound (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s)))"
    using 1 rem_condless_valid_3 le_trans
    by blast
  ultimately show ?thesis
    using 1 rem_condless_valid_1
    by auto
qed


lemma no_vs_change_obtain_snapshot_bound_3rd_step:
  assumes "finite (PROB :: 'a problem)" "(vars_change as vs s = [])" "(no_effectless_act as)"
    "(sat_precond_as s as)" "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)" "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
  shows "(‚àÉas'.
    (
      fmrestrict_set (prob_dom (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))) (exec_plan s as)
      = fmrestrict_set (prob_dom (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))) (exec_plan s as')
    )
    ‚àß (subseq as' as)
    ‚àß (length as' ‚â§ problem_plan_bound (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s)))
  )"
proof -
  obtain as' :: "(('a, bool) fmap √ó ('a, bool) fmap) list" where
    "(
      exec_plan (fmrestrict_set (prob_dom (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))) s) as
      = exec_plan (fmrestrict_set (prob_dom (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))) s) as'
    )" "subseq as' as" "sat_precond_as s as'"
    "length as' ‚â§ problem_plan_bound (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))"
    using assms(1, 2, 4, 5, 6) no_vs_change_obtain_snapshot_bound_2nd_step
    by blast
  moreover have
    "exec_plan (fmrestrict_set vs s) (as_proj as vs) = fmrestrict_set vs (exec_plan s as)"
    using assms(4) sat_precond_exec_as_proj_eq_proj_exec
    by blast
  moreover have "as_proj as (prob_dom (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))) = as"
    using assms(2, 3, 4, 6) as_proj_eq_as no_vs_change_valid_in_snapshot
    by blast
  ultimately show ?thesis
    using sublist_as_proj_eq_as proj_exec_proj_eq_exec_proj'
    by metis
qed

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE added lemma.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO remove unused assumptions.‚Ä∫
lemma no_vs_change_snapshot_s_vs_is_valid_bound_i:
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem"
  assumes  "finite PROB" "(vars_change as vs s = [])" "(no_effectless_act as)"
    "(sat_precond_as s as)" "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)" "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
    "fmrestrict_set (prob_dom (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))) (exec_plan s as) =
        fmrestrict_set (prob_dom (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))) (exec_plan s as')"
    "subseq as' as" "length as' ‚â§ problem_plan_bound (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))"
  shows
    "fmrestrict_set (fmdom' (exec_plan s as) - prob_dom (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s)))
        (exec_plan s as)
      = fmrestrict_set (fmdom' (exec_plan s as) - prob_dom (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s)))
        s
    ‚àß fmrestrict_set (fmdom' (exec_plan s as') - prob_dom (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s)))
        (exec_plan s as')
      = fmrestrict_set (fmdom' (exec_plan s as') - prob_dom (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s)))
        s"
proof -
  let ?vs="(prob_dom (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s)))"
  let ?vs'="(fmdom' (exec_plan s as) - prob_dom (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s)))"
  let ?vs''="(fmdom' (exec_plan s as') - prob_dom (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s)))"
  let ?s="(exec_plan s as)"
  let ?s'="(exec_plan s as')"
  have 1: "as ‚àà valid_plans (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))"
    using assms(2, 4, 6) no_vs_change_valid_in_snapshot
    by blast
  {
    {
      fix a
      assume "ListMem a as"
      then have "fmdom' (snd a) ‚äÜ prob_dom (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))"
        using 1 FDOM_eff_subset_prob_dom_pair valid_plan_mems
        by metis
      then have "fmdom' (fmrestrict_set (fmdom' (exec_plan s as)
          - prob_dom (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))) (snd a))
        = {}"
        using subset_inter_diff_empty[of "fmdom' (snd a)"
            "prob_dom (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))"] fmdom'_restrict_set_precise
        by metis
    }
    then have
      "fmrestrict_set ?vs' (exec_plan s as) = fmrestrict_set ?vs' s"
      using disjoint_effects_no_effects[of as ?vs' s]
      by blast
  }
  moreover {
    {
      fix a
      assume P: "ListMem a as'"
      moreover have Œ±: "as' ‚àà valid_plans (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))"
        using assms(8) 1 sublist_valid_plan
        by blast
      moreover have "a ‚àà PROB"
        using P Œ± snapshot_subset subsetCE valid_plan_mems
        by fast
      ultimately have "fmdom' (snd a) ‚äÜ prob_dom (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))"
        using FDOM_eff_subset_prob_dom_pair valid_plan_mems
        by metis
      then have "fmdom' (fmrestrict_set (fmdom' (exec_plan s as')
          - prob_dom (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))) (snd a))
        = {}"
        using subset_inter_diff_empty[of "fmdom' (snd a)"
            "prob_dom (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))"] fmdom'_restrict_set_precise
        by metis
    }
    then have
      "fmrestrict_set ?vs'' (exec_plan s as') = fmrestrict_set ?vs'' s"
      using disjoint_effects_no_effects[of as' ?vs'' s]
      by blast
  }
  ultimately show ?thesis
    by blast
qed

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE type for `PROB` had to be fixed.‚Ä∫
lemma no_vs_change_snapshot_s_vs_is_valid_bound:
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem"
  assumes "finite PROB" "(vars_change as vs s = [])" "(no_effectless_act as)"
    "(sat_precond_as s as)" "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)" "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
  shows "(‚àÉas'.
    (exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as')
    ‚àß (subseq as' as)
    ‚àß (length as' <= problem_plan_bound (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s)))
  )"
proof -
  obtain as' where 1:
    "fmrestrict_set (prob_dom (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))) (exec_plan s as) =
      fmrestrict_set (prob_dom (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))) (exec_plan s as')"
    "subseq as' as" "length as' ‚â§ problem_plan_bound (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))"
    using assms no_vs_change_obtain_snapshot_bound_3rd_step
    by blast
  {

    have a: "fmrestrict_set (fmdom' (exec_plan s as) - prob_dom (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s)))
        (exec_plan s as)
      = fmrestrict_set (fmdom' (exec_plan s as) - prob_dom (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s)))
        s "
      "fmrestrict_set (fmdom' (exec_plan s as') - prob_dom (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s)))
        (exec_plan s as')
      = fmrestrict_set (fmdom' (exec_plan s as') - prob_dom (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s)))
        s"
      using assms 1 no_vs_change_snapshot_s_vs_is_valid_bound_i
      by blast+
    moreover have "as' ‚àà valid_plans (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))"
      using "1"(2) assms(2) assms(4) assms(6) no_vs_change_valid_in_snapshot sublist_valid_plan
      by blast
    moreover have "(exec_plan s as) ‚àà valid_states PROB"
      using assms(5, 6) valid_as_valid_exec
      by blast
    moreover have "(exec_plan s as') ‚àà valid_states PROB"
      using assms(5, 6) 1 valid_as_valid_exec sublist_valid_plan
      by blast
    ultimately have "exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as'"
      using assms
      unfolding valid_states_def
      using graph_plan_lemma_5[where vs="prob_dom (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))", OF _ 1(1)]
      by force
  }
  then show ?thesis
    using 1
    by blast
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπTODO showcase (problems with stronger typing: Isabelle requires strict typing for `max`; whereas
in HOL4 this is not required, possible because 'MAX' is natural number specific.‚Ä∫
lemma snapshot_bound_leq_S:
  shows "
    problem_plan_bound (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))
    ‚â§ S vs lss PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s)
  "
proof -
  have "geq_arg (max :: nat ‚áí nat ‚áí nat)"
    unfolding geq_arg_def
    using max.cobounded1
    by simp
  then show ?thesis
    unfolding S_def
    using individual_weight_less_eq_lp[where
        g="max :: nat ‚áí nat ‚áí nat"
        and x="(fmrestrict_set vs s)" and R="(Œªx y. y ‚àà state_successors (prob_proj PROB vs) x)"
        and w="(Œªs. problem_plan_bound (snapshot PROB s))" and f="(Œªx y. x + y + 1)" and l=lss]
    by blast
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE first argument of `top\_sorted\_abs` had to be wrapped into lambda.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE the type of `1` had to be restricted to `nat` to ensure the proofs for `geq\_arg` work.‚Ä∫
lemma S_geq_S_succ_plus_ell:
  assumes "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)"
    "(top_sorted_abs (Œªx y. y ‚àà state_successors (prob_proj PROB vs) x) lss)"
    "(s' ‚àà state_successors (prob_proj PROB vs) s)" "(set lss = valid_states (prob_proj PROB vs))"
  shows "(
    problem_plan_bound (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))
      + S vs lss PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s')
      + (1 :: nat)
    ‚â§ S vs lss PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s)
  )"
proof -
  let ?f="Œªx y. x + y + (1 :: nat)"
  let ?R="(Œªx y. y ‚àà state_successors (prob_proj PROB vs) x)"
  let ?w="(Œªs. problem_plan_bound (snapshot PROB s))"
  let ?g="max :: nat ‚áí nat ‚áí nat"
  let ?vtx1="(fmrestrict_set vs s')"
  let ?G="lss"
  let ?vtx2="(fmrestrict_set vs s)"
  have "geq_arg ?f"
    unfolding geq_arg_def
    by simp
  moreover have "geq_arg ?g"
    unfolding geq_arg_def
    by simp
  moreover have "‚àÄx. ListMem x lss ‚ü∂ ¬¨?R x x"
    unfolding state_successors_def
    by blast
  moreover have "?R ?vtx2 ?vtx1"
    unfolding state_successors_def
    using assms(3) state_in_successor_proj_in_state_in_successor state_successors_def
    by blast
  moreover have
    "ListMem ?vtx1 ?G"
    using assms(1, 3, 4)
    by (metis ListMem_iff contra_subsetD graph_plan_not_eq_last_diff_paths proj_successors_of_valid_are_valid)
  moreover have "top_sorted_abs ?R ?G"
    using assms(2)
    by simp
  ultimately show ?thesis
    unfolding S_def
    using lp_geq_lp_from_successor[of ?f ?g ?G ?R ?vtx2 ?vtx1 ?w]
    by blast
qed


lemma vars_change_cons:
  fixes s s'
  assumes "(vars_change as vs s = (s' # ss))"
  shows "(‚àÉas1 act as2.
    (as = as1 @ (act # as2))
    ‚àß (vars_change as1 vs s = [])
    ‚àß (state_succ (exec_plan s as1) act = s')
    ‚àß (vars_change as2 vs (state_succ (exec_plan s as1) act) = ss)
  )"
  using assms
proof (induction as arbitrary: s s' vs ss)
  case (Cons a as)
  then show ?case
  proof (cases "fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s a) ‚â† fmrestrict_set vs s")
    case True
    then have "state_succ s a = s'" "vars_change as vs (state_succ s a) = ss"
      using Cons.prems
      by simp+
    then show ?thesis
      by fastforce
  next
    case False
    then have "vars_change as vs (state_succ s a) = s' # ss"
      using Cons.prems
      by simp
    then obtain as1 act as2 where
      "as = as1 @ act # as2" "vars_change as1 vs (state_succ s a) = []"
      "state_succ (exec_plan (state_succ s a) as1) act = s'"
      "vars_change as2 vs (state_succ (exec_plan (state_succ s a) as1) act) = ss"
      using Cons.IH
      by blast
    then show ?thesis
      by (metis False append_Cons exec_plan.simps(2) vars_change.simps(2))
  qed
qed simp


lemma vars_change_cons_2:
  fixes s s'
  assumes "(vars_change as vs s = (s' # ss))"
  shows "(fmrestrict_set vs s' ‚â† fmrestrict_set vs s)"
  using assms
  apply(induction as arbitrary: s s' vs ss)
  apply(auto)
  by (metis list.inject)


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE first argument of `top\_sorted\_abs had to be wrapped into lambda.‚Ä∫
lemma problem_plan_bound_S_bound_1st_step:
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem"
  assumes "finite PROB" "(top_sorted_abs (Œªx y. y ‚àà state_successors (prob_proj PROB vs) x) lss)"
    "(set lss = valid_states (prob_proj PROB vs))" "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)"
    "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)" "(no_effectless_act as)" "(sat_precond_as s as)"
  shows "(‚àÉas'.
      (exec_plan s as' = exec_plan s as)
      ‚àß (subseq as' as)
      ‚àß (length as' <= S vs lss PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))
    )"
  using assms
proof (induction "vars_change as vs s" arbitrary: PROB as vs s lss)
  case Nil
  then obtain as' where
    "exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as'" "subseq as' as"
    "length as' ‚â§ problem_plan_bound (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))"
    using Nil(1) Nil.prems(1,4,5,6,7) no_vs_change_snapshot_s_vs_is_valid_bound
    by metis
  moreover have "
      problem_plan_bound (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))
      ‚â§ S vs lss PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s)
    "
    using snapshot_bound_leq_S le_trans
    by fast
  ultimately show ?case
    using le_trans
    by fastforce
next
  case (Cons s' ss)
  then obtain as1 act as2 where 1:
    "as = as1 @ act # as2" "vars_change as1 vs s = []" "state_succ (exec_plan s as1) act = s'"
    "vars_change as2 vs (state_succ (exec_plan s as1) act) = ss"
    using vars_change_cons
    by smt
  text‚Äπ Obtain conclusion of induction hypothesis for 'as2' and
      '(state\_succ (exec\_plan s as1) act)'. ‚Ä∫
  {
    {
      have "as1 ‚àà valid_plans PROB"
        using Cons.prems(5) 1(1) valid_append_valid_pref
        by blast
      moreover have "act ‚àà PROB"
        using Cons.prems(5) 1 valid_append_valid_suff valid_plan_valid_head
        by fast
      ultimately have "state_succ (exec_plan s as1) act ‚àà valid_states PROB"
        using Cons.prems(4) valid_as_valid_exec lemma_1_i
        by blast
    }
    moreover have "as2 ‚àà valid_plans PROB"
      using Cons.prems(5) 1(1) valid_append_valid_suff valid_plan_valid_tail
      by fast
    moreover have "no_effectless_act as2"
      using Cons.prems(6) 1(1) rem_effectless_works_13 sublist_append_back
      by blast
    moreover have "sat_precond_as (state_succ (exec_plan s as1) act) as2"
      using Cons.prems(7) 1(1) graph_plan_lemma_17 sat_precond_as.simps(2)
      by blast
    ultimately have "‚àÉas'.
          exec_plan (state_succ (exec_plan s as1) act) as'
          = exec_plan (state_succ (exec_plan s as1) act) as2
        ‚àß subseq as' as2
        ‚àß length as' ‚â§ S vs lss PROB (fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ (exec_plan s as1) act))"
      using Cons.prems(1, 2, 3) 1(4)
        Cons(1)[where as="as2" and s="(state_succ (exec_plan s as1) act)"]
      by blast
  }
  note a=this
  {
    have "no_effectless_act as1"
      using Cons.prems(6) 1(1) rem_effectless_works_12
      by blast
    moreover have "sat_precond_as s as1"
      using Cons.prems(7) 1(1) sat_precond_as_pfx
      by blast
    moreover have "as1 ‚àà valid_plans PROB"
      using Cons.prems(5) 1(1) valid_append_valid_pref
      by blast
    ultimately have "‚àÉas'. exec_plan s as1 = exec_plan s as' ‚àß
        subseq as' as1 ‚àß length as' ‚â§ problem_plan_bound (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))"
      using no_vs_change_snapshot_s_vs_is_valid_bound[of _ as1]
      using Cons.prems(1, 4) 1(2)
      by blast
  }
  then obtain as'' where b:
    "exec_plan s as1 = exec_plan s as''" "subseq as'' as1"
    "length as'' ‚â§ problem_plan_bound (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))"
    by blast
  {
    obtain as' where i:
      "exec_plan (state_succ (exec_plan s as1) act) as'
          = exec_plan (state_succ (exec_plan s as1) act) as2"
      "subseq as' as2"
      "length as' ‚â§ S vs lss PROB (fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ (exec_plan s as1) act))"
      using a
      by blast
    let ?as'="as'' @ act # as'"
    have "exec_plan s ?as' = exec_plan s as"
      using 1(1) b(1) i(1) exec_plan_Append exec_plan.simps(2)
      by metis
    moreover have "subseq ?as' as"
      using 1(1) b(2) i(2) subseq_append_iff
      by blast
    moreover
    {
      {
        ‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE this is proved earlier in the original proof script. Moved here to improve
            transparency.‚Ä∫
        have "sat_precond_as (exec_plan s as1) (act # as2)"
          using empty_replace_proj_dual7
          using 1(1) Cons.prems(7)
          by blast
        then have "fst act ‚äÜ‚á©f (exec_plan s as1)"
          by simp
      }
      note A = this
      {
        have
          "fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ (exec_plan s as1) act)
              = (state_succ (fmrestrict_set vs (exec_plan s as'')) (action_proj act vs))"
          using b(1) A drest_succ_proj_eq_drest_succ[where s="exec_plan s as1", symmetric]
          by simp
        also have "‚Ä¶ = (state_succ (fmrestrict_set vs s) (action_proj act vs))"
          using 1(2) b(1) empty_change_no_change
          by fastforce
        finally have "‚Ä¶ = fmrestrict_set  vs (state_succ s (action_proj act vs))"
          using  succ_drest_eq_drest_succ
          by blast
      }
      note B = this
      have C: "fmrestrict_set vs (exec_plan s as'') = fmrestrict_set vs s"
        using 1(2) b(1) empty_change_no_change
        by fastforce
      {
        have "act ‚àà PROB"
          using Cons.prems(5) 1 valid_append_valid_suff valid_plan_valid_head
          by fast
        then have ‚Ñµ: "action_proj act vs ‚àà prob_proj PROB vs"
