          using action_proj_in_prob_proj
          by blast
        then have "(state_succ s (action_proj act vs)) ‚àà (state_successors (prob_proj PROB vs) s)"
        proof (cases "fst (action_proj act vs) ‚äÜ‚á©f s")
          case True
          then show ?thesis
            unfolding state_successors_def
            using Cons.hyps(2) 1(3) b(1) A B C ‚Ñµ DiffI imageI singletonD vars_change_cons_2
              drest_succ_proj_eq_drest_succ
            by metis
        next
          case False
          then show ?thesis
            unfolding state_successors_def
            using Cons.hyps(2) 1(3) b(1) A B C ‚Ñµ DiffI imageI singletonD
              drest_succ_proj_eq_drest_succ vars_change_cons_2
            by metis
        qed
      }
      then have D:
        "problem_plan_bound (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))
                + S vs lss PROB (fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ s (action_proj act vs)))
                + 1
              ‚â§ S vs lss PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s)"
        using Cons.prems(2, 3, 4) S_geq_S_succ_plus_ell[where s'="state_succ s (action_proj act vs)"]
        by blast
      {
        have
          "length ?as' ‚â§ problem_plan_bound (snapshot PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))
                + 1 + S vs lss PROB (fmrestrict_set vs (state_succ (exec_plan s as1) act))"
          using b i
          by fastforce
        then have "length ?as' ‚â§ S vs lss PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s)"
          using b(1) A B C D drest_succ_proj_eq_drest_succ
          by (smt Suc_eq_plus1 add_Suc dual_order.trans)
      }
    }
    ultimately have ?case
      by blast
  }
  then show ?case
    by blast
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE first argument of `top\_sorted\_abs` had to be wrapped into lambda.‚Ä∫
lemma problem_plan_bound_S_bound_2nd_step:
  assumes "finite (PROB :: 'a problem)"
    "(top_sorted_abs (Œªx y. y ‚àà state_successors (prob_proj PROB vs) x) lss)"
    "(set lss = valid_states (prob_proj PROB vs))" "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)"
    "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
  shows "(‚àÉas'.
    (exec_plan s as' = exec_plan s as)
    ‚àß (subseq as' as)
    ‚àß (length as' ‚â§ S vs lss PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))
  )"
proof -
  ‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE Proof premises and obtain conclusion of `problem\_plan\_bound\_S\_bound\_1st\_step`.‚Ä∫
  {
    have a: "rem_condless_act s [] (rem_effectless_act as) ‚àà valid_plans PROB"
      using assms(5) rem_effectless_works_4' rem_condless_valid_10
      by blast
    then have b: "no_effectless_act (rem_condless_act s [] (rem_effectless_act as))"
      using assms rem_effectless_works_6 rem_condless_valid_9
      by fast
    then have "sat_precond_as s (rem_condless_act s [] (rem_effectless_act as))"
      using assms rem_condless_valid_2
      by blast
    then have "‚àÉas'.
      exec_plan s as' = exec_plan s (rem_condless_act s [] (rem_effectless_act as))
      ‚àß subseq as' (rem_condless_act s [] (rem_effectless_act as))
      ‚àß length as' ‚â§ S vs lss PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s)
    "
      using assms a b problem_plan_bound_S_bound_1st_step
      by blast
  }
  then obtain as' where 1:
    "exec_plan s as' = exec_plan s (rem_condless_act s [] (rem_effectless_act as))"
    "subseq as' (rem_condless_act s [] (rem_effectless_act as))"
    "length as' ‚â§ S vs lss PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s)"
    by blast
  then have 2: "exec_plan s as' = exec_plan s as"
    using rem_condless_valid_1 rem_effectless_works_14
    by metis
  then have "subseq as' as"
    using 1(2) rem_condless_valid_8 rem_effectless_works_9 sublist_trans
    by metis
  then show ?thesis
    using 1(3) 2
    by blast
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE first argument of `top\_sorted\_abs` had to be wrapped into lambda.‚Ä∫
lemma S_in_MPLS_leq_2_pow_n:
  assumes "finite (PROB :: 'a problem)"
    "(top_sorted_abs (Œª x y. y ‚àà state_successors (prob_proj PROB vs) x) lss)"
    "(set lss = valid_states (prob_proj PROB vs))" "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)"
    "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
  shows "(‚àÉas'.
      (exec_plan s as' = exec_plan s as)
      ‚àß (subseq as' as)
      ‚àß (length as' ‚â§ Sup {S vs lss PROB s' | s'. s' ‚àà valid_states (prob_proj PROB  vs)})
    )"
proof -
  obtain as' where
    "exec_plan s as' = exec_plan s as" "subseq as' as"
    "length as' ‚â§ S vs lss PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s)"
    using assms problem_plan_bound_S_bound_2nd_step
    by blast
  moreover {
    ‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE Derive sufficient conditions for inferring that `S vs lss PROB` is smaller or equal to
    the supremum of the set @{term "{S vs lss PROB s' | s'. s' ‚àà valid_states (prob_proj PROB vs)}"}: i.e.
    being contained and that the supremum is contained as well.‚Ä∫
    let ?S="{S vs lss PROB s' | s'. s' ‚àà valid_states (prob_proj PROB vs)}"
    {
      have "fmrestrict_set vs s ‚àà valid_states (prob_proj PROB vs)"
        using assms(4) graph_plan_not_eq_last_diff_paths
        by blast
      then have "S vs lss PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s) ‚àà ?S"
        using calculation(1)
        by blast
    }
    moreover
    {
      have "finite (prob_proj PROB vs)"
        by (simp add: assms(1) prob_proj_def)
      then have "finite ?S"
        using Setcompr_eq_image assms(3)
        by (metis List.finite_set finite_imageI)
    }
    ultimately have "S vs lss PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s) ‚â§ Sup ?S"
      using le_cSup_finite by blast
  }
  ultimately show ?thesis
    using le_trans
    by blast
qed


‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE first argument of `top\_sorted\_abs` had to be wrapped into lambda.‚Ä∫
lemma problem_plan_bound_S_bound:
  fixes PROB :: "'a problem"
  assumes "finite PROB" "(top_sorted_abs (Œªx y. y ‚àà state_successors (prob_proj PROB vs) x) lss)"
    "(set lss = valid_states (prob_proj PROB vs))"
  shows "
    problem_plan_bound PROB
    ‚â§ Sup {S vs lss PROB (s' :: 'a state) | s'. s' ‚àà valid_states (prob_proj PROB vs)}
  "
proof -
  let ?f="ŒªPROB.
    Sup {S vs lss PROB (s' :: 'a state) | s'. s' ‚àà valid_states (prob_proj PROB vs)} + 1"
  {
    fix as and s :: "'a state"
    assume "s ‚àà valid_states PROB" "as ‚àà valid_plans PROB"
    then obtain as' where a:
      "exec_plan s as' = exec_plan s as" "subseq as' as"
      "length as' ‚â§ Sup {S vs lss PROB s' |s'. s' ‚àà valid_states (prob_proj PROB vs)}"
      using assms S_in_MPLS_leq_2_pow_n
      by blast
    then have "length as' < ?f PROB"
      by linarith
    moreover have "exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as'"
      using a(1)
      by simp
    ultimately have
      "‚àÉas'. exec_plan s as = exec_plan s as' ‚àß subseq as' as ‚àß length as' < ?f PROB"
      using a(2)
      by blast
  }
  then show ?thesis
    using assms(1) problem_plan_bound_UBound[where f="?f"]
    by fastforce
qed

subsection "State Space Acyclicity"

text ‚Äπ State space acyclicity is again formalized using graphs to model the state space. However
the relation inducing the graph is the successor relation on states. [Abdulaziz et al.,
Definition 15, HOL4 Definition 15, p.27]

With this, the acyclic system compositional bound `S` can be shown to be an upper bound on the
sublist diameter (lemma `problem\_plan\_bound\_S\_bound\_thesis`). [Abdulaziz et al., p.29] ‚Ä∫

‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE name shortened.‚Ä∫
‚Äï ‚ÄπNOTE first argument of 'top\_sorted\_abs' had to be wrapped into lambda.‚Ä∫
definition sspace_DAG where
  "sspace_DAG PROB lss ‚â° (
    (set lss = valid_states PROB)
    ‚àß (top_sorted_abs (Œªx y. y ‚àà state_successors PROB x) lss)
  )"


lemma problem_plan_bound_S_bound_2nd_step_thesis:
  assumes "finite (PROB :: 'a problem)" "(sspace_DAG (prob_proj PROB vs) lss)"
    "(s ‚àà valid_states PROB)" "(as ‚àà valid_plans PROB)"
  shows "(‚àÉas'.   (exec_plan s as' = exec_plan s as)
    ‚àß (subseq as' as)
    ‚àß (length as' ‚â§ S vs lss PROB (fmrestrict_set vs s))
  )"
  using assms problem_plan_bound_S_bound_2nd_step sspace_DAG_def
  by fast


text ‚ÄπAnd finally, this is the main lemma about the upper bounding algorithm.‚Ä∫

theorem problem_plan_bound_S_bound_thesis:
  assumes "finite (PROB :: 'a problem)" "(sspace_DAG (prob_proj PROB vs) lss)"
  shows "(
    problem_plan_bound PROB
    ‚â§ Sup {S vs lss PROB s' | s'. s' ‚àà valid_states (prob_proj PROB vs)}
  )"
  using assms problem_plan_bound_S_bound sspace_DAG_def
  by fast


end
